Summary: Breakfast supplied. Has a gym, swimming pool and laundry. The machines in the laundry operate via debit/credit card. Very helpful and friendly  staff. Centrally located. Easy to access. Reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest-  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had a great stay with us here. We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely,  The Management and Staff

Summary: When we arrived at the room after checking in, the toilet was flooded so I called to let them know and they gave me plunger to do the work for them so called and request new room so we get new room after that we request housekeeping days later says have no time to do it even signs says request housekeeping before 11 00 am  but they can only do thrash out replace towels that's it well guess what didn't do nothing at all after went to front office to let them know joust gimme towels and they told me will do it next day so they knew so again we get out the room so they can do housekeeping but we come back was around 4 pm still nothing went to the front desk let know speak diferent people joust to  Make sure they will do my room finally they did it last day to check out toilet
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely,  The Management and Staff

Summary: Online stated a couch or similar but space was empty/void (only 2 beds), breakfast was not up to par at all (ate 1st couple days and never again, a reason we chose that hotel... disappointed), parking was horrible (stated valet but you had to park yourself and no room at all, they had to remove 2 cars out of the way in order to leave the parking, if you're in a hurry, good luck), no luggage rack, had to live off the floor or hoist your luggage on the bed (which got the covers dirty). I really expected more from Wyndham and staying a Ramada (I understand it was converted over from a Travel Lodge but we got a cheap Motel 6 instead). Never again. Needs a lot of updates (a lot of which should've beed done already when taken over by Wyndham).
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us here.  We are still in the process of finishing our renovation - we apologize that not everything was to your satisfaction.  Please give us another try as we are almost done with everything.  We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely,  The Management and Staff

Summary Heading: Worst Stay Ever.  No Wifi.  They don't clean the rooms everyday automatically
Summary: Terrible hotel to stay at.  Don't get lured into staying here because of the proximity to disneyland.  There is no wifi.  WE were unable to login and access any of the disney apps to plan our days or universal studios and I could not check my email for work using the hotel wifi.They do not clean the rooms every day.  We had to clean our own room 6 of the 9 nights we were there and fetch our own clean towels.  Pool and hot tub were tiny.  Stay anywhere else but here.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest-  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us here. We are in the process of completely renovating the wifi - we apologize that it was not servicable for your stay.  Please know that the cleaning is "on demand" - the new nationwide standard.  In this way you can choose the level of service that you want for your room - thank you for your understanding.  We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely, The Management and Staff

Summary: The lady and ballet Parker’s were nice. But in reality pay a little more else where for a better stay. I found the smell of cleaning products so strong and overwhelming also bed bugs on top comforter.

Summary: Loved the free breakfast, pool was clean and nice, rooms were amazing, cleaning staff was the best, nice ice machine, laundry room was great, great customer service, 10 minute walk to the free Toy Story Shuttle to Disneyland, bunkbeds and room were large and easily fit 6 of us. I have to say that the cleaning staff was so good! And the breakfast was an amazing bonus!

Summary: Close enough to walk to Disneyland and nice helpful staff, wifi didn’t work though. The rooms were clean and comfortable and lots of space in the family room. Pool and hot tub were nice at the end of a long day.

Summary: Free parking!  But you might have to move it if you aren’t staying the next night.  Rooms are great size for a family!  Nobody is sleeping on the floor.  Breakfast was not great.  Not a lot of options.  It’s within walking distance of the woody and friends parking lot so easy walk and ride the bus to the park.  It’s a cheaper option and motel style so you get more of the clientele that are partying in the parking lot and smoking pot.  But the rooms were quiet and we only smelled pot once or twice!

Summary: I was looking for a hotel with parking near Disneyland that wasn't going to break the bank as Disney already did that. I found the Ramada and was a little skeptical but read online that the property was renovated so decided to try it out. The rooms are actually not bad! There was adequate lightning, the AC was good, the room was pretty spacious and it even has a mini-fridge and microwave. The tv's are smart tv's so you can connect your laptop/ipad with an hdmi cable if needed. The mirror in the bathroom was also touch-activated so I was pretty impressed with the furnishings in the room. I wish there was a luggage rack but I made do with the table and little couch area. The room was clean and had everything I needed for my short weekend stay, has complimentary parking and even

Summary: Price is great and very central to all the great spots in Anaheim. The rooms are very clean. Staff is very very friendly and helpful. Convenient parking with valet. Ichel is a wonderful person. I usually stay here for conventions at the Anaheim convention center.

Summary: The lady who check us in was very nice! She is absolutely amazing and greets guests with smile everytime. Very accommodating! We are in town for a convention and she was very helpful! This place is great!

Summary Heading: Renovated, Clean. Close to grocery and shuttle. breakfast is sickening
Summary: It is a renovated hotel:modernized and clean. Very weak to non-existing wifi and the breakfast is the same every day! We stayed for 5 days and truly by the 5th day we are so sick of it. I wish there was more option to the breakfast. Pool ispacked.

Summary Heading: Potential to be a great place to stay!
Summary: Pros: The location is the best for us! It's close to everything - we did a lot of walking to different areas. The convention is just a block away. The room is also big- we had the king-size bed. The room is clean. It has a fridge and microwave which is a plus! and it's fully renovated - this was the reason why we booked this hotel.   Cons/Suggestions: Breakfast needs more items. They serve the same kind of sandwich throughout our 1-week stay. There are 2 kinds of cereal, milk 2 kinds of juices (all in dispensers) and of course coffee. The sandwiches are on a first come first served basis (I learned about it when I called the front desk telling them what's going on in the breakfast room - people are in line and there are no more sandwiches. I felt bad for the staff working alone
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest-  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so pleased that you had a great stay with us here.  We will take into account your comments on the breakfast we serve - we have just recently opened the breakfast room and are still tinkering around with what we serve.  Thank you for your suggestions!    We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely, The Management and Staff

Summary: Had such a good experience. Rooms were very clean and seemed newly remodeled. Breakfast was great every morning. Came to clean the room every day and did an excellent job. Pool was nice and has a hot tub. Close to Disney only a 26 min walk. Was a very pleasant experience.

Rooms look remodeled and nice.  There is a Disney themed feel that is nice.  Breakfast is a   good breakfast sandwich and fruit muffins coffee and juice.  This hotel is on Harbor just down the street from Disneyland. We walked the first day not too far.  There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel, for city bus or Art bus.

Summary: We loved it clean place and the price was right on the money and the best thing about it is that we were able to get the room we need at that minute with ash and there’s nothing wrong with cash in hand

Summary: This hotel is under new management.  It is not travelodge anymore.  It is Ramada by Wyndham.  The new management is super nice and the hotel is super clean.  Perfect location for a Disney vacation trip with family!  Walking distance to disney parking lot and convention center!  Will definitely stay again!  :)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Summary: We were given access to another room due to the checkin clerk not knowing what rooms were occupied!  The rooms have no safes.  These issues together made us feel very unsafe especially when leaving room for large part of day for Disney parks.  Hotel changed names and closed pool without advising, causing issue finding it and huge disappointment to no pool.  We would have booked elsewhere/changed reservation had we known as this was important.  Currently not offered any discount, have asked for management to contact.  Would not recommend, nor would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not have a great stay with us here.  We have completely switched over from Travelodge to Ramada and the snafus that you mentioned should all be eliminated.  We are sorry that they spoiled your visit and hope that you give us another chance to show you how great it can be here.  We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely, The Management and Staff

Summary: The rooms are renovated so that was a plus and it is very close to the convention center and Disney.  The rooms were very bare and "no frills" but at least there was no gross carpeting but the everything was very generic.   Ok for a quick in and out but the cost of the room was very high for the level of the room.

Summary: We love our stay here, Its a 10 minute walk to disneyland and california adventure and great places to go to eat nearby. Great treatment by staff members, excellent breakfast.  The rooms have been renovated which seem just like new rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Summary: 4 of us stayed in the 2 bedroom suite for a business convention. We booked well in advance so the remodel was a pleasant surprise. Our group was the first to stay in this remodeled room and we couldn't be happier with our choice to stay at Travelodge, especially for the price during a convention. The beds were surprisingly VERY comfortable, but the pillows are a little small (we were able to request more pillows so nothing to complain about). The king suite had 1 king bedroom with a fridge and microwave, 1 queen bedroom with bathroom attached as well as a fridge and microwave, a living area with a STURDY bunk bed with full size beds on top and bottom, 2 couches, a desk, fridge, microwave and a second full bath. Fantastic choice for traveling businesses willing to stay together
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Summary: While checking in, the people in front of us were told they were "over booked". When we went to check in the clerk said "locals with too many friends" and was checked in. Mind you, we checked in at a hotel room because the office was under construction.  When we got to the elevator is was half broken down with graffiti on the walls and trash on the floor. Health notices were taped to the elevator walls.  The room door had holes will with putty and the door was clearly bent back to shape.  I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to write a review of our property. Please know that we have changed so many things since your stay  - we are a completely new hotel.  We are sorry that all these issues, now fixed, happened during your stay.  We know that you have many choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Ramada when you need a place to stay.  Sincerely, The Management and Staff

Summary: Wyndham corporate provided me with inaccurate information about the availability of rollout beds at this Travelodge location. When we checked in, the front desk informed us that rollout beds have never been an option there and that it was my fault for trusting information from Wyndham. There was no acknowledgement of the mistake and we were forced to book an additional room for almost $200. Completely unprofessional. The rooms themselves were okay. The bedframes were noisy and the walls are very thin so we could hear people coming in and out of their rooms, walking, and yelling all night.
Manager Response: Dear Chris -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us.  We do apologize for the incident, and will also talk to the front desk regarding their handling of the matter.  Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention.   We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland are and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge for your needs.  Sincerely, The Management and Staff

Summary: When we checked in it was pouring down rain, there lobby wasn't open so had to use a outside window and stand in the rain (It's was 6PM).  Then when we got in our room, it was not furnished as said on website.  No couch in the room, when we walked in from the rain no mat at the door so our room floor was wet.  The shower had low pressure and no shelves to put soap, shampoo, etc.  The walls are so thin could hear  our neighbors conversations.  Will  not recommend this location.

This is not ok if she does not have patience to deal and explain to customers she should not be working with customer service. Also her mask was under her nose this is a violation.

Summary Heading: Good hotel for overnight stay only
Summary: This hotel has been here for  years and is starting to go downhill.  It's clean, the showers are great, and the a/c works very well.  However, walls are thin and you can hear everything, and if you're not on the top floor, expect to hear your neighbors above you walking around!!  This hotel is due for an upgrade or a full remodel
Manager Response: Dear Lina -   Thank you for staying here at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us here.  Please know that we are working hard to return the hotel back to the way it was before the Covid shutdown.  In addition, we are starting a full remodel and will have a completely renovated place when we are finished.  Our people are doing their best right now - thank you for your understanding.  We know that you have choices whenever it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: If you just need a place to sleep that is near Disney, this will do. But I would never want to have my younger kids stay with me here. The door barely closed and had a half inch gap between it and the door jam. There were large bugs in the bathroom. The toilet seat was incredibly tiny. I kept having to unplug and replug the a/c unit to get it to work. It is a motel to get if you need the cheapest place around that isn’t just a room someone is renting out. You are getting what you pay for with this place.

Summary Heading: I’d Give It A Zero If That Was An Option
Summary: I booked a room here for my wife and children for July 16-17, 2021. We had specific requirements; 1. It had to be a hotel with internal doors, not a motel with doors  opening into parking lot. (For safety)) 2. She required a free breakfast. 3. An operational pool 4. A shuttle to Disneyland. When I called the booking desk AT THE HOTEL, I had the speaker on my phone on so both my side and children could hear the conversation. I specifically asked if the facility met the requirements listed and with each question we were LIED TO and told yes to each one. Upon arrival later at night, after driving 11 hours, my wife called me very upset. The doors opened to the parking lot and several unsavory individuals were hanging out there. LIE NUMBER ONE.  They had a pool that has been closed
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -  Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us.  Lately we have heard that there is incorrect information given out to people via our answering service - that is possibly the case in this situation.  Nobody would try to bring you over with lies, please know that.  I know that it does not make things better for you, but please accept our apologies.  We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge for your needs.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: They took our money but never put us in the computer. Tried to charge us no show fees AND rented out our room to other people. Our key never worked!! Then we were yelled at by staff. We have stayed here before but no more.

Summary: Management at this hotel is extremely rude unhelpful I will never be staying there again when my mom and I were there we had two cars no we’re on their website did it say only one car per room and it was not brought to our attention until we asked for a second parking pass for a second car and they were very compassionate and rude and totally refused and didn’t care what happened to the second car or give us any options we parked four blocks away and had to lug everything from the car to the room because they wouldn’t let us unload the car before we parked it somewhere else The outside looks old worn down no pool under construction

Summary: It was a great price but people were drinking and smoking out side with loud music most nights. Very difficult while pregnant and with little kids to sleep and not me sick around so much smoke. Very close to Disneyland though.

Summary: People outside all hours of the night, driving through with music playing very loud, don't expect to get any rest at this place. To noisy!! Didn't get any sleep at all. I would not recommend this place to anyone who wants to relax. Not good.
Manager Response: Dear Ramona -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center  and for writing a review for our property.  We appreciate all feedback, which is used to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us.  We are returning to our original operations, which were curtailed by the regulations imposed during the pandemic.  The noise will definitely be lowered when we return back to our regular guests and routines.  Thank you for letting us know, and for being understanding about everything.  We know that you have choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we thank you for choosing the Travelodge.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Super clean and great if going to Disneyland!!!
Summary: I was a little scared when I booked because of the reviews, but I’m glad I stayed here. Great price for a super clean room. I walked to Disneyland day and night. There was a few scary characters on property, but they gave me no trouble. I need a clean comfortable bed, since I was spending the whole day at Disneyland and that is what I got. I’lol visit again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Rose -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center  and for writing a review for our property. We know that you have choices in lodging in the Disneyland area and we thank you for choosing the Travelodge.  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: My experience at Travelodge Hotels had been the most fun in the past, until this past experience, where I feel we were, and I'd like to speak on behalf of the other Guest (the paying Guest), unfairly and unjustifiably treated as third class citizens. Obviously, the person behind the counter had a biased or formerly encountered my client with some sort of conflict, but if such was the case, it would have been denoted in their records and his money would not be of any good to their establishment since check-in. His name was on the registration upon arrival and clearly stated that the moneys for deposit being reimbursed at the time check out and only after inspection, would they be returned to him, since he handed the innkeeper the $100 dollars directly. After such tugging and
Manager Response: Dear Elvira -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you had a bad stay with us.  Please know that we will look into the issue that you mentioned - the deposit is an industry-wide standard.  The customer service should have been there at the same time, however.  Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention.  We know that you have choices in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay!  Please come back again!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Yes update your website don’t like to the client I was very disappointed I was with my 13-year-old daughter that’s not a place to stay Too many drunk people drug People Worst Pl., I’ve ever stayed before
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you had a stay that did not meet your expectations.  Please know that we are in the process of returning our operations back to normal - there were severe restrictions that were imposed during the lockdown.  Thank you for sharing your experience and we hope that you will give us another chance to see how a stay with us COULD be.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Visit family. Was very disappointed and still am. Couldn't sleep. People arguing all night and partying. Not a good place to have around Disneyland or any kids. Would of rather states om skid row!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not have a great stay with us here.  Please know that we stayed open during the pandemic and adjusted our policies accordingly.  We are in the process of changing back to our original high standards and hope that you will come and give us another chance to show you how it can be.  Thank you for letting us know about your experience.    We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Receptionist was rude. The website said breakfast included but no breakfast was served.  Hotel was very noisy.  Card keys were given but only one works. Cigarette butts were everywhere but no cleaning was done the 3 days we were there.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not have a stay that met your standards.  Please know that we were restricted by Covid regulations and are slowly changing our operations back.  Thank you for your understanding as we try to navigate these unprecedented times.  We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Does not work with there customer be. There for your customers please you never know who you run into we were very respectful and you guys lied to me and my wife and we missed our business meeting. Have a great day at least I can say.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry that you did not have a great stay here.  We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary: We have stayed here before and had no issues.  This time it was awful!!!  Kids running all over the place yelling and screaming until late.  The parking lot was littered with trash.  Overflowing trash cans in the parking lot.  Lots of traffic (don't know whether it was drugs, partying or prostitution) all night long with loud music, talking yelling.  Did not feel safe at all.  Couldn't  sleep.  DO NOT STAY HERE EITHER BY YOURSELF OR ESPECIALLY WITH YOUR FAMILY!!!!  I should have read the reviews because the responses from the management are all "canned" responses (looks like they copied and pasted them) and there has not been any follow up or improvements from any of the complaints in the past.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  No, we do not write canned responses to respond to the reviews.  I personally read every single review that passes through the Wyndham portal and respond to them.  Some times there are no words.  Please understand that this is a very difficult time for hotels - the bulk of the clientele is not the Disney families nor the convention attendees that we normally have. We are trying our very best to keep our hotel running.  I know this is not what you expect as a guest and for this we apologize.   Sincerely, The Management

Summary: Booked a trip to stay here for a couple of nights and was SO disgusted upon arrival. As we arrived there were tons of people hanging out on the balcony's with their doors open and alot of people gathered int he parking lot (mind you we are in the middle of covid and are supposed to be social distancing). The hotel honestly looked like one big party which was extremely off-putting. Next, while checking in the hotel clerk handed me the hotel contract which was not legible AT ALL. Looked like the printer ran out of ink and he refused to reprint it and expected me to sign it. Once we got to our room we found tons of dirty and mold in the bathroom and the walls. The whole vibe of this place was horrible, we ended up not evening staying 1 night and left 20 minutes after we checked in.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay with us here, I hope you accept our apologies.  Please know that we are working on our property to make it better for your next visit - thank you for your understanding.  We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area and we hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.    Please come back soon!  Sincerely The Management

Summary: This hotel was so uncomfortable, nasty and public for drug people. You can find drug people walking around your room. People fighting outside and a lots of prostitutes in the 1st floor. I do not recommend this hotel, if you can call it “hotel”.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and for taking the time to review our property.  We appreciate all feedback from our guests and use it to improve both our customer service and our facilities.  We are so sorry you did not have a great stay.  We will look into all of the issues that you mentioned and see what we can do.  Thank you for bringing them to our attention.  We know that you have choices when it comes to lodging in the Disneyland area.  We hope that you always choose the Travelodge whenever you need a place to stay.  Please come back soon!  Sincerely, The Management

Summary Heading: Only thing good was the price
Summary: This hotel is dirty and in desperate need of refurbishment. The bathrooms were moldy, the bath tub shower wasn't level and had a broken exhaust fan, lots of signs of water damage on floor and ceiling. "Fresh" towels had hair in them. Bedding was dingy, pillows were grossly lumpy, and curtains had holes in them. The internet never worked, and breakfast option was canceled but we didnt get a pretrip warning. That being said the staff were friendly and the location to Disneyland was a plus. But someone else said it right, you get what you paid for.

The property is in desperate need of renovation? It is old,dirty, and run down The biggest benefit to staying was the free parking and continental breakfast. Well...now they stopped serving breakfast too. Biggest benefit was being within walking distance to the Toy story parking lot.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for...
Summary: Staff was friendly.  However, service does not overshadow a shower that doesn’t drain, unreliable internet connection and outlets that are old and loose.   Room was clean.  Bed was acceptable.  You have to “check out” hair dryers—-really????

Rooms are of poor quality and not very clean.  Hairs, stains, mold, water damage on ceiling... I turned the lights off before I crawled into bed because I didn’t want to see what was between the sheets... better off not knowing.

close to disneyland and knottsberry farms. Great place to stay if trying to be frugal. Everything was just fine. Nothing exceptional, but fine. room had microwave and fridge. Comfortable. clean. Shower only. no tub. But if you are going to disneyland all you will care about is putting your feet up and getting some rest. The lady at the check in desk was very helpful and kind to us.
Manager Response: Hello freedomsales,   We are thankful for your feedback, and we are happy to hear that your Disneyland trip was such a success! We are glad to know your stay was an enjoyable one for you and your family and we hope that the next time you visit Disneyland / Anaheim, you can come back and stay with us again! Thank you for your review. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: There was very loud electric guitar noise coming from the banquet room (after 10pm). I understand it's the NAMM show but a warning that extremely loud electric guitar noise were going on, would have been helpful and I would have changed properties. There really was no breakfast choice(s),  and was very poor at best. I'm a Platinum member and this was very disappointing. Yes it's a convenient location, but definitely check somewhere else. The young lady that checked me in was very courteous and deserves a raise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response dear Adolfo A. We understand that NAMM 2020 was such a big success around area and its always busy. This time around, there was a band who rented out that area in which was in rehearsal and in contract with property management to rent out for 2 hours. They were there from 7:30 pm - 9:30 pm. (Not 10:00 pm) We definitely tried our best to get them out as soon as we can knowing that we have to be considerate and courteous about our other guests. We absolutely got your calls about reporting the noise and we were working hard to have everyone on the same page and for that we apologize if we failed. As far as the breakfast options, we are continental, and we have only the basics; we do not have any hot complete breakfast here. We are sad to hear that you'll be looking elsewhere and we hope in the near future you can change your mind and stay once again with us to redeem ourselves. Thank you and have good day!

Summary: Worse hotel we stayed at on our entire 8 day road trip. The carpet was gross. The bathrooms were not taken care of properly.  Tacky filthy carpet, mold in the shower,  the breakfast was almost non existent. Guess I got what I paid for , I'll spend a little more money next time to be in a place where I can feel safe putting my toddler down.
Manager Response: Hello Colormebluefp,   We thank you for taking your time in writing your review. It seems,though, that your stay was not a pleasant one and for that we apologize. We wished that all these issues you seem to name, could have been brought up to our attention so we could have had the opportunity to address them immediately. Thank you for staying with us and once again we apologize for the issues and experienced you had.

Summary Heading: Won’t stay again property needs TLC
Summary: Have stayed at this property before but sad to see it deteriorating. The rooms do t have safe. Staff had to search 6 rooms to find one with a safe. You have to request for a fridge and hope it is available. Main rating is due to the quality of the rooms. Sheets are old and worn with stains and thin. Towels not even white so old and worn. Everything inside is outdated and worn out. A touch up paint to cover up the room. Bathroom sink fixture missing.  The property is 3 1/2 blocks from main theme park (walking).  Breakfast served up to 10am consists of waffles, yogurt, bread, pastry, cereal, coffee, juice, milk.
Manager Response: Dear JaggSF,   We thank you for writing your review and taking your time. We are aware that our property does need upgrading and we are in the process of that. We are sad to hear your stay was not a happy one as we see your preferences, we thank you for letting us know your feedback as we try our best to be accommodating, however, we see you were still a bit unhappy and for that we apologize. We hope you can come back in the future when the changes are made to the property. Thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: Good stay for what we needed
Summary: Look it states a 2 star hotel. And that is what it is. It is a large room. We had a " renovated " room but the carpet was still really stained but felt clean . The room was served daily. The shower was great. Beds were comfortable. It states free wifi but it was a hit and miss if we could use it or not. Free parking and free breakfast. It wasn't a buffet breakfast but it fed us - toast , muffins, 2 choices of cereals , waffles and juice tea / coffee. We walked to Disneyland which was a safe 20 minute walk to front gate. Denny's right next door. Convenience store across the road. Yes it would've been lovely to stay somewhere a little closer, maybe a bit nicer but I was happy to save $$ hundreds of dollars . Front office staff always really friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Nelmay43,   We thank you so much for staying with us. We are glad to hear you stay was an enjoyable experience and everything for you and your party worked out. You are absolutely correct, we do offer continental breakfast (which is not a hot meal breakfast), we have free parking, and free WI-FI. We have a Denny's right next door and conveniences stores around the area. We thank you for your review and we hope in the near future you stay with us again. Thank you.

Summary: The family and I have been coming to this facility for years. I’ve never had a problem before I actually really enjoy staying here. But after this last weekend, we will never be coming back here again. Staff was extremely rude, the room was dirty and the whole establishment smelled of a funky odor. They didn’t seem to care of the bum sleeping in front of the complex and peeing on the side of the building. They were not at all accommodating with three infants. And staff seemed annoyed when we asked for certain things, like extra towels and pillows.
Manager Response: Dear jmo02,   Seems that your expectations were not met as you stayed here, and for that we are extremely apologetic. We are sad to hear your experience with front desk was not pleasant nor enjoyable and we sincerely excuse ourselves for that. We tend to strive on our customer service and it seems with you, we did not fulfill our goal, we will proceed to share this review with our staff to endure on our duty and assistance accordingly, and making sure this does not repeat itself. I also want to mention, any activity homeless outside the property has been reported to the Anaheim Police Department. This is an issue that has been brought up to the city and yet we have been waiting for answers and nothing has been done, so we apologize on our behalf, but however, we cannot move and nor take control of situations like this, without the A.P.D. being involve. We thank you for taking your time in writing your review. Have a a good day and happy holidays!

Summary: Not a place I will go to again. Very dirty. For a little more money I should have stayed next door. It felt veru unsafe. Smelled like pee as soon as we walked in. Bathroom lights didn't work. Noone vacummed
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We thank you very much for taking your time to write your review. We are sorry for the issues you have experienced, we would have liked to know about them when you were here. We will definitely share this review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and also how we can improve. We hope in the near future we can see you again. Thank you, have a lovely day!

Summary: You get what you pay for.  It was a comfortable aged hotel.  I found it to be comfortable and the staff, at least the ones I interacted with were friendly and efficient.  Nothing here screams luxary, but if your looking for good bag for your buck to put your money in the parks, this is it.  A brisk 20 minute walk door to main gate.
Manager Response: Dear Values Guest,   We are happy to hear that you were comfortable with us, and we do thank you for choosing us for your vacation. We thank you for your compliment on our staff. We hope in the near future you can stay with us, when you visit Anaheim again. Of course, you are right, we are about 20 minute walking distance to Disneyland (1 mile from the Main gate). Once again, we thank you and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Their carpet was almost black and was so smelly and they are providing only waffles and cereals for breakfast which is disgusting. The bathro floor was so slippery and the lights in the bathroom isnt workinh we complained to the desk and told me they would fix it but until the last day of stay it wasnt fix all
Manager Response: Thank you Vanessa Lynn S,   We understand your frustration when it comes having a comfortable room for you and your family and it seems that we did not meet your standards. We thank you for reporting the issues you had, as we do have them logged, however, being that they did have to work in there, we had waited for your departure to go in there and fix what needed our attention, since we did not want to inconvenience you and your family. We are terribly sorry for what you have experienced and we hope that, that does not stop you from coming back. We hope the front desk was able to help and compensate you in anyway we could. If not, please do not hesitate to call the property and see what we can do to help. We thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for.
Summary: Is it a fancy hotel? Not by any means. Is it a place to sleep? Yes.  The free parking and price are great, but the real reason this is a 3 star review is because the room itself barely does anything other than provide a bed. The shower curtain has no liner so water gets everywhere. The bathroom sink light is extremely dim. One of the table lamps didn't work at all. The plugs all barely worked, and I had to carefully balance my plug with a spacer to get it to charge my phone. The room works, but just barely. If you can afford elsewhere, do it, otherwise just enjoy the hilarity of the Travelodge and laugh.
Manager Response: Dear brokeAFlol,   Thank you so much for your feedback. We thank you for choosing to stay with us, and taking your time to write your review. We see that this place worked for you and your family and we are happy about that. However, we understand that the plugs in the room were reported, so we could have addressed it right away. As well as the lamps in the room. We do apologize for the troubles you've experienced and hope that doesn't stop you from coming back again. Thank you for your time and we hope you have a great day!

Summary: 4 day trip to Disneyland. Updated rooms where better than previous rooms, and we liked how spacious the suite was, but a few things in the room were run down. Close to the art shuttle. I'd suggest bringing a noise machine since it's right on harbor
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We hope you had so much fun with your friends, and also hope to hear from you guys soon for your next trip to Disneyland. You are correct, we have the ART shuttle picking up outside the hotel. They run every 20 minutes on the hour and just about 30 minutes after park closing. We are happy to hear your stay was awesome and hope to see you next time when you visit Anaheim! Have great day!

Summary: Dirty rooms (stained sheets, carpets and curtains). Bathroom was decently clean. 3 out of the 4 days we stayed we did not receive any room service. 2 out of 4 dash received fresh towels.   Cockroaches in stairwells, cigarette butts littered everywhere.   Staff was moderately friendly but made it feel like you were inconveniencing them by checking in/out. Had no apology/further explanation for us at check out when we mentioned lack of room service.   Won’t stay again. Not worth the money saved.
Manager Response: Dear Malloryjohn93,   We greatly appreciate your business in staying with us. We apologize for the issues you are bringing up. With that being said, it really lets us know how we are doing and also how we can improve. We understand you come here for vacations, whether if it is Disneyland or even just a night out with the family. We understand getting that effect from staff if not okay, and we truly apologize for that. Please trust me when I say I will let our staff know how we are doing. We hope in the near future you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves as changes should start being done to our property soon. Thank you once again and we accept our apology.

Summary: Rooms were awful. Bedding thin and scratchy. Air conditioning noisy. Felt like a room where you would stay if you were on the run vs a trip to Disneyland. Never stay again. I know $150 is considered affordable, but not worth the $150 for one night.
Manager Response: Thank you dear valued guest for your review. We will take this review and share with staff and management so we can show how we can improve since we do tend to strive in our customer service and  staff. We thank you for choosing to stay with us, have a wonderful day.

Summary: “Unacceptable” is the best way to describe this hotel, which was the word we heard in the lobby from another patron. We arrived with our two children at 2:30pm. We asked to check in and the woman at the front desk said the room wouldn’t be available until 3pm. We asked again at 2:50 as our kids were getting antsy after having been stuck in a car and there wasn’t much space in the lobby and it was dirty, and again the answer was 3pm. We used the bathrooms at the pool (we were told they were the only ones available), which we didn’t need a key for, and they were disgusting. They were filthy and it looked as though someone had used the restroom as a place to bathe and there was no soap. The lobby was also dirty and there were stains all over the furniture. By the time it was 3pm,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback Amy G. We understand your stay was not a happy one and we truly apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Unfortunately, being short staffed, we have to also experience this at the front desk when we make check-in time at 3:00 pm. We know it hurts our business and guests but we have it stated on the website when you book, that your guaranteed time is at 3:00 pm. We also understand you and your family can get a little antsy but there is a reason why we have policies as well. Thank you for bringing up the issues with the pool bathrooms, as we did get someone on top of that right away as another guest had the time to report it right away with no problem. We are aware the property is a little  older now and we have paused our renovations. We wonder if all your concerns were reported to the front desk so we could have addressed it right there and then to meet your expectations... Again, we apologize for the the issues you've experience and we invite you t come back int he future when changes are made to meet your high expectations. Thank you and we hope you have a great day!

Summary: Rooms and property run down.  Sheets and room smelled and we're not clean.  Bathroom run down and mold. Typical minimal continental breakfast. Room was large with a TV that was the size of a desktop monitor.  Laughable. Worth $50.  Charged $100.  We are cheap SOBs but I would not return and will not recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Curtis D,   We thank you enough for staying at our property. We understand your room was not up to your standards and we apologize for that. We always try and encourage guests, if they are not happy with your room, or if anything is wrong, to please report it and we can address it right away and or offer any other type of alternative option for them and their family. We thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope in the near future when changes and upgrades are made, we see you around so your stay can be more staying. Thank you.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. We had no problems when we arrived early and we're able to pre check in. The room was cozy and beds were comfortable. The front desk are professional and kind. That's why I rate excellent for all service.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We greatly appreciate your review and your time. We are happy that we were able to help for a pre-check in, and your room was nice and cozy. We try and strive in our customer service. I will definitely share this review with your staff as we let them know how we are doing and also how to improve. We thank you for staying with us. We hope to see you soon next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel was nice, check-in was quick but the appearance was kind of dated, could use some upgrades.  Clean up the elevator area and maybe some new paint.  Was nice that a restaurant is next door. Overall a decent place for the price.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking your time and making your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are glad that your stay was pleasant and the location worked out for your and your party. We are in the process of renovating step by step, and we appreciate your overall comments about the elevator and upgrades that are already taking in consideration. We hope next time you visit Anaheim, you can stay with us again. See you soon!

Summary: This place was a wreck!  FILTHY carpets, burn holes in bedding, ancient TV with broken remote, carpet nails protruding from the ancient carpet, disgusting pillows, loud/barely functioning air system, I shan’t continue.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We understood you were not happy with your room, and we did apologize for that at check out. Please also mention that you were being very confrontational with front desk and also said that somehow out of the 4 nights that you were here, you failed to report it or mention any issues you experienced. If we would have known about the situation before, we could have offered any other alternative options more convenient for you and your son. (Who you said you made bend down to the floor and touch the surroundings of the carpet to figure out if there was nails coming out from the border of the carpet connecting to the bathroom.) We did let you know if this was a big concern, then it should have been brought to our attention right away. As we were hearing you out, you seemed to get more angrier and agitated, and we were trying to comfort in anyway we could in response to your comments about your stay but Somehow you were very mad about something else because you started yelling and asking who was parked in front of the office in the red zone. We told you it was a guest who was in here printing their boarding pass. You kept saying it loud for the other guest to react to you, and we let you know that it was fine to park there if she was printing her passes and leaving. After we gave you the receipt, you kept saying things under your breath and walked out of the office.  We understand your frustration, and we are sorry for the issues you had.  we appreciate you staying with us.  Have a lovely day.

Summary: The staff was very friendly, and the location was very convenient; within walking distance to Disneyland. Check-in and out was a breeze. The rooms are pretty old, but that didn’t really bother me so much. It was perfectly acceptable for our trip to Disneyland. I did see a couple of bugs in my room over the course of my stay, however.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Colton Redwine,   We thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. We are sorry to hear you had some issues while you were staying with us. We sincerely apologize. We always try and encourage guests to report anything wrong with their room and issues encountered, so we can try and provide best alternative options, and or provide our best service. Unfortunately, we did not hear anything from your part at check out time, or during your stay. I do want to mention we do take big measures when it comes to reporting anything like this. We hope that this does not stop you from re-booking, and give us another chance down the road.   Regards, Front Desk Supervisor

Summary: Bathroom did not appear clean and updated. Mold showing on bathroom walls. Bathroom door did not close right. Toilet seat was scratched. Cockroaches in room. Something wrong with pipes as you can hear running water through the walls. Outside hotel looks nice , inside rooms not. For rooms near the streets, need sound proof windows.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Looks like your stay here with us was not a satisfying one and for that we do apologize for any inconvenience you had during your days here. We would have liked for these issues to be brought up while you were here so we could have offered any alternative options for you and your family. We are sorry to hear about them now. We do hope with in the future if you do decide to come back, we do invite back when these renovations have been done so we can have a second chance in serving you and your family. Again, we do thank you for choosing us and we hope to hear from you soon!

Summary: This hotel is in terrible conditions ,there is blood on the walls and on the bathrooms doors as well the carpet  was durty i wish i can submit pictures ,but i dont know how ,the overall of my review is that it was unacceptable to tay in this nasty and durty room i am still waiting for my refund
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We are happy that we were able to serve right away as you did not like the room and requested a refund. We approved it right away for you, and as stated when you checked out; It will take 3- 5 business for a refund to process back to your account. Thank you for have chosen us and we hope you can come back as we try to redeem ourselves.

Summary: It was a standard Travelodge room, okay walking distance to Disneyland, breakfast included waffles- usually you make them yourself, this location had a staff member making them. Nice breakfast room to sit and eat. Good sized parking lot. Clean enough for the cost.
Manager Response: Thank you dear valued guest,   We are happy to know that this location was great for you and your family. We hope to see you in the near future again. Thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day!

Summary: This hotel was disgusting and the service was awful! So rude! We were woken up at 7am by the cleaning crew that was blowing leaves right outside our door for hours. Would not recommend. The location is close to Disney and that is the only decent thing about it. The place was disgusting.
Manager Response: Dear Kaleykaplan,   We truly apologize for the inconvenience of the workers outside the property. We do want to mention that these workers are from the city of Anaheim, and we have talked to the city about this, but seems like nothing's being done. At this time, we have no control of how they schedule all their cleaning, on the side walks, bus stop, and street cleaning. As far as any other issue, we did not hear any reports from your room so we could have correct them any way we could, we are sad we didn't get this opportunity. WE hope in the near future we do get to hear from you. Thank you for your time.

Summary: The hotel is old and dingy. I was told that the hotel was under construction. I assumed that meant that it was being cleaned up and remodeled. When I arrived, I saw no sign of that. The staff was nice enough, the room smelled and the carpet was in very bad shape.
Manager Response: Dear Silvia K,   Thank you for much for taking your time to write your review. We understand that your expectations were not met and we do apologize for that. We are under renovations, however, being that we are in our busy season, we have paused any construction being made. So, as of now, we do not have any sign around since we will continue until further notice. We apologize for any misleading information, however, everything is posted online as you book for our property. We thank you for choosing to stay with us, we hope in the near future you can go ahead, and book again when all the renovations are done. Hope to see you soon!  Regards,   Front Desk Manager

Summary: There is no WiFi in many rooms, including ours. When we pointed this out the people at the front desk said we were the only ones with complaints. At the day of our check out there was a man with exactly the same complaint and they told him the same thing. Our bed was broken, because of this our Son (20 years) had to sleep on a bed which was way to small for him. Reason why I give them 2 stars is because they had nice waffles
Manager Response: We thank you for much for taking the time to write your feedback, in which, we appreciate. We are sorry to hear you had issues with the Wi-Fi. We are in the process of upgrading and we hope we get to do that with our property tech too. We are glad to hear that you liked our waffles, that were made for you from our breakfast attendant. We thank you for staying with us. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Sleep in your car in preference to staying here
Summary: disgraceful substandard, no amenities, paper thin old sheets that don't even fit the bed. Lamps with no globes. An old big box tv circa 1990, remote control held together (not) with black electrical tape. Breakfast was a few scraps of bread for toasting and sugar cereals of the cheapest possible kind. An attendant who barely speaks and just points at things. The whole place is so shabby that words can't describe it. One family walked into the breakfast room (whihc is just a guest room anyway) took one look and walked out. The room rate is disgraceful for the dreadful standard of this old dump.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you were not happy with the complimentary breakfast. Seems like you had some issues with your room, in which was not reported. We would have loved to gotten the opportunity to correct any issues you had during your stay to make your vacation time at ease. If you were not happy with your room, you could have reported it, so we could have offered any alternatives for you and your family. But it also seems you were upset at a breakfast attendant for not speaking?? I am not to sure why, but we will try and follow up with this situation so we can verify this wont happen again. We thank you for taking your time in writing your review. We hope you have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: There were roaches in our room, the lobby ect... We will never stay here again. When we told the staff they said sorry
Summary: There were roaches in our room, the lobby ect... We will never stay here again. When we told the staff they said sorry But did not seem to have any concern over it. I am very displeased we have stayed here before and not have this issue however this time we did. The ice machine was broken so we were directed to the office for ice where they seemed to annoyed to get it for us. Some of the woman in the office were just plain rude.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We truly do apologize for the issues you experienced. If you have any other concerns, please feel free to reach out to the property. We are sad to hear that you are displeased with your stay. It makes us feel like we have failed you on your stay. As for the Ice machine, it was going through our Weekly Maintenance schedule, and that is why we had offer ice here in the front desk. I know it could be an inconvenience but that is why we are here, so strive and try to provide better service, and if you did not get that, we do apologize. I will definitely share this review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and also how we can improve in anything else we need to. We thank you once again, and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Great price but I would rather pay more for a room I am comfortable sleeping in.    Everything was run down and looked horrible.  Dirty walls inside the room and a leaking toilet.  Very old, uncomfortable mattress   Breakfast options were instant oatmeal or cereal, sometimes they would have mini muffins and toast.  No gluten free for those of you sensitive to that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing your review. We understand the room was not up to your preferences. We would have liked to get know about the issues you were facing to offer any type of alternative options for your stay and make your stay a little better.  As far as breakfast, it is considered Continental, which are, the basics. It is not a hot, complete breakfast. So, there will be all the things mentioned in your review and much more. However, we do have gluten-free options. All you have to do is ask the breakfast attendant. We thank you for your time. We hope you have a lovely day!

Summary: Cleaning staff was very bad and GM was rude when she calls you.. our rooms were not clean and had a bad smell that did go away.. ice machine didn't work. When you ask if that had another one they tell you no and you can stay at a different hotel..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Sounds like your stay was not an enjoyable one and for that we apologize. As far as the ice machine, it was going through its weekly maintenance schedule, and that is why it was not available. Of course, we did offer ice at the front desk for your convenience and there was a sign on the machine just in case you wanted some.   Our front desk agents know better and we know for a fact we would not answer you and say GO TO ANOTHER HOTEL! We will definitely share this with our employees to follow up with this but again, we are 100% positive we would not say that. If you feel the need to talk about this please contact the property. Thank you for your time.

Summary: The rooms are not as advertised on web.  They are dirty moldy old rooms.  The owners are only doing the bare minimum to maintain the property but nothing to improve it.  Cheap gross room.  Your better off going with a competitor at least you get your money worth.  Stay away from this crap place
Manager Response: Dear ChristinamL1597ZL,  We want to thank you for staying with us. Seems there might have been a confusion during booking your room. As you book with us, you have to see that online it shows the pictures of renovated rooms. It also has an alert mentioning about that we are renovating and not all the rooms on property are renovated. So when you book, it will give you the option of Renovated or not renovated. If it doesn't give you the option, it just means its been booked already. We are sorry if the room was not up to your expectations, and we respect your preferences. Once again, we thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day.

Summary: If you don't book a "renovated room" your room will be absolutely disgusting. Stains on the walls, lampshades, you're literally stepping into a time machine back to the 90's. The pictures do not depict the room you're going to get...
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine67183493098,   We thank you for staying with us. We understand you had another room type preference and your expectations were not met, and for that we apologize. As far for as a renovated room, it is a higher price and you do have to book for that. If it is not available online for the days you are booking, then it just means we are sold out. For future reference, please check the fine print where it states that all rooms you see in the pictures, are from renovates rooms, and not all the rooms are renovated. Again, we thank you for choosing to stay with us, have a great day!

Summary: This motel's should be max $50 per night ,breakfast's area smelled  terrible .... could only stayed one night and moved out next morning, even my kids agreed with me...I ve paid extra $60 and enjoyed in Country INN by Raddison...  caught by photo and price,do not recommend to families... for singles and drunk is ok
Manager Response: Thank you Trip24643295699 for your review.  We are sad to hear that your trip was cut short for unexpected issues you experienced. We wished these issues were brought up to our attention before you left. We are happy to know that you were able to find other accommodations right away for you and your children. We thank you for staying with us, and we hope you have great day!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for years.  For me it used to be a convenient less expensive place to stay and clean enough.   With the new owner I no longer get the return guest discount that I used to get, so I don't stay here now unless it has one of the better prices on hotels.com or wyndham gives me.  For the money I at the discount rate it's is a place I like to stay, easy drive to the Disneyland parking garage, by restaurants and fast food places, and by the more inexpensive gas stations.  If the regular room rate was closer to what I used to get I would stay here more often.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are sorry not to honor your previous prices. With the new owner now, things have changed, and for the better. Change is bad sometimes, and sometimes its good. Unfortunately, with change, prices have gone high all over the area, especially with the Disneyland Resort. Of course, there is going to be times where the prices go down and go up, and you would have to take advantage of that. We hope in your next visit you stay with us and hope to see you soon. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here because your health might be at risk
Summary: I was told we were getting an upgraded room that have just been renovated, when we got in the room the carpet was dirty and black from all the dirt that I had accumulated, it smells like mold and wetness the ceilings had water damage the furniture was old and chipped not to include covered in dust, the bathroom sink header on the handles and soap scum, the toilet bowl had never been cleaned, the bathtub had black mold water damage was all around the table including the base of it had black mold on it. When I express my dissatisfaction to Jasmine the receptionist her answer was if you don't like it you can just leave.
Manager Response: Dear Roving45780857128,  We thank you for choosing to stay with us. Unfortunately, we did see you checked out too soon. When you came to check in- We can see that you were originally booked for a Deluxe Accessible Wheelchair room with a King Bed. Because we were currently overbooked we upgraded you to a Standard 2 Queen Beds / Non-Smoking with no extra fee. You kept showing your phone to our front desk agent arguing about getting a Renovated room, because your booking said: Deluxe Accessible Wheelchair room, that does not mean its Renovated. That was what our front desk agent kindly kept trying to explain to you. After we checked you in, you called immediately and started arguing with the front desk agent, again, but this time about details and cosmetic issues that the room seemed to have. The agent told you we couldn't move you to another room since we were sold out and it seem that you were not happy with your room ma'am, and we could not accommodate you as you felt the room was not up to your preference, but we would be able to refund your money. We had apologized for that, and you hung up the phone on us. You called booking.com about your reservation- and an Agent called and argued if we had a renovated room to move you to, and we had to update booking.com agent about the situation, and we also mentioned that you were not happy, we would be able to refund you the money. May I remind you, as Ms. Jasmine was checking our  guests in, and had a line, you came in shouting for explanations as to why the quality of the room was so "nasty". Our front desk agent, explained to you that the property was not up to your standards that she was willing to give you a full refund. As you are shouting in front of other guests, and going back and forth, she was trying to process your refund, you kept insisting that how can she do that to you, and not move you to a renovated room. You also failed to mentioned that you confronted our front desk agent and let her know that she was dumb, that she needed a dictionary, and that she was there to address anything you had to say. That she needed a new job because you had trained a thousands of hers. I failed to almost mention that you left a lovely note for our management team, for not "honoring" a "renovated" room which you never booked for.  Thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Don't do it. Save yourself the trouble
Summary: Dirty room, partying people outside along with screaming kids in the parking lot since 6:45am. I called down to the office and no answer too tell them to quiet the kids down. They were playing streetball in the parking lot. It looked to be about 2 dozen kids that were outside screaming and playing. NOT okay that early on a weekday. I asked the front desk if they saw the kids and they said they did but they didn't quiet down. WTF?? LOL That's your JOB! Don't feel safe here. Won't come back.
Manager Response: Dear TravelAgenTLV,   Thank you so much for staying with us. I know you were excited as you checked in, when you mentioned that 3 more nights and you would become a Diamond member for Wyndham. We congratulated you and checked you in. As we recall, you came in to the front desk about 11:00 am the next morning to let us know that you were going to do a 12 o'clock check out. You mentioned that there was a lot of kids outside yelling and screaming. You said it was around 6:45 am. May I remind you that the front desk told you that we were here at that time and there was no kids at the parking lot at that exact time. Then you said that they were outside 2 hours later after that. We mentioned that early in the morning there wasn't kids outside in the parking lot. It was around 9:00 am or 10:00 am that they could have been out there. When it comes to groups like that, we don't have the control over that, especially if they are outside the rooms/property, ma'am. You mentioned you called early in the morning, and said that no one answered. We kept asking you, at what time because we had been there since the morning and we had been answering all the calls coming in. We would like to mention that we have all calls coming in recorded and tracked, and we don't have any calls from the room you stayed in. We have groups around the world that stay here and also kids who have teams playing in the Anaheim Convention Center. Because of our location, you will find families who are here for Disneyland and/or the Convention Center. We apologized for the inconvenience. You were pretty clear as you were stepping out of the office, said that you were not going to come back because of that, and you had about 100k followers and you were definitely going to let them know about your experience since you were a travel agent. Again, we do apologize for that experience, but this location is exterior and, again, we have a lot of families staying here. We respect your decision of not coming back, we thank you for staying.

Summary: With health concerns increasing daily and acceptable expectations for a resort community (especially Disney), you don’t expect to find moldy bathrooms and missing amenities, not to mention the iron melted carpeting, no hair dryer or even an Alarm Clock!  Needless to say, we won’t be going back to the Anaheim TraveLodge...

I cannot believe that this hotel is this run down. It is in desperate need of a facelift. If staying here, be prepared for a lower than Motel 6 standard. Although this hotel is owned by Wyndham, they need to invest to bring travel lodge back to a somewhat reasonable standard.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We thank you for your time in writing your review. We are aware of the rooms not being up to date with the furniture. We are in the process of renovations, though, we have paused our construction due to our busy season which is summer. We understand your concern, we are absolutely aware and we will try our best to get things going . We thank you for staying with us.

Summary: 5 stars for the customer service provided by Jasmine. Outdated furniture can be overlooked. Cleanliness can not. There's no sense of pride that shows in the way this property is being kept. No one cares about the guest experience. It's disappointing and sad to see. There's no excuse for smudges on the wall, unidentifiable marks or stains on the headboard and carpets, and buildup in the toilet bowl. There's no sense of respect or dignity for the people who pay to stay here. Does staying at Travelodge have to mean dirty and brokewdown? Well, that's how the rooms are presented. It's completely and utterly demoralizing for people; especially when families save their money to go on vacation. People have different socioeconomic backgrounds and affordable doesn't have to be like this.
Manager Response: Dear Ktajones,   We understand your frustration when it came to the room not being up to your standards, and not being updated. We truly understand your concern, unfortunately, we have paused our work for renovations because of our busy season and we cannot stay close for future reservations already made. There is a sign of respect and dignity when all our staff keeps doing their job, making sure all requests are made, and meeting guest's expectations, but sadly, we could not get to do all rooms in time for our busy season which is summer. I hope that the issues you've experienced were reported to the front desk to make your stay a little more at ease. We try and make everyone's stay a little more better with the service we try to provide, since we do tend to strive for 'an excellent customer service. (Since you've mentioned Jasmine.) I will definitely, share this review with our staff, let them know how we are doing and how we can also improve. I do apologize for the issues you've mentioned and I hope in the future when renovations are done, you can stay with us once again.

Summary Heading: Not the worst place I’ve ever been but wouldn’t go back
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights in May. The room was big and had 2 double beds which was nice but the room was very dim - terrible lighting. The first night I showered and the plug was clogged so I was up to my ankles in dirty water. The shower had no power in it so took about 100 years to wash your shampoo off. The first night my partner had a bug on his pillow and then we were itching for the next 2 days in paranoia. A lady cooked waffles for breakfast but that was basically your lot as the choice was very minimal. Good points- was really close to Disney so easy to walk there about 20 mins. And one of the men who worked on reception was really friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear 298rachelj,  First we like to thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are terribly sorry for the issues you've experienced.  We try and encourage all guest that are not happy with their room to please call or report to the front desk. Front desk is open 24 hours. Front desk is trained to provide you alternative options for your convenience. We are sorry about that. As for breakfast, it is a continental breakfast and its complimentary. You'll find, Muffins, cereal, oatmeal, muffins, danishes, yogurt, fruit, and waffles made from our breakfast attendants. I will definitely share this with our team to let them know how they are doing and also how we can improve. Once again, we thank you and will be in hopes to see you next time in Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights while at Disney. We found it clean, and bed comfortable. Had all amenities we needed, soaps, coffee maker, hair drier, tv.  Breakfast was plenty and nice, and the lovely lady made us delicious waffles.  Pool was nice and spa was perfect after long day on our feet.  Very close to walk to Disney, only a couple of blocks. Or there is a cheap shuttle. Also close to plenty of shops and restaurants. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We thank you for such a lovely review. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location to be very convenient for you and your vacations. You are right. There is a shuttle that picks up at the bus stop which is right outside of our hotel and its called ART. (Anaheim Resort Transit) They'll take you to Disneyland a drop of you off at the Main Gate. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: From the moment we checked in and saw the room we were stunned.  The room was old, filthy and in bad need of repair.  The curtains looked like a tiger had got at them with its claws.  The carpet was filthy and had  two iron stains burned into it and other unrecognisable stains also.  It smelled bad and 4 times out of our stay we did not have the room serviced.  The shower took approx.. 30 mins to heat up.  The safe didnt work, although I still would not feel safe leaving anything in it.  The one lift smelled like cat piss and I avoided the breakfast area.  I wasnt that brave.  Unfortunately I got ill during my stay here so overall it was an unbelievably bad holiday. I traveled from Ireland for a two week stay and I couldnt walk away to stay somewhere else.  I couldnt believe
Manager Response: Dear Siachain A,   We are awfully sorry for the experience you had in our property. We truly understand that you were unhappy with the conditions of the room. Seems like the website you booked was correct and we are renovating step by step. We do not want to close our business since we are in our busy season. Also, if the 3rd party website you booked your reservation only posted the pictures of the renovated rooms, I do apologize for the confusion. I know for a fact that it should say in the fine print that the pictures shown- should be from the renovated rooms. It does show the pictures of the standard rooms as well. Again, we apologize for any inconveniences you experienced and we do invite you back when the renovations are done for you to enjoy your vacations. Thank you for staying with us. Have a lovely day!
