Summary: the hotel was a 5 min drive from disneyland which was great. when i got to my room the door was already opened.... with no one inside. the bed had stains on it which was pretty gross. the room overall looked old and tried to put new furniture inside but didnt reallly make a difference. the microwave was broken and the toilet clogged easily. i just felt super dirty just walking on the floor.
Manager Response: Dear Courtney W,   We thank you for taking your time in writing this review and also for staying with us. I do want to mention that we have paused our renovation projects but we are in planning to have the place renovated. We do apologize for the room not being up to your standards. We would have hoped that you could have reported these issues so it would have given our staff an opportunity to address the situation immediately. We are sorry you felt that way about your room and we do truly apologize. We thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: I wouldn't stay here again, the whole family was very disapointed. Kids were hungry, beds and pillows were very uncomfor
Summary: I wouldn't stay here again,  breakfast was not good, except for the coffee, we had to go out for breakfast.  The beds and pillows were very very uncomfortable. I couldn't believe I had to pay in full at check in,  unbelievable.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanette A,   We are terribly sorry for the experience you had in our property. We don't have any notes or alerts on anything being reported during your stay. We would have liked it if we could have made something different to make your stay enjoyable here. Breakfast in just a simply continental, it is not a hot or complete breakfast. Also, as part of our policy you do have to pay in full at check in. We apologize if that was an inconvenience for you, it is also stated on our website. We thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We asked for three rooms and unfortunately all of them were old...our room didn’t have a fridge and the TV of other room was not working. the breakfast room was clean and even though the woman was friendly it was terrible that the toast didn’t work well, just 1 waffle machine and also the three days that we he breakfast it was difficult to get a yoghurt...   My sincere opinion is that they should make a room renovation and improve the breakfast service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sad to hear your TV wasn't working for one of the rooms. I wish that was reported right away so we can address those issues immediately. We are aware that some of the appliances in the breakfast room were running short, however, we took the initiative and took care of that and we have more appliances, so we do apologize for that. Moreover, we will be running renovations soon, we just don't have a set date for that. When we do, I hope you can book with us again, to experience the new and improve property. Again we do apologize and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Most reviews online had many complaints but the hotel seemed very average. Nice people, clean rooms, and great price. Close to food, gas stations  and bus stops. Great for families and good parking. Don't believe everything you read online.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   We are happy to know that your stay with us was a satisfying one. We are glad to know that your expectations were met, and our staff is doing the best we can to strive and give the guest an excellent customer service. We hope to see you soon! Thank you for staying with us have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: This property doesn't care if they inconvenience you.
Summary: I checked in on March 4 for a 6 night stay. I stayed here last year for Expo West and I like the property, the staff and how close it is to the Anaheim Convention Center.  This is a Business Trip and not a vacation.  I checked into Room 117 mid afternoon, spent hours unpacking and setting up my room and food for the week.  I am disabled and have food sensitivities and have to bring my own food wherever I go. I went to sleep 11:30 pm for an early morning education day at Expo West. At 1 AM I heard a constant drip drip drip coming through the earplugs I had in to sleep. I went into the bathroom and the whole bathroom was soaked with water coming from the ceiling!!! I called the front desk, notified them, they said I would probably have to move rooms.  I started packing everything
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you so much for your feedback. Indeed, we can say that we were having an issue with the plumbing and we had to move your room and the room above you just in case anything can get worse. We are looking out for the safety of the guests' after all. Front desk did speak to you and let you know that because there was only 1 person on duty that we cannot help you at that time. However, we did mention that we can move you rooms to something on the first floor, because you repeatedly kept telling us you were disabled. We understood that and we gave you keys to another room on the first floor. We did speak to you and told you that we did have staff coming in around 8:15 am and that would be the time we can help. You did move your things, and we did move the mini-fridge to the new room with your food in there, the next day. We also mentioned and said that you can sleep in the other room and leave your bags in that old room, so you can get them the next day when our staff would be around and you declined. The pipe was already taken care of by that time, and your belongings would not get wet in any way. When we talked to you about compensation - You kept mentioning about free nights for you to come back and stay with us. We agreed that there was an inconvenience, but things that are much more bigger than that we don't have control over, and we did offer you a 30% off for that night. You were not happy with that and insisted on free nights - and per conversation we settled on 40% off that night. The rest of your nights, we did not hear from you or your stay anymore.  As of today, we have not hear from you for the refund that was processed back to your account. If you still don't see it, please contact the property. Thank you for your review once again, we do apologize for the incident that was out of our hands.

Summary: While this hotel is outdated, it is in a great location for (of course) Disneyland, but also the Honda Centre.  It's also pretty loud because there are so many families staying there due to the proximity to Disneyand.  The pool was closed (I guess it was March...) and the pool area is teeny tiny. They also don't allow alcoholic beverages, which cut down on outside time to enjoy a cold beverage.  As the hotel has an outdoor walkway, there is no outdoor space. In order to hang out outside (with a beverage, as we did), the best thing was to bring out some chairs from the room and sit on the walkway, enjoying the beautiful weather.  While the hotel is old and outdated, it's still livable - for a short period of time. However, I'm pretty sure they can afford renovations, given the
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for your review. We are glad that Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center was something on your budget and that can work out for you, and your party. I know it can get loud because of the other families staying here, who wouldn't be if you are going to Disneyland right?  I know you mention the pool not being available to have alcoholic drinks - Needless to say, we are a family hotel and we wouldn't want someone to get hurt with glass bottles, or kids, families, etc. We are only looking for everyone's safety, that is all. Thus, our hotel has an exterior design since the 1970's there isn't much space on the outside, we do have pool are and benches outside the front lobby.   We understand your concern on our room not being renovated, we will start soon, we just don't have the exact dates when, so we do apologize. We hope in the near future you'll be able to stay with us again. Thank you.

Summary: It was a great place for what I paid . But if you paid full priced probably woulsnt be worth it . I loved how close it was to Disneyland . It was a great distance would recommend for my price the people were nice also .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest -   We are glad to know that this location worked out or your stay. We are happy to know your days here were satisfying and we hope that you will perhaps return soon? We do thank you for staying with us and we will definitely share this review with our staff to let them know how we are doing and how we can improve. Thank you once again.

Summary: The only positive about this place was that it was nearby to the Anaheim Convention Center (a slight walk, but not bad). The room provided was very dirty with a large visible leak in one of the corners of the ceiling. There were noticeable hairs around the room that implied that it must not have been cleaned before my stay. Furthermore, my room was situated on the street side. The room had windows that provided little to no sound reduction. Should I stay in Anaheim again, I will look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Bradreview,   Thank you so much for booking with us and choosing to stay here. We are extremely sad and sorry to hear that you wont be return here. Seems like we have failed to serve you and we truly apologize. We will definately share this review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and also how to improve. We do thank you once again for staying with us and we hope if you change your mind, we hope you can give us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: This room was never updated (except for the mildew/water damaged baseboards they painted over). Damage throughout. The only good point was a comfortable bed/pillow. The ice machine didn’t work, the breakfast is all carbs, the wifi never worked. The room air conditioner did not have a thermostat control so you’re either cold or hot. And the smoke detector was covered in plastic?!? WTH
Manager Response: Dear Values Guest,   We thank you so much for staying with us. We are horribly sorry for the experience you had during your stay with us. We do not recall getting any reports from the room you were in to address the issues you are explaining to us now. We do apologize for the rooms not being up to your standards. I do want to mention that the ice machine was having some hiccups but we did have ice in the front desk we did have signs up in the property. Breakfast is complimentary so we are sorry if it was not something of your preference. I will definitely follow up with our staff, share this review with them to let them know how they are doing and also how we can improve. Again, we do apologize and we thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The checkin and checkout was smooth. The room was clean but the door wouldn’t open for us. We had to try four times to make it open. The TVs are old and the bedding needs to be updated. Over clean and price was good. Parking wasn’t bad besides people not parking in spots. Outside of building was nice and clean.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback. It is important for us to know how we are doing and also what we can do to make our guest have an enjoyable and gratifying experience here with us. We are happy to know that your stay was a satisfying one and we hope that in the near future we get to see you again. Again, we thank you..

Summary: The only good thing about this hotel is the location, and free parking. I do not recommend this room for a long stay. Stay somewhere else if you are staying more then one day.  Property does have security as well.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are glad to hear that this hotel was a location convenient for your stay. We are happy to say that we do have free parking and that there is nightly security on our grounds. We are happy that you had a fulfilling stay with us and hope you stay with us again when you visit Anaheim. Thank you and have a great day!

Summary Heading: 14 Days and all was very good.
Summary: Location was within walking distance. Room was clean, people were very helpful and friendly. We stayed for 14 days and would stay again. Check in and check out was very efficient. We had a fridge and microwave which was very helpful. Thanks

It was ok it was not what I expected I probably will not stay again.  My room was missing a hair dryer and the ice machine was making lots of noise. Customer service was good. I probably expected more for the area.

I've stayed at this hotel previously and it was great. Thought I would try it again since it was remodeled and the rooms look nice in the pictures. The room was not as pictured they have the newly remodeled rooms pictures but that's not what we got. The room was clean but none of the outlets worked to be able to charge your phone. The light from the sink bathroom wouldn't turn on right away, had to jiggle the switch a few time for it to turn on. Also, there was termites in that light fixture. The food was good. Would stay there again but will ask for a better room.

This place is showing its age but is in pretty good condition and a good price/value for what you get.  It was noisy in the morning very early with people getting ready to go to Disney.  People standing outside the rooms and kids being rather noisy.  Not good if you plan to sleep past 7 a.m..  Check In/out were very friendly and helpful.  I would stay there again all things considered.

Dilapidated property needing much work.  Missing appliances and furniture in rooms, patch jobs on guestroom walls, furniture worn and out of date.  Internet didn't work for our phones or computer, TV remote was difficult to use.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your honest feedback about your recent visit. We understand that your recent stay was not a satisfying one, and it seems that we have failed. We care of our guests and the service we provide. We do apologize for the amenities you said you didn't have in your room. I do want to mention that we have a front desk office open 24 hours and we do what we can to provide what the guest needs and needs immediate attention. We would have desired for these issues to have been reported right away to take immediate action. Again, we do apologize if this was an inconvenience to you, and we hope to see you in the near future. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Everything here was meh. The decor is very outdated as well as the bedding. My pillow was beyond lumpy, felt like I was sleeping on a bag of cotton balls from the store. The location is great though, in a very nice area with alot of food and activies arounds. It would be great if they just updated the place a little bit.

It was disgustingly dirty!  The carpets are behind fourth filthy and it smells bad! Pictures are deceiving! We traveled all day and had little kids not so easy to pick up and go.  Very disappointed! I was in tears!

Summary Heading: Cheap in all aspect, but safe.
Summary: Rooms has old closed room smell. Curtains were torned. AC unit is very old unfriendly noisy. AC air blows curtains constantly. Hot water after 5 minutes. Location is safe. Breakfast is average better than no breakfast. No fresh fruits.
Manager Response: We apologize that your experience was anything less than satisfying.  Our goal is to not only meet the needs of each and every guest we serve, but to exceed your expectations to make your stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible.  Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us.  Feedback such as yours assists us in improving our service and property on a daily basis.  In addition, please know that your comments and issues will be addressed.  It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you.  Again, I apologize for the inconvenience during your stay.  Thank you.

Summary: Dirty room, mold in bathroom, cigarette burns on bedding, breakfast had no fruit, (but had waffles and you can’t mess that up), door wouldn’t open without force. it was a good stay as far as close to Disney and food places but worth it to spend the extra $50 and go to somewhere that is more clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are sad to hear that your experience here was not a satisfying one. We would have wished these issues you experienced, were reported right away so we could have offered any alternative options for your convenience. Again, we do apologize and we hope this does not stop you from coming back. We thank you and we hope you have a lovely day!

Summary: We stayed here 1 night before checking into our timeshare. Rooms are clean. Nothing fancy. A few cosmetic issues with the room and furniture outdated. Breakfast is coffee juice and muffins. They have a pool that we didn't use. Just ok but fine if you are only looking for a place to sleep and nothing else. Vending machine was broken. Dennys next door which made it convenient for meals.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we greatly appreciate it. We are happy to know that this property was a good location for you since Denny's was right next to your convenience. We apologize for the inconvenience about the vending machine. We do have all of them working now. So I apologize for the issues you experienced. We thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Cannot charge any of your devices at this hotel.
Summary: Non of our plugs would stay in the outlets.  They were all so loose we could not charge our phones, I had to plug them into the car .  Our blow dryer would not work.  The bed was so old it was lumpy and so uncomfortable.  Worst hotel I have ever stayed at.  Also there was mold in the shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We deeply apologize for the room not being up to your expectations. We do suggest for any inconveniences that you experience for future references, please report to the front desk as soon as you can so we can get the chance to help or even offer any type of alternatives for your convenience. We would have loved the opportunity to help or even given the chance to do it. Again, we do apologize for the inconveniences this may have caused. We thank you for staying with us. Have a lovely day!

Summary: Good hotel within a 20 minute walk to Downtown Disney and Disneyland. Makes for a good launching pad for a Disney Holiday.   The hotel is managed by Wyndham which is what attracted me to it but it still a basic hotel. It is however clean and in a good location. The room we had was large with 2 Queen beds and a basic bathroom. There was a minifridge nd microwave which made the room easy to use.  The rooms were a bit noisey at night with car traffic and people returning from thier day out but overall it is a clean basic hotel. The room included wifi and free breakfast, the wifi worked but was a bit slow which is expected in a hotel wifi. The breakfast was bread and cereral and a staff that made waffels. Not my personal prefernce but others may like it.   I would come back again,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate your time in writing your review. We are happy to know that this location was good for you, and that the room was a satisfaction to your expectations. We do apologize on our WI-FI not being at your accommodation, however, we are looking to upgrade anytime soon, so again, we apologize. We thank you for staying with us and we hope that we see you and your guest soon! Have a great day!

Summary: Needs a upgrade. Convenient to disney.great staff.free breakfast. Restuarants close by. Shuttle to disney close by. Parking is great but needs a good cleaning in and out need to fix laundry problem and plumbing for toilets.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate it. We are happy to know that your stay was great but there were issues you experienced with the laundry and plumbing. We are aware about updating, however, we might just start upgrading soon. As for the laundry facility, I know it might have been closed during your stay, again, we are trying to upgrade this place, so we are sorry if it wasn't available for you but I am happy to say its open now. Moreover, I'm glad that this place was convenient to you for your trip to Disneyland. We hope in the near future we see you again! Thank you for staying with us, have a great day!

Summary: We paid $300 Australian dollars for one night in this hotel as our travel plans were brought forward and no availability in our other hotel.   The carpet was disgusting and the room smelled. The furniture is antiquated and uncomfortable. There was only one air conditioning unit for the entire family room. The aircon was very noisy. The free breakfast essentially comprises toast and tea which was adequate. Parking is typical motel style in front of your room. Pool furniture was rusty. Other residents of the motel were noisy and intoxicated which after a 13 hour flight added to the overall poor experience at this hotel.   On a positive note reception was very friendly and allowed storage of our luggage until the room was available some hours after our arrival.   There are better
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are terribly sorry that your stay wasn't a great one. Seems like we have failed that you were not happy with your room. We would have wished these issues were reported to the front desk right away so we could have offered alternative options for you and your family. It is always nice to know about any inconvenience, so we could have the opportunity to correct the situation for your stay. Again, we are terribly sorry. As for the other guests in the hotel, we cannot control any situation out of our hands, and as long as everything is okay on their part, and nothings out of control we cannot intervene so I am sorry about that. We thank you for staying with us.

Summary: it was a good location.  Near the parking lot of disney.  The beds were hard, there was little or no water pressure,  hot water took forever to start, fan in bathroom did not work, and there was no key for the safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we greatly appreciate it. That helps us to know how we are doing and as well as how we can also improve. We are happy to know that the hotel was in a good location for your stay and near the parking of Disney. We apologize for the issues you've experienced. We would have wished that these issues were reported with the front desk to help your stay to be better. Also, I would like to mention that the key for the safe, we do hold them at the front desk for any security issues. We are sorry for the miscommunication. We thank you for staying with us and I hope that this doesn't  stop you from staying with us again. We would like to see you and your guests here again. Thank you once again, and have a lovely day!

Summary: Our room was covered in black mold (you could smell a stench in room) and especially in bathroom . There was black mold in the fridge as well.. we also had roaches and they didn’t even changeOur bedding .. this was by far the worst stay I’ve ever experienced, I would never ever ever ever go back .
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry that you were not happy with your stay. For future references, anything you are not happy about, please report to the front desk so it can get addressed immediately, instead of waiting at your check out time and keep on experiencing not a good stay with the issue; or waiting until to making a review. We are sad that we could not get an opportunity to help in any way or correct the situation. Again, we apologize for the issues you had, and we are not happy that you won't be coming back, however, we respect it in anyway. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

Summary: We booked this vacation and were set to go until someone we know said to check out the reviews.  So we called and asked if there were refrigerators in the rooms we had three rooms and members of our family are diabetic we were told that some rooms do but not guaranteed.  Per the reviews we read the rooms are not what the pictures online show they have a few that are renewed but are more expensive do the on line lies. We changed to another hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Unfortunately we cannot control what is posted from the 3rd party on the websites. However, we always try and encourage all guest to read the fine print as well, because there are pictures from the standards rooms we have, as well as the rooms that are fully renovated. Renovated rooms and suites are always a higher price than the standard rooms. Thank you for mentioning about the amenities of mini-fridges and microwaves; those are upon requests. Moreover, making a request does not mean you are guaranteed you'll get one, it means that if they are available the time you check in, we can go ahead and accommodate you with them, since not all rooms have them. We are sorry to hear that you changed hotels without giving us a chance to prove ourselves. We thank you and we hope you and your family have a wonderful vacation.

Summary: The hotel is at a good distance from the Disneyland park and the convention center, however that is all it has going for it. Everything is outdated, vending machines are broken, no mini fridge and breakfast is contained to reduce their roach problem, carpet in rooms is musty and showers leave you feeling more dirty than when you went in. Trust me. Pay the additional 10-20 dollars for another location near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that your time here wasn't an enjoyable one. Seems we have failed in some way. Unfortunately, we are still in the process of renovating and so not all rooms have been renovated. We have vending machines here on property and have been tested so I am not sure when you say that they are broken... Also, I do want to mention that all mini-fridges and microwaves are upon request since not all rooms have them. It is posted online for your convenience to call make a request. If you make a request on the day of your check in and it is available then we can go ahead and accommodate you. I am sorry about that. As for the issues you experienced in the room, we wished you could have reported it to help you and provide any other alternative options for your convenience. We are sorry and apologize once more for the troubles this has caused, and in hopes this didn't interrupt your vacation. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: The staff was friendly, and the location was good. But the room was in poor condition, with stained dirty paint and dated appearance. The exhaust fan didn't work in the bathroom, caulking was in bad shape. The Breakfast was a joke! The bedding seemed clean enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback we greatly appreciate your time in writing this review. We are sorry the room was not up to your expectations. We do wish anything that you were not happy about, was reported to the front desk. Thank you for staying with us, and hopes that you can come back in the near future. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary: I've stayed at low budget hotels before but this one was borderline transient living. Random sticky substance near alarm clock, ripped drapes, wallpaper coming off the walls, random globs of who knows what on the walls. I think you have to pay for the safe? We didn't even have housekeeping come in because it just didn't seem trustworthy at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your time. We are sorry that you felt that you weren't safe. We do have security on property and our offices are open 24 hours if you needed anything. If your room was not up to your standards, we apologzie for that. We would have wished that you would have reported anything in your room that was an issue for you. We hope that this does not stop you from coming again, we thank you and again, we apologize for any inconvenience.

Summary Heading: If you don’t expect much this is your hotel.
Summary: I got a cheap rate, for it being so close to Disney, and I got what I paid for. The room was not renovated and looked worse for wear. It was clean though. The AC didn’t work but maintenance had it fixed within 10 min of calling it in. Front desk help was nice. Parking is terrible- it’s free but it’s a joke getting a spot when you get back from Disney or DCA at 10pm-Midnight.... The street side can be noisy first thing in the morning. The continental breakfast was Cornflakes or Raisin Bran, and a waffle maker you had to work yourself; coffee or milk. I couldn’t find the elevator so I had to walk my luggage up a flight. The bathroom light was louder than a Mac Truck so don’t keep it on for long. The Kleenex box dispenser broke when my niece tried to take a Kleenex out. There was a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your time in writing this review. We apologize for the room not being up to your standards. We are glad that you called about your A/C not working properly and that Maintenance was there in a jiffy to fix it for you. We hope that in the near future you can come and stay with us when all changed are made. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

Summary: We would never stay here again! Exterior is so dirty!  Piles of cigarette butts at bottom of stairs. Room was very shabby with unfilled holes in walls, broken bathroom vanity fixture, hot water from cold bathroom faucet, patched bathroom tile, doors with peeling paint, broken bathroom fan, huge water stains on ceiling and dirty carpets! Third horrible experience with a Wyndham property!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear your experience was not a satisfying one. We do wish this was reported to front desk so we could have taken care of the issues you had experienced. We do apologize for the inconvenience you had and hope you can stay with us in the near future. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights to go to Disney Parks. $70/ night price was reasonable for the area. Three block walk to Disney saves the cost of Disney Parking ($20). Bed and pillows were comfortable. Sheets were stained though. Bathtub/shower was extremely shabby with peeling paint, open screw holes and chipped tiles. Water pressure was good and water temperature was ok, except for the occasional cool dip when someone flushed a toilet somewhere presumably. Included breakfast was not very varied. Had cereal and a couple of kinds of pastries/muffins and a server would make you a fresh waffle.  Had coffee and apple and orange juice (I believe). No fruit and no yogurt (in California?!)  It did the job for me and I would probably stay here again when needing budget accommodations.   Double
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your time. We thank you for staying with us and we do apologize for the glitch in the system. As we spoke, we did let you know that we did update our system, and unfortunately because of the glitch in the system, you were charged, however, we did let you know that we would reverse the charge and it would take 3-5 business days. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience and hope in the near future you would be able to stay with us again. We thank you.

Summary Heading: This worked for a place to sleep
Summary: Stayed here for a convention event and also went to the parks. Accommodations were wonderful. Staff was wonderful.  2 negatives:  Toilet kept clogging.  Breakfast selection left a lot to be desired. Cereal, toast and waffles that stunk when made.Some fruit would have been nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that everything worked out for you. We do apologize for the issue you encountered with the toilet, however, we were glad that our staff was right on it and took care of everything for you. As for the breakfast selections, we are sorry if that day we were short on any items, as we do put out as many as we can until we run out. We thank you and hope in the near future you can stay with us again. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Very bad place! The first day the shower was clogged the next day the fixed it but they didn’t clean up afterwards. When we asked the front desk the move us from room all they said ess they could only lend us another bathroom so we could take a shower. They didnt fix it correctly it was still clogged and they charged us both nights.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we apologize for the issue you had. Because of the days of your stay, we were booked out that night, however, since there were some cancellations, we were able to find another room type room that was available for you and your family to shower. We do apologize for the bathroom condition after they fixed it. I will definitely share this review with our staff so that way they'll know how they are doing and also how we can improve. Please accept my deepest sincere apology. Thank you for staying with us. Have a good day!

Summary: The rooms are hit and miss but they are good enough for a convenient place to stay at a great price.  For those who are going to Disneyland it is a block from the Toy Story parking where you can hitch a ride on the bus to Disneyland.  It's near Walgreens (I stop here for snacks) and shares a corner with a Denny's.  If you decide to walk to Disneyland it is only about a 1.5 mile walk.  It isn't bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response, we greatly appreciate it. We are glad that the location was a great convenience for you and your family. This  property is like 20-25 minutes walking distance from Disneyland. Or you can also catch the ART shuttle that has a bus stop right outside our hotel. You can buy the shuttle tickets right next door at the Denny's Restaurant. They vary between $2.00-$5.50 depending on the ticket you would like. We thank you for staying with us have a lovely day!

Summary: disgusting. dirty, breakfast was all gluten crap. will never stay there again nor any other travelodge.  dirty outside, garbage in the parking lot didn't sleep all night because I was afraid someone might break in.  there was a gap between the door and the frame. all sorts of critters might  have come in during the night. Yuck disgusting scary.
Manager Response: Thank you for review. For future reference, if you are not happy with your room please report it to the front desk. These things could have been avoided if given the chance to correct/fix the issues you were experiencing with. We are sorry that your experience with us was not a happy one, again, we apologize and hope that this does not stop you from coming to stay with us again, and have us redeem ourselves. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: The employees are great, helpful and kind. The guy who checked us in was so kind to us, we had a giant spider in our room above a bed and he was so kind as to get rid of it for us. We couldn't sleep with it in the room. The place is clean, but needs updating.

The bathroom and walls of the room is very old. Every time we take a shower, a piece of the wall falls off. The towels are so thin and stained; we feel disgusted!! The pillows are not fluffy and lumpy. It is very difficult to get a good night sleep. This hotel is in need of a remodel. The staff is very nice, which makes this hotel a little bit more tolerable. This hotel is definitely not worth the price! I wold definitely not come back again!

I would NEVER stay at this establishment again.  It was my son's 18th birthday trip to Disneyland.  We walked in to a moldy smelling, bed bug ridden room.  We were moved to a different room on the same floor.  The rooms were not very clean and neither was the bathroom.  The floors were stained and gross and the walls were marked up.  What they tried to pass off as breakfast was more like powdered eggs and white toast.

Problem with service as door didn't shut all the way. It was reported and maintainence didn't fix nor was I moved to another room. The price was extremely high. The room looks nothing like it was advertised

We've stayed here several times, it's an easy walk to the park, and the hotel overall for the price is great. We will stay here again, Our room was not updated like the previous rooms we've stayed in, but was fine for sleeping

Me and my boyfriend came from Canada and it was our first time  to visit LA. We stayed in this Hotel for 4 nights. It’s a typical motel. I didnt expect that much so i wasnt disappointed with the room. I called front desk days before my arrival to make sure we have fridge and microwave in the room since i read in some reviews that you have to call to inform you need them. So when we arrive i was kinda exhausted from our travel. Check in was fast then after 10 mins the front desk called me and said i left my backpack in there. And it has all my valuable items. It was so nice of her. I forgot her to get her name . She’s a Mexican i guess. She is the best ever. And i also forgot my wallet during my check in and she ran towards us while walking to our room. She’s is the best! Ever!

This hotel is one of the worst experience I have had the staff is very rude not friendly at all they don't even great you when you come in the door. The restroom by pool is gross and soap container is filled with water and not clean just gross. Very horrible experience with staff and manager no customer service skills at all

Summary Heading: ROOMS ARE DISGUSTING AND STAFF DOES NOT CARE!
Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE! Rooms are disgusting. Paint peeling off the walls, carpet smells like something died, YELLOW AND GREEN stains on the bedsheets, bathroom looked like it has never seen bleach or any other cleaning product. When I told staff they told me “all the rooms are like that.” EW!

Checked in to our room at 7pm, the door was wide open and the beds were not made.  Front desk moved us to another room.  The next morning our ceiling started leaking.  When we went to the front desk, they said they knew about but did not call or tell us that the floors above us were flooding and leaking down.  They moved us to another room but we got no apology or anything.  2 room changes in less than 24 hours.  Worst hotel ever.  No customer service skills either.

Summary Heading: Absolutely terrible, I wish we booked somewhere else.
Summary: -Bathroom flooded twice even though we didn’t flush it with toilet paper -Few rooms are renovated, most are very outdated -The lobby is one of the few renovations -Saw hair on “cleaned” sheets -Not the best customer service, we were told the second time our toilet flooded that maintenance weren’t available and we had to convince them to switch to another room once the toilet water flooded out the bathroom and reached the second bed -Second room did not have a fridge or microwave -Breakfast is okay but not many choices -Waffles, mini muffins, mini danish pastry, cereal -Coffee, water, OJ, cranberry juice -Possibly the only few good points are that it was walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Woody and friends shuttle to Disneyland -Not recommended for its

If you have a pulse, DO NOT STAY HERE! Dirty dirty old and dirty. Did I say dirty? The beds are noisy, the sink is nasty. The toilet barely flushes and the room smells like 1950. Save yourself the time, pay more get better.

Beware...horrible stay, rooms are old and dirty and nothing works. General manager was rude and unprofessional, breakfast was gross and very minimal. Internet is a joke. Beds are scary to sleep on. Dont stay here

Summary Heading: Great location but lacking in service and cleanliness
Summary: This property is under renovation and the rooms are not as they appear on the website.  If you are looking for no frills and simply a place to lay your head at night and can overlook some aspects of hygiene, this place will suite you fine.  The rooms are very worn down and walls are thin so you can hear everything from adjoining rooms (including someone using the bathroom).   Curtains are dirty, caked on dirt on the door handles, beds are uncomfortable but at least the sheets appeared to be clean.  Shower towels are very old and not very soft.  The continental breakfast leaves a lot to be desired and consists of some mini muffins, corn flakes, waffles, milk, juice, and coffee.  The only positive about this place is location and proximity to Disneyland.  It's an easy 15 minute

Nice stay but needs a little updating.  The ceiling and bath tub looked like they had been patched up a couple times. And I didn't like how it was non smoking but people were still smoking with their doors open

Summary Heading: This Looks like a Charming Place a Good Walk from Micky but...
Summary: starting with a rude desk clerk to a non-functioning TV to a hair dryer that burned up when turned on to the replacement hair dryer that literally shot flames when turned on to noisy air conditioning to an ice cold pool to bedspreads you wouldn't want to see under an ultraviolet light back to the rude clerk again...It might seem like a value, but pay more get closer and get yourself a functional, clean, safe room. From beginning to end, outside of the  Disney - little red riding hood exterior, this was a nightmare. If you love Micky, find a better place closer, we took the bus back to this hell hole. Decent breakfast, appears to be great value...but think again.

TV is old school with blurry picture. rustic floor and tub. Internet is so slow. I ask the front desk if I can switch room but she gave me a deep breath response that sounds like she’s irritated on the other line and told me that she will call me back in the room. I told my husband about that and he just decided to just stayed in the same room for one night. The only good thing about this is the location closer to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback we appreciate your time in writing this review. We do apologize for the issues you have encountered. Seems like the room were not up to your standards, and we do understand you called the front desk and reported your concerns and for that we do apologize for the way the front desk responded. We will have to follow up and make sure this does not happen again. We do try and strive for the best customer service, unfortunately, it seems we have failed. We are glad that the location worked out for you and your family. We thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: affordable hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: I stay regularly at this hotel while taking kids to Disneyland. It's clean and pleasant, but very basic. A good place to stay if you just want a clean place to sleep. Breakfast is very minimal: waffles, toast, cereal coffee, milk, juice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are happy that this location is a great accommodation for you and your family. We thank you for staying with us, and hope you staying with us again. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: The room is not worth the price
Summary: Beside the great staff here at Travelodge, everything else is subpar.  The room is dirty and the carpet definitely needs to be changed.  We stayed in the room next to the breakfast room, and it was extremely noisy from all the patronages coming to eat breakfast.  We were awoken at 5:30 or 6am and it was non-stop noise!  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately, we do have breakfast at 6:00am - 10:00am every morning. And we know it can be very loud. We do sincerely apologize for that. We do respect and appreciate your decision on not staying with us again. We do thank you for staying with us this one time. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary: Don't have very high expectations of this hotel.  It is just an average slightly run down place.  Beds were very comfortable though.  I did leave my room at around midnight to go to our car and saw a rat the size of a kitten outside our door on the first floor.
Manager Response: I want to say thank you, firstly, for staying with us. Second, we are on plans to upgrade soon, so please bear with us. We are aware that the property does need renovations, however, since we plan to stay open, we have to wait until busy season is over. Thank yo u for staying with us and we are in hopes in the near future you come back and stay with us.

Summary: Had higher hopes for this hotel being it's part of the Wyndham family. Even after reading the reviews, I was hopeful that we would somehow be proven wrong. Unfortunately we weren't. Pros: -Parking was decent and lot easy to get in/out of with large truck. Within walking distance to ACC, so that was a plus.  Cons: -'Breakfast' consisted of waffles (made for you by an attendant) cereal, toast, muffins and coffee/juice. Chose this hotel over another nearby to try to avoid the extra cost for breakfast, but it really wasn't worth it in the end. Good news is Denny's is right next door. The standard response to each review about the breakfast is 'we offer the standard breakfast..'. Been in many hotels that offer much more for a lesser room price. -We utilized the hot tub while there

Upon checking in to this hotel, we were met with a clerk that was unfriendly and rude. When we got to our room, the floors were filthy, the bathroom wasn't moped and the TV didn't work. Because of our initial interactions with the clerk, we were uncomfortable with telling her.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback. We understand you were not happy with the room and we do apologize about that. Moreover,  When you do have issues, we always try and encourage our guests to let us know as soon as possible so we can try and accommodate as much as we can. We do apologize for the interaction you had with our front desk staff. I will effeminately share this review, and let them know how they are doing and also how they can improve. Thank you for staying with and again we do apologize for the experience you had.

Summary: Place is totally run down and uncomfortable.  Service was not that great, free wifi was awful, the lighting in the sink area was terrible (made it tough to do make up/hair/etc.)  Continental breakfast was very cheap and the selection was awful.  I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We truly apologize for the room not being up to your standards, I do want to mention that we will be continuing our renovations after summer is over. Our Continental Breakfast does offer the standard basic breakfast. Which includes; coffee, orange juice, cranberry juice, apple juice, hot tea, milk, danishes, toast, oatmeal, muffins, cereal, and they also make waffles there for you. (Upon request). We are sorry to hear that you wont be returning, and I hope in the near future you can come back give us a second chance. Thank you for your time.

Summary: We booked this hotel based on the professional photos that make this place seem idyllic, peaceful and clean. It is none of the above. We are a family of 4 and booked this hotel based on location, as we wanted to be within walking distance of Disneyland. It is a moderate 1.1 mile walk, and we ended up carrying our 5 year old home each night, so keep in mind that Disney is not quite as close as it looks on a map. We were told a free shuttle goes up and down Harbor Blvd, but we were not able to locate it.  Our room was gross. Hard beds, tiny pillows, dirty moldy shower and concrete block walls. The furniture and decor was dated (think 1981), damaged and wouldn't even meet the standards of a re-sale shop. Our dresser had huge chunks missing, the bath faucet was loose and the main
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing your review. The pictures you see online are the same here at this location/property. There are photos of renovated rooms and there are also pictures of the standard rooms (non-renovated). You are correct, the Parks are about a mile away so if you are walking to Disneyland, you will definitely be walking about 20-25 minutes, especially, if you are doing it every day. I'm sorry for the lack of communication you had about the shuttles to the parks. If you need any information about that, you could always come in, and our front desk agents can help. I really don't know who would have told you there was a free shuttle from our property to the parks, when we do not have one. All of out front desk agents know all this information. Again, I'm sorry.  Any shuttles that run by Harbor Blvd (right outside our property) is the ART. (Anaheim Resort Transportation). Route 1 and Route 2 would be the ones to pick you up and take you to the parks. Those shuttles run every 20 minutes on the hour, and they run all day long on circular routes. The shuttles start running about approx. 45 minutes before park opening and they stop running about 1 hour after park closing. You can BUY the shuttle tickets right next door at the Denny's Restaurant.  FYI, there is also the Toy Story Parking Lot which is a block away (7-minute walking distance) where you can park $20 a day, and take the free shuttle they have.  As a last resort, you can also Uber or Lyft from the property, and most of the time the prices vary from $4.00- $8.00 depending on how busy the resort is.  It seems like you were not happy about your room. We are sorry to hear that. We wished you could have reported that the first day you checked in, so we could have offered any alternative options for you and your family, and not wait until your doing your review. We encourage our guests to speak up and let us know if they are not happy, so we can try and have a chance to fix/correct any issues they are experiencing during their stay.   As for the breakfast, we have Continental Breakfast in the morning 6:00 am - 10:00 am. We have the standard breakfast which includes oatmeal, cereal, muffins, danishes, toast, and they will make waffles there for you as well. We do have milk, coffee, juices,(orange, apple, and cranberry) and hot tea. Since we do close the breakfast room at 10:00 am, we do not make coffee after 9:45 am. Not 9:00 am.  We are glad to hear that your family was excited about the pool. Unfortunately, since it is an outdoor pool, it is at the temperature of the day. We do not have it heated. The hot tub is under renovations, so maybe that is why you saw empty and the wiring out. We do have signs out there for guests to be aware but thank you for noticing that. I am not sure what you mean "exterior falling apart" and having to do with tight parking space. The parking here at this location is limited. We do have the double parking, which has more room. If you needed extra space, we could have helped in any way we could; that is why we are here for.   Once again, we thank you for staying with us and giving us feedback. We do apologize for the issues you experienced. Hopefully, once we renovate this property, you can come back and stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Good location, waiting for update room next time, terrible breakfast
Summary: This hotel was pretty good for the money paid.  We got an non updated room, but it was always clean.  The bed was too firm for my liking, the staff were efficient but indifferent, no attempt to be friendly, and the breakfast was lacking.  Spend a little money on some good food in the future. A good location and a good price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing your review, we do appreciate guests who take their time and share their experience here with us at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We do apologize for the front desk not being friendly. We will share this review with front desk to let them know how the are doing and how they can also improve. As for the breakfast, we do have it at hotel's standards which is: milk, coffee, hot tea, juices; orange, cranberry, apple. We also offer danishes, muffins, cereal, oatmeal and we also have a breakfast attendant there that makes waffles there upon your request. Thank you for staying with us and we hope in the near future when we do have more renovations, you can come back. Have a lovely day!

Summary: This hotel needs updating badly and grounds are dirty. Night time front desk staff did not have uniforms or even name tags. visible tattoos on chests. They charged my entire stay upfront instead of just authorizing my card and said their manager makes them take full deposit upfront.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for the room not being up to your expectations. Unfortunately, full payment is required upon check-in. You are welcome to use another credit or debit card at check out. We do apologize for the inconveniences and hope you come back when all renovations are made to this property. Thank you and have a great day.

Summary: When we checked in, my debit card's magnetic strip wasn't working on their system and their system had not been updated yet to accept chips on cards.  She asked me if I could pay another way which I panicked because I did not.  She finally worked it out.  We found out the jacuzzi was broken which was a disappointment.  We were looking forward to going in it.  When we got to the room, the entry card was difficult to use.  I personally could not get the door to open and had to rely on my boyfriend every time.  The room was small and not very clean.  There was mold on the carpet next to the refrigerator and we had asked for a microwave but it was not there.  We called the front desk and it took 15 minutes to bring one up and we were pressed for time.  The place was very noisy with
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, we appreciate your time. Seems like it was a difficult time to check in and we do apologize for the inconvenience of the check in process. The magnetic strip on the card is very important, as we do charge it as credit. So thank you for being patient and having us sort it out for you. As for the room issues you had, seems we have failed as we didn't hit your room expectations so we do apologize. We are going to plan to renovate some rooms in the near future, so we do hope you can give us a second chance to redeem ourselves.We hoped that these issues that you mentioned, could have been reported so we could have tried to help your stay to be a satisfying one, or at least offered any alternative options for your convenience. As for the Continental Breakfast, we do offer the hotel standards which are: milk, coffee, hot tea, juices: orange, cranberry, and apple. We also offer cereal, oatmeal, muffins, danishes, and we have a breakfast attendant who makes waffles upon your request. We are sad to hear that you won't be coming back, however, we do understand and respect your decision. We thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day.

Summary: Never book here, you’ll absolutely regret it! Extremely old decor, dirty stained carpets, leaky faucets/ toilets, mildew in the shower, and a looming urine stench. Also the curtains were ripped to shreds, so no privacy while letting light in. I slept fully clothed and with out blankets I felt so uncomfortable!If you like drug addicted zombies walking around your kids eating Cheetos, then this is the place for you!
Manager Response: We want to thank you for taking your time and writing this review. We are sincerely sorry for the issues you encountered during your stay. We would have wished that these issues were reported right away, so we could have offered other alternative options for your convenience. No one should feel the way you felt while staying here. We always try and encourage guests to call and report anything that they are not happy about or if they are simply not happy with their room. We do understand and respect that you wont stay here again, we do thank you and again, we do apologize for the issues you experienced. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: The jacuzzi was hot but the jet switch had been removed.  It appeared as if it had been vandalized or removed by the hotel.  The manager said it was being renovated but no other portion of the hotel was being worked on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time and writing your review. We do apologize for the inconvenience of the jets being down right now on the spa. We are under renovations, so the jets for the spa were not working. But the spa itself does work. We are happy to know your stay was a good one and do hope you stay with us in the near future! Thank you and have a great day!

Summary Heading: OK for the price, definitely wouldn't pay more than $100 per night
Summary: We chose this hotel as part of a package to be as close to Disney transportation as possible with the lowest price.  Long story short, it was a hotel - it had beds and a shower.  Nothing else was notable.  There is a breakfast area, but it is busy and underwhelming.  The pool was there, but it is not heated.  The hot tub had a funky smell.  Overall, I was happy that we got a hotel close by - we could walk to Disney - but I would spend more next time on something else.  If you stay here, don't expect anything other than a place to sleep.
Manager Response: Hello, how are you? We thank you for staying with us. we are glad to know that we were part of your package trip and we were able to provide you with what you needed. We do not have a Disneyland Transportation, however, there is a bus called ART. That shuttle picks up at the bus stop right outside the hotel. They do charge per person for a round trip ticket, including children depending on the age. Those tickets are sold at the Denny's Restaurant next door to us, or the Disneyland Welcome Center inside the Double Tree Hotel right across street from us. Also, the breakfast does include our standard menu which is just your basic coffee, juices; apple, orange, and cranberry- hot tea, milk, they also have danishes, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, and they will also make waffles there for you, as we have a breakfast attendant there to help. As for the pool, the pool is not heated, it is at the outside temperature. We do have a Jacuzzi here as well. I'm sorry if the spa did smell, we have our maintenance who does clean it and as it has its cleans, it might smell like chemicals once in a while. Sorry about that. Again, we do thank you for staying with us, and hope to see you in the near future as we will go through renovations soon. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: The room was dirty.  The curtian was ripped, and the service was horrible.  I brought my family to a business meeting and was very disappointed in the way the room was not clean and overall it was a nightmare.  The service at the front desk was terrible.  When I asked if the empty space suppose to have a table, couch,  etc... they said no, that is the way it suppose to be.  I will never and had advise others to not go and spend  a dime in the place.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for staying with us, and having the time to write your review. We do apologize for the room not being up to your expectations. If we would have it another way, we would have wished that you would have called or reported this to the front desk as soon as you were not happy with your room. Again, we apologize for that and also the interaction with the front desk. We do strive to give the best customer service, and we did fail on that. I will share this review with our front desk agents to let them know how we are doing and also how we can improve on our skills. As for the room space, they're rooms that seem bigger than others because of the space. They way the room was, that's how they are, nothing else would be missing. We are sorry if they didn't take the time to explain that to you. We do understand and respect your choice of not returning, we do thank you for staying with us. Have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: would like to thank them for friendliness and willingness...
Summary: would like to thank them for friendliness and willingness to help us out with heating up our daughters bottles in the middle of the night very much appreciated
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We always try to strive for greatness and give the best customer service we can. We were happy to help you with your daughter's bottles. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you can come back soon. Thank you

Summary Heading: no most disgusting place I've ever been
Summary: not only was there cockroaches in my room,  but the room they moved me to had mildew on the walls and stains all over the comforters.  i made a complaint and wanted my money back so the management tried to kick me and my daughter out at midnight with no where to go.  such a horrible experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and writing your feedback. We understood from day 1 that you were not happy with your room and we moved you. We inspected the first room and there were no signs of cockroaches like you claim you did. You had mentioned since you checked in that you wanted a renovated room, in which we didn't have available at the time of your check in. After we moved you to another room, you were still unhappy and we moved you to a renovated room. First because, you wanted a renovated from the beginning, and second, because we had some cancellations, we were able to move you to what we had available, which was a Renovated Room. Also, we had discounted your bill for the inconveniences you had, from moving room to room. After we moved you and tried to keep you satisfied, you called the 3rd party website that you booked with, and told them you were not happy and you were still dealing with problems in the renovated room. But what you failed to do is report it to the front desk so we could know what exactly you were having issues with, so we can have a chance to correct them. Now, the 3rd party was calling my own personal number at 2 am, letting me know what were the problems you were having. So, that is why, I had to call your room and let you know that we had done what we could to keep you happy, and if we failed to do so, and you were still not satisfied, the last option was checking out, and refunding the nights that were left and we still had discounted some days of your bill, again, for the inconveniences from moving. No one was kicking you out at that time, especially when we understand it was very late, and you have family with you. All I said, was that in the morning, you can check out so you would not keep having issues and we would refund any days that you were not going to stay. We understand that you were not happy as we tried our best to do what we could. We thank you for staying with us. Have a good day.

Summary Heading: probably the grossest hotel i've ever stayed in.
Summary: the state of our room (room 328, do not ever take this room was very dirty and unkempt, paper thin sheets *and* paper thin walls. the carpet was disgustingly dirty, making our socks black after just one night's stay. the comforter smelled dirty and the room smelled very musty. moth eaten curtains. black dirty tile grout. rusted faucet hardware. mold between bath tiles. tv from the 1990s.  just awful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are sad to hear your stay was not a satisfying one. We do apologize for any issues you encountered. We would have wished that any issues were reported right away and so we could have had any alternative option for you. Again, we are sorry for any inconveniences you had. Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Good Location but lacks some attention to detail and rooms were bland
Summary: Front desk was very nice. Place was OK for the money, but the bathroom had hair on the floors and the window to the room had no latch to lock it. Which wasn't caught by me until the last day I was there. So those items need to be check by management. That is a lack of security.
Manager Response: Hello, we want to thank you for staying with us, and we also thank you for your time in writing this review for our property. We do apologize for the issues you mentioned. We did have maintenance check the room and will be taking care of that. Thank you once again and we hope to see you in he near future! Thank you

Summary Heading: How was it possible this place got 2 stars?
Summary: I really hate to write poor reviews, but this merits it.  The only thing I liked about this place was the location, near Disneyland.  But the place was quite dirty, our door to the restroom had a big crack on it, we were kept awake by the constant dripping of the bathtub.  The breakfast was so bad I ended up going to a local restaurant.  We attempted to call the office several times and they rarely answered.  Even the wifi was spotty at best.  I saw so many other places in the area I wish I stayed at, even another Travelodge.  On well, live and learn!
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. We are glad to know that the location worked for your stay. As for the issues you had encountered, we did wish, those were reported to the front desk right away so we could have the chance to correct it or offer you any alternative options for your convenience. For the continental breakfast, we have what is our standard. The continental breakfast is not a hot breakfast meal. We have your basic coffee, juices; cranberry, orange, apple, hot tea, milk. They also have danishes, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, and they also make waffles upon your request. So, of the breakfast was not up to your standards, we understand. I do want to mention that we will be going into renovations again soon, so the Wi-Fi will be one of them as well. We are sorry it didn't work for you. I do have the intentions of sharing this review with our front desk agents to let them know how they are doing and also how they can improve. We thank you for staying with us, and we do hope in the near future you do have the chance to stay with us again, as we will go into renovations. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Do not stay here, you will get a disease!
Summary: Worst place ever!!! We had to change rooms due to the smell of the first one! We had a toddler with severe asthma and she is extremely sensitive to smells, mold, dust etc...We gave our baby a bath and she walked around the room for a little while and when we put her down her feet were black from the filthy carpet! Who knows what we were walking on! That was it, we packed up and woke a sleeping toddler up to go to another hotel. I demanded a full refund on the spot , which the clerk gave me. We ended up at the Wyndham down the street, that was 4 stars and only about $100 more for the 4 days we were at Disneyland!  Most disgusting experience ever!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for the issues you had during your stay. We did try and correct the issue as we moved you to another room. We do know and understand that family does come first when it comes to medical attention. We did understand that you were not happy so the front desk agent did give you a full refund for the inconveniences. We thank you for staying with us and hope in the near future we do see you when all renovations on the property have been made. We do apologize once again, and thank you. Have a good day.

Summary: It was a little noise Friday night but Saturday was fine.  The breakfast lady was very helpful and pleasent, she kept the breakfast room istocked and in order.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We do apologize for the noise that you heard, wish it was reported so we could have helped in any way possible to make your stay a better one. Thank you for your compliment on our breakfast attendant.We will share your review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and how they can improve. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I've stayed in in 25 years.
Summary: They charged me $264.00 for one night because of a trade show. The room was filthy, the sheets smelled like they had not been laundered, the desk chair was broken, the over head light at the sink was only half way lit, the bathroom was dirty, the ceiling had water spots like it had a leak, one out of three electric outlets worked. The rug was dirty, the paint was scraped /bashed of the wall.The 30 year old TV barely worked.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. May have seem that we failed you at some point, with you not being satisfied with the room itself. We do apologize for not making your stay a great one. We are aware that the rooms do need some work, since we are going to upgrade. We did wish, however, that these issues were reported in the beginning of your stay, or when you did encounter them, so we could have offer alternative options for your convenience. Also, unfortunately, for any special convention, all hotels around the convention center, will always raise their prices because it always get super busy around those dates for any special event at the Anaheim convention center. We thank you for staying with us and hope we do see you in the near future. Once again, we do apologize.

Summary: For a travelodge I was very disappointed in what we got. The room was not homey. It looked like budget cuts hit real hard. The blow dryer was ripped out of the wall, we had only 2 towels. Everything was just scarce. Like they were running out of supplies. Front desk staff appeared unbothered by our arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your time writing your review. We apologize for the encounter you had with he front desk. We will share this review and also let them know how they are doing and how they can improve. As for the rooms, we are in plans to renovate some more rooms, so we do apologize if the rooms were not up to your expectations. We do hope to see you when the changes are made so you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you and once again, we apolgize.

Summary: I travel overnight frequently, which means I spend many nights per year in many hotels -- and this is, by far, my worst hotel experience ever.   I purchased my room via a prepaid Priceline express deal, but the hotel subsequently charged me.  No big deal right?  Wrong.  I've spent several hours on the phone over the past five weeks with both the hotel & Priceline seeking a refund of the double charge but as of now, Priceline insists the hotel has refunded me but the hotel insists Priceline has refunded me.  Meanwhile, the credit card bill came due and I'm out $230.  I've never done a charge back before but it looks like I'll have to now.  As for the hotel itself, there was absolutely no hot water during prime shower times and my bed was covered in "pepper sprinkles" -- likely
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are sorry to hear that your experience was not a pleasant one. As a result, we might have failed to serve you. We do apologize for the inconvenience about charging your card. I will follow up and see what exactly happen to these transactions that you have mentioned. You should see a authorization of $100.00 on your card for incidentals. The other amount might be when you purchased the room...? If you still have any questions or doubts about the hold or any other transactions, please feel free to call the property itself and see what really is going on. We can get a clear of idea of what transactions you have pending. Again, we do apologize for putting you through this. We do wish these room issues you had were reported at the time when you experienced this so we could have offered an alternative option at your convenience. We do hope in the near future you can book with us again, as we do plan to make changes to the property. We thank you for staying with us, have  lovely day!

Summary Heading: Worst hotel I have been in
Summary: Reserved 2 rooms and pictures showed a updated rooms. When I got there to check in there were signs saying under construction. The lady brought up my reservation and said I only had one room. I showed her my email confirming the reservation. I had entered all the gust names and it put the other room in my adult sons name. After driving 8 hours he was car sick and my granddaughter was asleep. She made me get him out of the car to check in. Even tho I was paying for the rooms. Then when we got to the rooms they were under construction there was caulking on the walls were they were filling in holes and didn’t paint over it the light in the bathroom was barely on the wall mold in the tile of the bathtub. If I could post pic on here I would.
Manager Response: Hello there and thank you for your review. I first want to thank you on taking your time to write your review, and staying with us. I do apologize for the inconvenience you had at check in. Unfortunately, I do want to let you know that there are protocols to follow, as to check in. If the name on the reservation is not yours, we do need the person who has their name on the reservation to be present with a valid ID. It also does state it on your email confirmation. We do suggest just reading the Check In Reminders at the bottom of your confirmation, just in case, you do miss something. Also, we are under renovations, so there are sign throughout the property. Again, we do apologize for that, we just wish this maintenance issue was brought up to the front desk. We thank you and once again we apologize.

Summary: The room didn’t have a fridge. With the room being above the dryer room our room was very humid. The internet was horrible to which we couldn’t even use it. When asked for more towels it took over an hour to receive them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing your review, also, for saying with us. I do apologize for not having a fridge. If reported, we could accommodated, so we do apologize. At this moment we are renovating and so is our Wi-Fi service. We do hope when changed are done, you can come back and stay with us, for us to redeem ourselves. We were having a shortage on towels, so i do apologize. Thank you have have a lovely day.

Summary: This “newly remodeled” hotel did not have any newly remodeled rooms. Pictures provided on the internet are NOT the rooms that are available. The WiFi does not work. The free breakfast is a woman making toast. The room has not been updated since the 80’s. Wooden tables and thick coats of high gloss grey paint on the walls. Not even one cheap piece of art in the entire room. Towels were old and dingy. Bathroom was barely functional, and had water didn’t get hot. The only good thing was the two block walk to Disneyland and one block to Starbucks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do see that online sites uploaded pictures of our renovated rooms. Our renovated rooms have a different room category as to when you book. If you do not see if pop up on your time of booking or you don't see it available, it is because they have already been booked. There are only a certain amount of rooms renovated. Not all the property has been remodeled yet. We are under construction but still open. Again, we do apologize for these maintenance issues, in which we wished that they were mentioned while staying here, and/or we could have offered another alternative option for your convenience. After the renovations are done, we do hope you can come back and stay with us. Thank you.

Summary: This motel needs a major remodel! The rooms are old and look like they have been pieced back together many times.  Such a great location for such a old rundown motel. It was OK for the one night that we were there but I would not stay any longer .
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking your time in writing your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center, and we also thank you for your feedback as well. We greatly appreciate you staying with us, I do want to mention that we are in the process of remodeling, however, it will take time as well to have all the property done. We do hope that after all changes, you do continue to come back and stay with us. We do respect your decision and we hope with all the changed being made you do come back. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary Heading: Good location and rate but otherwise mediocre
Summary: Received a really good rate on Expedia for this hotel that is very close to the Disneyland Resort. Easy and short drive to the main parking structure.   Besides location, this hotel does not offer much.   Check in was a disaster - we waited 20 minutes for the front desk attendant to even acknowledge us, let alone get assistance. That's just poor service.   The room was modestly clean but extremely outdated and worn. For example, bathroom had clear water damage and the tiles were peeling (linoleum). Our door was not sitting correctly in the frame so I did not lock easily (had to jiggle the door to get the lock to sit correctly) and it did not seal so we heard everything going on outside. Rooms also seemed to be poorly insulated because we could hear everything going on in our
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We understand that you were not satisfied with your stay, and we do apologize for that. As for our rooms, I do want to say that we will be renovating soon, and I do hope when those changes are made, then you can come back so we can redeem ourselves. I will however, share your review with our staff about our breakfast attendant, so they can know how they are doing and how they can also improve. Again, we do apologize and hope to see you again in the near future.Thank you.

Summary: Good place to stay for a great price. Close to Anaheim convention center and Disney. Great restaurants near by.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that this location worked out for you. You are right, we are very close to the Anaheim Convention Center and also the Disneyland Resort, as well as other great restaurants. Again, we are glad to know this location was a great one for you, hope to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Rooms were filthy no hot water sorry towels water faucet...
Summary: Rooms were filthy no hot water sorry towels water faucet was broken water leaked all over the counter the room smelled dirty for a few dollars more I'll be staying at my usual cortona inn and suites
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing your review. We do apologize for the inconvenience you had. I wish these issues were reported right away when you experienced this, so we could have accommodated at your convenience. We could have offered alternative options, but again, we do appreciate you letting us know. We hope that this does not stop you from making future booking with us as we do have big changes coming up. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Having travelled around India, UK & Europe I can safely say that this was the worst experience both in terms of the hotel room & staff. We’d booked travelodge as we’d previously stayed in London in the same group n were very happy with the staff n services provided. But that wasn’t the case in Aniheim The front desk ppl were most unwelcoming , argumentative & Arrogant . They were least bothered bout even pointing us in the right direction for the room  The room seemed like at 18 the century motel room with poor lighting, creaking beds, old tv, poor condition of bathrooms. AC was really noisy & you could make out that the condition of other rooms AC was similar.  Breakfast buffet hardly had stuff to offer with just waffles n corn flakes on menu. In terms of location there are
