Manager Response: Hello, and thank you for your feedback. We do want to apologize for the customer service you received when you came to check -in. I will definitely, share this review with our front desk agents to let them know how they are doing and also how they can improve. I will look into this situation further. As for our property, I do want to mention, we will be going into renovations soon, and everything will be changed. I do hope to see you back when all changes are made, it will give us a second chance to serve you and serve you the way you deserve. Again, we do apologize for the room not being up to your standards and hope to see you as soon as the changes are made. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: I would not recommend this place. I felt very unsafe. Not enough parking spots for number of rooms. This place is geared for the foreign tourist that visit Disneyland area and have no idea what they areally getting into.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry you felt this way about this property. We are a safe location, we are on a Harbor Blvd, which is a very big connection to the Disneyland Resort. For the parking, we do have parking, it is inside the property, of course it does get full, on busy days, however, we will stay have a space to park if it becomes to full. We also have a night security to help with parking and the safety of the vehicles of our guests. Again, we apologize if you did feel this unsafe, we do hope you can come back and stay with us for us to redeem ourselves. Thank you, and have a lovely day!

Summary: The location was great for accessing a shuttle to Disneyland.  Quick walk to the Toy Story parking lot and then the shuttle takes you to the entrance.  The hotel was extremely outdated.  Furniture had lots of external damage and it looked like it had been there since the 70's.  Shower head was broken away from the wall.  Tile floors were cracked and the tile around the tub showed signs of mold.  The beds were not very comfortable.  The breakfast said it was continental but it was only waffles and cold cereal.  There was no fruit only juices.  The only reason we gave it a rating of 3 was due to location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that the location worked out for your stay, however, we now know the room expectations were not up to your standards. I do want to mention that we will be doing renovations soon, and as we complete our changes, I hope you do come back and stay as we will look forward to your future stay with us. As for the breakfast, it is Continental, so we will provide the basic standards we require. We have milk, orange, apple and cranberry juices, coffee, tea, danishes, muffins, oatmeal, cereal, and they will also make waffles there for you. Again, we apologize if the breakfast was not up to your standards. Thank you and hoping to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: The location is great, but you get what you pay for here
Summary: Pros-  Location, location and location… It is just a short walk to the Toy Story parking lot where you may catch a bus to the front gate of Disneyland. It is also just across the street from the Convention Center area as well as short walk to the Garden Walk where the restaurants are plentiful.  Denny’s is just next door and trust me, unless they improve the free breakfast quickly, you will be thankful for Denny’s. Cons- Free Breakfast: I’m not one of those people who expected to see a huge breakfast for free, but this was HORRIBLE. Just a few pastry type selections and some dried up mini muffins. I actually felt embarrassed for them for this selection, it would have been better to just open up a box of bagels at the front desk than to ask people to make a special trip to this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. I am glad that the location of the hotel worked for you, and or your days of your stay here. You are right, we do have the Toy story Parking Lot about 7 minutes away. Guests always pay to park there, however, it is always under your discretion if you want to walk in there and take the shuttle they provide for paying guests. As for the breakfast you mentioned, please know it is Continental Breakfast so you'll always have the basic amenities served. We have Waffles made upon requests with our Breakfast attendant. Also, have cereals, oatmeals, muffins, fruits, coffee, milk, orange juice, cranberry juice, apple juice, hot tea, danishes, muffins, etc...I'm happy to know that Denny's was your breakfast selection, as they are right next to us. I am very sorry to hear that the breakfast here, was not satisfying for you. I do want to let you know that I will share this review with our Housekeeping staff, so we can address the issue with the towels. As for our hotel brand, our policy does state it is 3 towels sets (Like 3 people were staying in the room). Unfortunately, even when they do give room service it does state, again, 3 towels sets. However, you can always request more here at the front desk, as we can try and accommodate. We thank you for your time and hope in the near future we do get a visit from you again. Have a nice day!

Summary: The room was dirty. there were stains on the towels and sheets. There was an iron burn on the carpet, the ironing board was burnt. The breakfast was not a continental breakfast. I will never stay at this property again
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconveniences you had experienced during your stay. We did wish these issues were reported right away so we can address them immediately. Again, we apologize and hope maybe in the near future you can come back when renovations will be made. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: Feces in toilet. Hair in bed.
Summary: I checked in on 11/15/17. The first room (105) Travelodge put me in did not have a key to the safe. Travelodge had me repack my luggage and move to room 139. The safe in 139 was locked and they had to call maintenance to reopen it. While waiting on maintenance I discovered the toilet had FECES in it, and there was HAIR in the bed I checked (the room had two beds as a friend was to arrive the next day). I reported the issues to the manager. I said I’d be happy to stay in the room if she had it cleaned while I was out for the evening. While she was checking to see what she could do, I marked the sheets with an “ X” to ensure they were changed as I was getting a bad feeling from this hotel staff. The manager said she did not have housekeeping staff on duty at that time and she did
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I do apologize in advance for the issues you had. We did move you rooms because you requested a safe. Now, with that being said, with the same in your new room, does need resetting because maybe the guest before had a personal code. So, I know for a fact, our Maintenance did go in there and reset it for your convenience. Now, before the room change, everything in that room was double checked before renting it, and there was no feces in the toilet because we would never rent out the room if it wasn't ready. It was also video recorded, so we can keep documentation of how clean we have our rooms. (Again, no feces in the toilet) Also, you mentioned that you found a hair in one of the beds. We did speak to you, and told you that there was no housekeeping at that hour that you wanted the sheets changed where you found the hair. So, 2 of our hotel staff went in that room and changed the sheets. It was only 1 bed you had a problem with, the other one, you had already moved the sheets around, like if, you were searching for something. So, after you got back, you still came to the front desk, asked for more sheets and a bed cover. At this point, to meet your requests, and keep you satisfied, the front desk agent asked if you wanted another room, or if you wanted to stay in that room, and they can provide new sheets and a bed cover and you said it was fine. The front desk agent mentioned that you did not ask in a nicely matter about the sheets and that there was feces in the toilet still. We have documentation of everything that happens here at the front desk. You mentioned that there was no resolution that the Travelodge did for you, however, we compensated the night back to you. I don't understand if you are talking about Expedia.com. They are a 3rd party company, and you have to talk to them for any type of modification to your reservation or even moving you hotels. Again, we did apologize before for the inconveniences, and we are doing it now. I want to mention on more time, that we did credit back that night back to you. Anything else related to your reservation please call Expedia.com. If you would like more information or discuss this in more detailed matter, please contact the property itself. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Average, but affordable Motel Accommodation near Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Travelodge for four night during our short trip to Los Angeles.   The motel is quite outdated, but I have read that they are in the process of doing renovations. The rooms are standard motel rooms, with basic amenities. We did have some issues accessing the WiFi from the corner room we had which required us to move rooms on our second night. The reception was helpful in moving our room without any issues.   We did have to call maintenance to help us on the first night with getting the hot water working, but that was done quickly and everything worked.   Overall, our stay was good. It was about three to four blocks away from Disneyland, which was about a 10-15mins at an average walking pace. Admittedly after a long day at Disneyland it would have been nicer to be
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing your review. We are glad to know that your stay was a satisfying one and that we did accomplish our goal. That any issue you had, we were able to correct it, and our handy dandy maintenance was there to help as well. Overall we thank you for staying with us, and w are glad to know your trip to Disneyland was enjoyable. Thank you and hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Great and affordable lodging near Disney Land. It’s not fancy but it isn’t a run down roachtel. Safe friendly atmosphere
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was a satisfying one. We thank you as well for staying with us for your trip to Disneyland. Please know that we are waiting as the busy season is over, to start renovations that were left behind, and hopefully when that is done, you can come back and have an awesome stay again! Thank you for your time!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff on all shifts thank your for hospitality.
Summary: All traveled to different hotels each are different.  Travelodge Convention Center is convenient food, shopping and Disneyland. Travelers stay at this hotel. Affortable price and great staff on all shifts. Thank you Travelodge for your hospitality.
Manager Response: Firstly, I want to thank you for staying with us, at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. Also, thank you for taking your time in writing this wonderful review. We are happy to know that this location was ideal for you and your needs. Of course, there are many shopping locations and restaurants for your convenience. We do strive for greatness and we do hope you did feel like home while staying here with us. We were happy to have you here, of course! We thank you, once again, and hope in the near future you do stay with us again! See you soon!

Summary Heading: close to Disneyland but needs major updating
Summary: We got a great deal but you get what you pay for. Parking was free. A 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Having a refrigerator was great. Internet was VERY poor.  The pool was nice but needs repair. To turn on whirlpool there was exposed wires and a key from a power tool. Having toilet plungers placed outside your door is not promising. Ice machine wasn't working all the time. Free breakfast was waffles, toast and sugary muffins. The lights and fan in bathroom worked intermittently. Being a very hot week we had a termite issue in our room. We informed front desk when we checked out and they said manager would call us. Never heard from them but had one night refunded.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that some of your needs were met. We do apologize for the inconveniences. I do want to mention that we are planning to start renovating after the busy season is over. We do greatly appreciate your review and hope that in the near future when the changes are done you do come back and stay with us. We did refund a night for the issues you encountered. Thank you and have a great day!

Summary: Torn curtains, stained ceiling, rusty bathtub fixtures, worn carpeting and a really musty smell in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We really appreciate it you taking the time to write your review. We thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. I do want to mention that we will go through some renovations as the busy season is over. Of course, with patience and time, step by step we will renovate. We do apologize for the room not being up to your expectations. We do feel like we did fail in some way for not knowing about the issues in the room and trying to correct them; in trying to make your stay a better one. We always do encourage all of our guests to let us know of there is anything wrong with their stay or even their room. We thank you once again, and we do sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We do hope in the near future, we do see you again. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: As annual pass holders at Disneyland we stay at a hotel in the area a minimum once a month. With Wyndam the points let us stay around $50 a night. This hotel was not even worth that. The AC didn't work on one of the hottest weeks ever. The hair dryer was broken in pieces, the sink was cracked, the bathroom fan did not work ( mold all over bathroom) and the phone was a sticky mess. Told the front desk about AC and was promised someone would have it fixed. Got back to the room late and it was not fixed. Next morning went to front desk again. Was told there was no report from the previous night but they would fix it. Came back late afternoon at it still was not fixed and the maids did not come to room. Third complaint and I was told "Well do you want another room" in a not so nice
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Seems like your stay was an unhappy one, and we do apologize for that. We do wished that these issues were addressed in the moment when you encountered them, instead of checkout. That way we could have the chance to correct it in the beginning. We could have also moved you, earlier if that was the case, if you were not happy and still experiencing issues. We do apologize if the rooms were not up to your standards. We also respect that you will not be coming back. We thank you for staying with us. Have a good day!

Summary Heading: Ok if you are only looking for a place to sleep
Summary: The Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center is as advertised, a 3 star place to sleep. The room was dated, but did have a refrigerator which was helpful. They do serve breakfast, but do not have much selection. If you are looking for a clean place to sleep and do not need much in the way of amenities, this will do.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I understand the room is outdated, and we appreciate your concerns. We always try and make our guests feel at home and work hard to fulfill our goals as we strive to provide good customer service. I do want to mention that we will be going into renovations once the busy season is over. So we do invite you back once that's done. However, we do hope that this step does not take too long. We do apologize for the room not being up to your standards, again, we are looking forward on making new changes to this property. We do hope we see you in the near future!

Summary: ART bus stops at this hotel to take you to Disneyland. Location is nice, within reasonable walking distance to many convenient places. It’s an old hotel, not upgraded but all I needed was a bed and a hot water. I don’t need a home away from home. If you do, then find something more expensive with more stars. The hotel served its function. My room was clean, everything worked, 2 queen beds and surprisingly very spacious. I was really happy with my experience and had realistic expectations to begin with. Staff were nice and accommodating. Continental breakfast was served every morning. Limited choices, but it’s not a full breakfast, so can’t complain. Vending machine outside with cold drinks. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate it. We are happy to know that your stay was a satisfying one. We do work hard everyday for our guests, and to make sure their stay is always a great one. We do hope to see you back again soon, as you visit Anaheim. Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. Have a lovely day!

Summary: We booked this hotel because it was close to Disneyland. It was perfect for our stay. Room was extremely quiet and the hotel was an easy walk
Manager Response: Thank you for booking at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We do also thank you for taking the time in writing your review. We are happy that you enjoyed your time here with us and that we served you. We hope that next time you are around Anaheim you come back and visit. We thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Had to sleep without blankets, Hotel "ran out"
Summary: We booked a suite #234 and arrived October 11, 2017 in the evening after a long day of air travel.  We were exhausted, hungry and just wanted to eat dinner and go to bed.  Upon arriving in our room, we unpacked our things and then left the hotel to get dinner.  After a late dinner, we returned to the hotel and found that we were short 2 blankets.  The hotel staff left sheets and pillows, but failed to leave 2 blankets in our suite.  I walked down to the office and spoke with the night manager and very nicely requested 2 blankets for the 2 beds that didn't have blankets.  The manager told me that he would send some right up.  After 45 minutes of waiting, I called down to the office by phone and spoke with the manager, he was surprised that the blankets hadn't been brought up to
Manager Response: We first want to thank you for taking your time in writing your review and also for staying with us. You did stay in one of our suites. Our suite is 2 rooms with a Queen bed in each room and a pullout sofa bed in the living room. Now, if you booked it online and the description says something else that is not, what do not have any control over that. There is always so much we can do as to try and change that because we are not responsible for what any 3rd party has on their website. We do apologize for any confusion. We do recall, you calling before your stay and making sure that everything is fine. We doubled checked everything for you, and we did find everything to be fine before your arrival. We always check all rooms to make sure everything is fine for all guests. We do want to let you know that the person at night, is the only one on property and unfortunately has to be one running back and forth for any guests requests. As for the blanket issue, we do apologize. Moreover, we did speak to the person that was at the front desk working that night. Please know that we are taking care of this situation. We do know that they gave you a business card, and it has the information of the General Manager. If you saw the number on the card blacked out, its because we updated it to the new number where you can actually get in contact with her and her email address as well. As for the doors that you are talking about for the suite that you booked, we are sorry for the issues you say you had. We sent our Maintenance to the room and double checked on both doors, and they work perfectly fine. I don't understand what wasn't locking. Again, we thank you for staying with us, we do apologize for the issues you experienced, and trust us, we are making sure and taking care of this situation. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary: There were more than a dozen holes on the walls that were not fixed properly. There was mold (black) on the shower walls. I found a blood stain on the comforter. The television was from 1995 and the room did not feel clean. It did not smell bad, otherwise I would have asked for another room. We got there so late, 9pm, and my kids were so tired that we showered and just slept. We were happy to leave that junk of a room in the morning. Will never go there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize for the issues you encountered. We wished these issues were brought up the moment you encountered them, so we could have addressed the issue immediately. We always encourage our guests to report anything that is wrong with their room / stay. We are happy to provide any alternative options we would have for you, if you are not happy with your room. We thank you for staying with us and have a lovely day!

Summary: The room was nice.  It had all we needed for a weeks long stay to go visit Disneyland.  A microwave & fridge.  One bed was soft the other was hard and you could feel the bed springs.  The TV was old but it worked.  Disneyland was not close enough walk to.  Especially if you have small children.  Do bring your own socks or shower shoes to just walk around in in the room.  The carpet is very dirty; your feet get filthy quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We really do appreciate it. We do apologize for the beds and carpet not being up to your expectations. I will definitely share this review with our staff to let them know how we are doing and also, how we can improve. Our location is about a mile away from the Disneyland resort, so the Toy Story Parking Lot is about a 7 - 8 minute walk from our property, where you can park or walk in their (under your discretion) and see if you can take the free shuttle from there. Or there is another option, which is the ART shuttle that picks you up outside the hotel. They run every 20 minutes on the hour and you can purchase the ART shuttle passes right next door at the Denny's Restaurant. There is also the Disneyland Welcome Center in the Double Tree Hotel right across the street from us where you can get 1, 3, 5 day passes. We thank you for staying with and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Never stay at a Wyndham Rewards as you won't get them
Summary: Very poor outcome when spending over $1K on accomodation and Wyndham won't give points to my account.  Accomodation was very basic and would not have stayed there, next time Hilton Honor will be my preferrence.  Close to Disneyland, pool was freezing and spa didn't work with wires hanging out of the wall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feed back. We greatly appreciate it. Unfortunately, if you book your itinerary through a 3rd party, Wyndham will not honor your points. Remember, if you want to earn more points, you have to do it through Wyndham or the hotel directly. I am sorry that they couldn't honor your points but it is a rule through the Wyndham Rewards Policy. For the issues you had at the pool and the spa, we would have liked to hear about them at the moment you were here, that way, we could have had the chance to address them in a prompt manner. Just know that do have a little bit of time since we did open the pool and spa due to upgrading, so there are adjustments here and there, but we do apologize for that. We are trying our best to do these upgrading/renovations as soon as we can, and that being said, we are probably going to wait until holidays are over to continue with renovations. We thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day!

Summary: When I saw the outside of the hotel I knew not to expect much. It is on a very busy, not so nice side of Habor Blvd, across from a gas station and a Denny's. When we were checking in, the staff at the front desk were not very friendly and seemed annoyed that they had to help us. They did not give us any information about the hotel amenities (which there are very few of) and sent us on our way quickly. Our room was on the second floor of the hotel, which was fine, but the room was very dark and dirty. The fridge looked like it was rotting from the outside, and no matter what temperature we set it at everything froze in it. The vanity was chipped and looked like it was rotting, and all of the  knobs sprayed water from them when they were used. The bathroom fixtures were rusty and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We also thank you taking the time and staying with us. We sincerely do apologize for the issues you say you had. We do try and encourage guests to report anything that is wrong with their room/stay. Even, with the comforters or sheets you said you had issues with, we do have extra ones, or we could have brought new ones. Again, we do apologize for those inconveniences. I am glad that I was able to book a shuttle for your trip to Universal Studios, and that helped you and your guest on your trip there. We thank you and respect your decision on coming back with us. Have a nice day!

Summary: Property was of very low quality but relatively clean. Staff was helpful, on thr surface, and promised at 20% discount off our overall costs for the 4 nights we were staying there because thr electronic key lock didn't work. When our travel agency called them to confirm the discount, they lied and said that the 20% off was for one night only. We will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that your stay was a satisfactory one even though you were dealing with the lock on the first night. I know you came to the front desk and you talked to management. So management did provide 20% off that night, and provided you with the manual key so you would not have to deal with that. We are sorry for the experience you had, and we also respect the decision of not coming back. We thank you and hope you have a lovely day!

Summary: I only stayed here because I thought it was a different hotel that I had stayed at before. This hotel is horrible. There was tape on my door and it looked like it had been broken into. The shower was rusty,old and needs to be replaced. I found a cigarette in my room. Most of the outlets didn't work our toilet made noises all night. At checkout another customer complained about mold in the room and the front desk didn't seem to be concerned. So I would not recommend this hotel to anyone and I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sad to hear you had some issues yu experienced. First and far most, we would like to apologize for the issues. We could have wished that was reported right away. Anything that you are not happy about we would like to know so we can get the chance to correct it. Unfortunately in this case, it was too late to do it. I will share this review with our housekeeping department and check how they are doing and how they can improve as well. We are sorry and respect that you wont be back. We thank you for staying with us. Have a lovely day!

Summary: Upon checking in, the desk agent confirmed that we had reserved a room with a king bed for two nights. Perfect. We dropped off our bag, and left for a long day at the parks. When we returned to the hotel, a different desk agent gave us our room key and sent us on our merry way. When we opened the door to the room, there were two double beds. We call immediately, and are told our room was given away. What?! So we’re a married couple stuck sleeping in two separate beds like a couple of teenagers. As if that wasn’t bad enough, the room was *disgusting*. The floors were very badly stained, the bathroom tiles had clearly been painted over with the wrong paint, resulting in the paint peeling away from the walls, and the water coming out of the bathroom faucet somehow smelt EXACTLY
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback. We are sorry for the experience you encountered. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you had for moving from a 1 King Bed to a 2 Queen Bed. Sounds like you were unhappy with the change, so Management did compensate 25% off 1 night. However, things that you are mentioning that you were not happy about, should have been reported to the front desk at that moment, to see what other alternative options we could have had for you. We always encourage guests to speak up and report anything that is wrong with the room so we can take care of it. Things like this can be avoided if reported right away, and all we want is for you and your party to have an enjoyable stay, even though their was a change from your room type to a 2 Queen Beds and you were compensated. Again, we apologize for that. We thank you for staying with us.

Summary: i found my experience at your hotel to be very nice.the room was clean and comfortable.the staff was nice and very helpfull
Manager Response: Firstly, I want to thank you for saying with us at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. Secondly, we thank you for your time in writing your feedback. WE are glad that we were able to provide the service that you deserve and that you were satisfied with your stay. We will share this review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and also how we can improve any other departments we need. Thank you and we hope to see you soon when you visit Anaheim, again. Have a lovely day!

Summary: needs some improvments   .. need to up grade  draws to put clothes away didn't open.. the drain in sink bathroom was cloged
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and taking your time to write your review. We are glad to know that your stay was a satisfactory one. I do want to let you know, that we are planning to renovate/upgrade but until the busy season is over. I do apologize for the issues you had during your stay. We hope a soon as these renovations are made, you can come back and stay with us. We thank you and we hope you have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: The internet didn't work. The outside of the hotel looked...
Summary: The internet didn't work. The outside of the hotel looked like it was in need of serious repairs. The room was basic. I requested a fridge but was hot given one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the internet not working properly for you and the mini fridge not given to you. We are looking to renovate the property, however, after busy season we will probably start. As well as making sure that our Wi-Fi connections are up to speed and connectivity. I will definitely share this review with front desk to let them know how they are doing and as well how we can improve. Also to investigate further about the request for the mini fridge that you were suppose to have. Again, we apologize for the inconveniences. Hope you can visit us to redeem ourselves, next time you are in Anaheim. Thank you

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Smelly rooms with bad old air conditioners. Had to ask twice to get fridge. Once when booking and again when we checked in.  Beat up beds and furniture. There was no haie dryer, but when we asked for one, they brught up a unit directly ripped from the wall. It still had screw on the hair dryer holder.  Would not stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your time in writing this review. We are sorry to hear that you had issues during your stay. I want to let you know that I will look into this case further on your requests for the fridge, hair dryer and with the front desk. I apologize if this caused any inconveniences. I do respect your decision on not staying with us again, and do invite you to come back when we have rooms and property renovated. Thank you for staying with us, have a lovely day!

Summary: This is a horrible place with awful service.  Not walking distance from Disneyland, so the frugality of staying there was not even practical.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback we really do appreciate it. We are sad to hear that your stay was not a happy one. We do apologize for that. We are about 1 mile from the Disneyland Resort, so it can take up to 25 minutes walking there. We do have the ART shuttle that picks up right outside the hotel. They run every 20 minutes on the hour. You can buy the shuttle tickets right next door to us at Denny's Restaurant. Also, they is the Toy Story Parking Lot about 7 minutes walking distance. Now, it is under your discretion if you would like to walk in there and take the free shuttle that they offer. They have a free shuttle for people who pay to park there to go to Disneyland. Again, we do apologize if your stay was not an enjoyable one. We do hope that in the near future you do come back and stay so we can redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you.

Summary: Do not stay here!  I was one of those who look at the reviews of the hotel before going.  I decided it can't be  all that bad, after all there were a few of positive reviews.  It was filthy.  1st off I was promised a room on the 3rd floor.  When I got there, was told my room was bumped as something broke in the room and they had to repair it.  Asked if we could have one of the renovated rooms since this was such an incovenience for us.  They said "no" but they had one on the 1st floor that was partially renovated.  That room had absolutely nothing done to it at all.  As a matter of fact, paint was peeling off the walls, light  bulb above the mirror was out, baby roaches slithering on the bathroom floor and all over the walls.  The bathtub was horrible as it needed to be replace
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We understand you were not satisfied in anyway with your stay. We do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused, however, you need to understand that the weekend you were here, we had a special event at the Anaheim Convention Center and there was also Mickey's Halloween Party. So, we have been super busy and sold out. For those reasons, we did try to accommodate you to put you in the 1st floor even though out 3rd floor was all occupied. All the issues you said you had, we wished you could have reported them right away, because we would have had the chance to try and correct it and wouldn't have let you stayed in that room since you were already having issues in the beginning. We always encourage guests to come to the front desk or call, to report anything that they are experiencing since check in. Again, we understand it can be frustrating and we would only want you to have an enjoyable stay, however, we did not have the chance to try and fix any issues, since it was not reported on that moment. I also want to mention that any busy weekend, and or have special events at the Disneyland Resort, all prices around the area are going to be something similar to what you paid for. I'm sorry, but those are the rates that everyone will see. We also respect that you wont be coming back again, which we are sad to hear, however, we are planning to renovate soon after the busy season is over, and we do want you to come back in the near future when all changes are made. As we strive to provide great service, we also want you to have a memorable stay. We thank you for staying with us and hope you do come back, again, when all those changed are made for your convenience. Thank you and Have a lovely day.

Summary: I really enjoyed the atmosphere at this motel. It was quiet and serene but yet in the middle of a busy area near Disneyland. It is situated such that once you drive through the entrance, no matter where you park you are within short distance to your room. The room was very spacious and comfortable. I had guest come visit me there and there was a nice table and chairs to sit at and a refrigerator was in the room so i was able to offer them bottles of water that I had put in there previously. I like how and where the bathroom was situated as well it left for the room to be nice and open.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing this review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are happy to know that your stay here with us was an enjoyable one. Also, we are around the Disneyland area resort, so our area will be a busy one. We thank you once again for staying with us and hope you so come back and visit on your next trip to Anaheim! Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: This hotel looked old we were scared to walk barefoot in the room. There were stains on the walls ceiling and major water damage everywhere. The second floor walk way was very uneven and stair railing was loose.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We want to mention that we are planning to renovate this property step by step and we are trying to stay open during renovations. We apologize for the hotel not being up to your standards. I know looks can be deceiving, however, we do hope your stay was a satisfying one and we do hope in the near future you can stay with us as these changes are made throughout our property. Thank you once again, and we do sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.

Summary: USA gymnastics National Congress was held here. Outstanding staff set up water and coffee throughout the day.  There is a snack shop and coffee shop.  Several large clean restrooms.  Several rooms for classes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing this review. We are glad to have had you here on your visit to Anaheim. It is very important for us know how our guests' stay was and it seems we did not fail on yours. We thank you once again, and hope to see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: You Get What You Pay For
Summary: We got a really good deal on this room when we booked a package through Alaska Airlines for a girl's trip to Disneyland over Labor Day weekend. We had already read the reviews on this hotel and knew to keep our expectations low. We wanted a convenient location for a low price and that is basically what we got.   We were on the 2nd floor and did not have any problems with bugs, as some of the other reviewers have mentioned. The room badly needs updating, however, and the carpet was so stained and worn that we didn't want to walk on it with bare feet.  My other major complaint was the towel shortage. Housekeeping would take all our towels away during the day and leave only 3 bath towels, 2 hand towels, and no wash cloths. We were a party of 4. Each night we would have to go to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are glad that your stay here was a satisfying one. We do apologize for the towel issue. As a hotel standard, that is the amount of towels that we are suppose to leave in each room with a 2 Queen beds. We thank you for complementing our staff. We do strive to provide excellent customer service. We do hope in the near future that you stay with us when we do upgrade as we expect you to come back on your next Disneyland trip! Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Will not recommend this hotel ever!
Summary: The hotel room smells with firefly. When I called front desk the receptionist actually said "the best I can do is send maintenance to check." When i said just return back my money and i'll leave thats the only time they transferred me to another room. All in all it was a very very bad experience!
Manager Response: We do apologize for the experience you said you had. We did follow up on this, and you said you were seeing fireflies. However, we had the front desk agent send someone up there to check, and they did not find anything. However, we went ahead and accommodated you to another room to make sure everything was okay. Also, I do want to mention that any cancellations trying to be made the same day, we can refund, however, we can cancel for you. So, I am not sure if you were trying to do that. We are sorry for that experience you had. We hope in the near future, when we renovate you would be willing to come back, and stay with us. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Do not be fooled by the lobby. The rooms are worn and need repair.  My room on the 1st floor had roaches.  The wall sockets would not hold plugs. Tile around tub was moldy.  I would have immediately left if everything wasn't non-refundable and I had a medical test early the next morning. I changed rooms to the second floor and it did not fair better.  I was granted a whopping $9 for my troubles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for the issues you experienced. We did accommodate you from moving to another room, because of the issues you had. Unfortunately, we were sold out those days so we couldn't accommodate you like we wanted to, however, we did give you a compensation for the issues for the first night we moved you. Again, we do apologize and we hope this does not stop you from staying with us in the near future. Thank you

Summary: Decent hotel. It was clean, nothing fancy, but the rates were super affordable and for a quick weekend trip for Disneyland it worked! It's very close to the parking lot for Disney as well. Staff was very nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and staying with us on your Disney trip. We are glad that you were satisfied with your stay and we do hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: This hotel was very convenient. 5 minute walk to convention centre, 20 minute walk to Disney.   However.... bathrooms are old and gross. Rust, mould, hair on the walls, roof and tub.   Beds were comfy but pillows were like a sack of lumpy foam.  Sheets were clean.   The outside is worse than the inside. Towels wedged under window sills and aircon units.   Rooms were quiet.   Breakfast was ok for free. Waffles, cereal, toast or muffins.   We got a very cheap deal and knew it wasn't flash. if I had paid the rack rate I would have cried.
Manager Response: First and far most, I want to thank you for taking your time and writing this review. We also thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We understand that the rooms were not up to your standards. I do want to mention that we will start renovations soon again, and when that is finished, we do invite you to come back and stay with us so your stay will be an unforgettable one. We do apologize for the inconvenience you had experienced, however, we always encourage all guests to come to the front desk and report anything that is wrong with your room so we can offer alternative options for your convenience. We do thank you for your time and hope to see you in the future!

Summary: The accommodations were reasonable for the price, but the staff was very rude and I would never stay at this property again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We thank you for staying with us and we do apologize for any inconvenience you had during your stay with our staff. I will definitely share this review with our staff and let them know how we are doing and how we can also improve. We thank you and we hope in the near future you can stay with us again, so we can redeem ourselves.

Summary: We hoped the reviews were just unreasonable overreactions, but this hotel was the worst place we stayed in our travels in the USA over a one month period. Everything looks ok on first glance, but as you delve deeper, you realize the true horrors of an unloved and unmaintained hotel.   The reception desk is possibly the nicest space.  However, on further glance you'll see dirty tiles and stained, ripped chairs. The front desk staff don't seem to really care, you'll get a cavalier attitude. They'll likely do the bare minimum.   We checked in and our first reaction was relief - there was a clean bed. But that was as good as it got. The room was badly dated - nothing has been done to it for years. The lighting dim. The bathrooms reasonably clean, but again a lot of work required.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write this review and staying here with us, at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We understand and respect your review, as we take our guests' review seriously. We do apologize in any way for the stay you say you had, unfortunately, we couldn't been able to help because we did not know you had these issues when you stayed here. I do want to mention that we do have a front desk that is open 24 hours and if these issues were reported, we could have had alternative options for you. Again we do apologize for the misunderstanding and actions of the front desk. We are glad that you were able to get your bags and wait in the lobby until pick up time. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Drove down for 2 nights of Disney fun. Last minute booking but a great stay overall.  Still in walking distance of the park with a Starbucks, CVS and Walgreens just down the street.  The walk to the park was a bit farther for little ones but the Disney parking lot was only about a block away so we walked to the bus stop in the lot and took that to the park and back, so much better after 16 hours at the park.  Small pool which we didn't use. Sadly I asked for a later check out and all they could offer was check out at 1200 instead of 1100.  Overall a very good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to know that your stay was amazing. We do have the Toy Story Parking lot a block away, so you are welcome to take that bus to the parks; of course, it is under your discretion, just because that parking lot is for people who pay to park and they will use the same bus to go to the parks. I do apologize for the late check out that wasn't granted to you. Unfortunately, the regular checkout time is at 11:00 am and the late-out, if requested, is at 12:00pm. There is nothing later than that. I'm sorry, those are hotel policies. We thank you for staying here, and a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Wouldn't come back if the room was free!
Summary: For the price, I should've known it would've been horrible but there wasn't anything else available for the night. I work in the hotel business so upon check in, I immediately did a bed bug check. The only plus was that we didn't see any (but there was plenty of other things to be grossed out about). I went to the front desk with what I had found and asked if there was anywhere else we could move to. Of course, they were completely sold out. I asked for a refund as we were staying 2 nights but couldn't find another hotel that night to move to. We literally stayed out all night so we  could spend the minimum amount of time in this room.  Rugs were filthy, beds were lumpy, walls needed a good scrubbing, bathroom was small and lighting was dim, half the outlets didn't work,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the room not being up to your standards. We do apologize for being sold out and as a paying guest we do understand your frustration if you did not like that room. Of course, we could have given you extra alternatives, however, we us being sold out, its difficult to accommodate. Again, we do apologize. We hope that in the near future, you do give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: The rooms are so outdated I think the bedspreads and curtains were from when the hotel opened. The outlets are so old that you can't charge your phones because the plugs just fall out. The shower has terrible water pressure. The matteresses are so old that they are lumpy not to mention the pillows. The towels were so old that they were not white and you could see through them. The only thing good about the hotel is the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry if the room was not up to your expectations. We have plans to remodel more rooms, however, we are taking it step by step as we plan to stay open during construction.  I do want to mention that the front desk lobby is open 24 hours, so anything you were not happy about we could have helped, again, we could have given you alternative options for your stay if you were very unhappy. When you are in Anaheim in your next visit please feel free to come and visit. Thank you

Summary Heading: The room smelled badly of mold & dampness, bed was...
Summary: The room smelled badly of mold & dampness, bed was unsleepable , just because the hotel is close to Disneyland does not mean they have to lack all services
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. We are sorry for the issues you say you had, we wished those were reported the moment you encountered them, so we could have given you some alternative options for your convenience. We do apologize, again, and hope you do give us another chance to redeem ourselves the next time you come to Anaheim. We thank you and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Another review says "unenthusiastic but nice enough check-in staff".  Nailed it.    First floor room was just damp.  Heard every footstep from room above. Room was located right next to the room they changed into the "free breakfast" room, so at 6am, everyone came chattering up to the door and banging around their suitcases before they checked out. Haven't seen tile like they had in the bathroom since the early 70s.  I suspect I was given the worst room in the hotel because of excessively cheap price from Hotwire.    Third floor room on street side missing a window (double-paned, so it wasn't open to the world) but all the sound came in.    Most important to note: both rooms had useless safety latches that weren't screwed into framing, only drywall, and they were both floating
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review Traveler _Dis. We do apologize for the noise that the breakfast had in the morning. We do have our "Free Continental Breakfast" at that time 6am - 10am. So a lot of our guests go straightaway to the breakfast right when it opens. We are glad that we have guests like yourself, where you can point out what the rooms need so for our renovation time, we can go ahead and work on what needs updating. Again we thank you, and we are sorry to hear that you wont be staying with us anymore. We do hope in the future, when we do renovate, and have the rooms up to your standards, you do come by and stay with us for a lovely stay. Thank you and have an great day!

Summary: Horrible accommodations, nothing like what's pictures on the website. The tub had rust, the shower didnt work, stains on the comforters, water damage on the roof burn lightbulb on one of the lamps. Even the cable tv kept going out. Breakfast was a couple of old toast and mini muffins that run out at 7:00 am. Not worth $5 a night do yourself a favor and stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: We thank you for your lovely review. When you came to check in, you asked to see our rooms, and we showed them to you. You were not pleased on the first floor room, so we had asked what floor you prefer? We had the second and third floor available, and you said second floor. You specifically said that you would be back later for the keys. Now, you were here for 1 night on your gofast points. You mentioned that you wanted a very new remodeled room, however, those rooms are in a different category rooms from the standard 2 Queens beds you were booked for. I'm sorry you did not get what you wanted, but those rooms are not available for gofast points rate even if you are a Wyndham Rewards member like you asked. After I told you that, you were mentioning about cancelling your reservation, however, due to the Wyndham's policy, you cannot cancel the same day because you would have been charged either way. Now, I do want to apologize for the issues you experienced. I did wish these were reported the moment you encountered them so we could have taken time to correct them and help you the best way possible for your stay, if we could have gotten the chance, of course. As for our Continental Breakfast, we have the basic breakfast; coffee, milk, orange, cranberry, apple juice, mini muffins, Danishes, cereal, oatmeal, bread for toast and they'll make waffles there for you upon request. They start at 6am - 10am so I don't understand they wouldn't have anything? After you had called Corporate for not accommodating you on the Renovated/Remodeled room, we did get in contact with you were we emailed you. We emailed an apology for the miscommunication during your time of booking. If it didn't show up online as available, its because we didn't have it open since they were being used. We also mentioned you may request a renovated room with an agent, however, a request does not mean it will be guaranteed. Unfortunately, like your case, we did not have it available. We do appreciate and respect your opinion and not staying with us. We thank you, however. And in hopes you do come back, we'll know you will request a remodel room, we will be happy to accommodate. Thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Literally one of the worst places I have ever stayed  We planned a last minute Disney weekend to get out of the foggy city for a while, and booked this place through Expedia. The pics online looked decent, and at $199/night it was a semi-good deal as I heard there were multiple conventions at the same time in the area. After pulling up to the lobby, we were rudely checked in by two of the most unimpressed and bored hotel clerks I have ever seen. The one gal that finally looked up to make eye contact told me I was checking in too early. I told her that was totally fine and we could go to the park and check back later. She then said, "No, your room is ready now." Slightly confused, we got our key (in a reused, wrinkled,taped paper key holder) and found our room.  Realizing it was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to write your review. We apologize for the room not being up to your standards. We will follow up with this room and make sure everything is running smooth. We will share this review with our staff to let them know how they are doing and how they can also improve on their service. Once again, we thank you. HAve a lovely day!

Summary: To be honest I was a bit worried about this hotel after reading all of the reviews.  However, if you keep in mind, you are booking a 2 star property, perhaps you won't be disappointed.  the front desk staff was kind and courteous.  Room was clean although dated.  They are in the process of remodeling.  Best of all, you can walk to the convention center in about 10-15 mins.   I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we do hope that you come back next time you visit Anaheim. We are in the process of renovating and hopefully we will finish before the holidays. We thank you and have a lovely day!

Summary: Terrible service.  Rooms were not ready and had no towles.  Refrigerator and AC did not work.   Curtains were ripped .Manager and staff never returned my calls.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing your review.We apologized for the experience you had. On the day of arrival, you had some request where the property did accommodate your request of the time of check in. You also stated that the refrigerator was not working, which we acted in a speedy manor, and we noticed your refrigerator was working properly in your room. We were in communication with you, as well as our cooperate office in numerous occasions about your issues that you had encountered. If you would like to discuss this any further please contact the hotel directly. Thank you

Summary Heading: Worst hotel we've ever stayed in
Summary: We had cockroaches and spiders in our room, crumbs on the carpet from the last guest, cracked and beat up walls, stains on the pillows, and someone tried to get into our locked room at about 1am. You could also hear every step of every person upstairs. Next time, we will pay the extra money for a hotel we can count on.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing your review on your stay here with us. First and foremost we would like to apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay. This is very alarming to hear as we take our guests' experiences very seriously. We like for our guests to have a pleasant stay.  I would like to discuss this matter further with you please contact the hotel directly at your earliest convenience. Thank you and have a good day.

Summary Heading: Saw a bug. Just one. But that's enough.
Summary: Close to Disneyland. Unenthusiastic but nice enough check in staff. Dark room. One light very dim. Saw a bug scurrying when I opened a drawer. Had to go buy pillows at target down the street since travel lodge's were so bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very sorry for what you have experienced. We feel things like these should have been reported to have taken any action upon it immediately. We do have a front desk that is open 24 hours if anything is needed. Again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Thank you for your time and for staying with us.

Summary: So disappointed. Staff are unfriendly. The sheets are itchy. The breakfast is terrible. We saw a spider crawling on the ceiling. I told the front desk agent when we checked out. She just said "I will let them know", she did not say apologize at all. 🕷
Manager Response: Thank you for your your feedback. We are truly sorry for what you encountered here during your stay. Anything our guests need, we encourage them to call and  report anything wrong with your room. Again, we do apologize for that. We hope that in the near future you can stay with us again giving us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you

Summary: Property in need of repair, spa broken, some lights in room and outside not working. Front desk not friendly, more like i was bothering them
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time in writing your review and letting us know about your stay with us. The spa and pool have been operable for he last 3 months, I'm sorry if anything was wrong with it. You can always call the front desk, we are open 24 hours. I do apologize for the interaction with the front desk if it wasn't the friendliest, however, I will note it and share this review with them to let them know how we are doing and how we can also improve, so I thank you for that and also apologize for that. We will be renovated some time soon and I will take your feedback in consideration to know what else we can do as try to and renovate. I really do much appreciate your words and please accept our most sincerest apology for your stay. Thank you

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel before due to how close it is to disneyland but this time I felt the room we had was in pretty bad shape. It looked pretty run down and needed some love. The wallpaper was peeling, the the outlets would work partially, the a.c. was archaic, and the bathroom was dingy from being old. Other rooms didn't seem this bad so I know the hotel isn't horrible so I guess they just need to remodel a few rooms. Of course the price tells me I shouldn't expect much so I wasn't upset. It was good enough to sleep in a shower for the next day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your time in writing this. Eventually we will renovate but we are taking baby steps to get there as we plan to stay open during that time. We are glad to know this hotel worked for you and we hope you can come bak and stay with us in the near future... Thank you

Summary Heading: A sad commentary on the state of the hotel industry
Summary: This hotel is a shame on its brand name. From the drab and dated appearance of reception to the worn out condition of the guestrooms, one has to wonder how low the bar must be set for this property to garner even a single "average" rating. The exterior is in bad condition; ornamental tiles have slipped from the stucco, smashing out the roof tiles below (some time ago, by the looks of it), stairwell lighting is out of order, paint is peeling from the cracked walkways, overworked ice makers, dead vending machines and toilet plungers decorate the elevator lobby. The elevator? Well, let's just say "it worked." Graffiti is deeply engraved on the fake wood interior, the permit is long gone with the frame bent beyond repair. It has the filthiest floor this side of a beachside bar

I read the reviews and I should have believed them.  We got an extreme discount, but it was still not worth it.  Broken lights, wifi, chair to the desk, ice machine.  Dirty pool area and pool.  Maintenance man with too much information.  Only benefits..... close to Disneyland and staf was nice. DO NOT COME TO THIS HOTEL.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Travelodge and for taking the time to rate our property. We appreciate feedback from guests like you and we use it to improve our service and property facilities. We do apologize for the issues you had, and wished that these were brought up once experienced it. We could have offered alternative options for your convenience. Again, we do apologize and hope in the near future when we renovate, you can come back and have a better experience. Thank you and have a lovely day

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed here and both times have been good experiences. The rooms are big, the beds are comfortable and the ART stop for the bus to take you to Disneyland is right outside the motel. The A/C worked great and was nice to come back to after a hot day walking around the parks.   The place is definitely no frills, with a continental breakfast that is pretty barebones. Waffles, cereal, coffee, mini muffins and milk and juice. Enough to tide you over to lunch but nothing fancy.   The pool and hot tub area look nice and clean though we didn't use them.   For the price and convenience it's definitely a win and I will stay there again if the price stays low. But if the prices get higher there are much nicer places to stay in the same area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your most honest review and taking your valuable time to write this. We are so pleased to see that you had an amazing visit with us here at the Travelodge. We are always looking forward to have guests return and have an excellent second or third stay here. We hope that you always stay with us whenever you are in the area. Hope to see you again! Thank you Have a lovely day!

Summary: Nice, Comy beds.  Rooms need to be updated like the curtains and bed comforters.  They look old and curtains had holes.  But we liked how there was a fridge and microwave in the room.  Disneyland is about a mile away so still quite a distance from Disneyland. they offer a bus but its almost 6 bucks per person...So more convenient to just take an uber.  But overall good.
Manager Response: Thank you dear guest for your kind and honest review. We are looking forward to all renovations coming our way. Of course, they will be little by little as we plan to stay open during any construction being done. We do have the ART bus that picks outside our hotel or there always is the Toy Story Parking Lot option. We are happy to know that your stay was pleasant and we do hope to see you again when you visit Anaheim..

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE - THE ABSOLUTE WORST!!
Summary: This was absolutely the WORST experience ever!  The place was disgusting.  Our bathtub had backed-up sewage in it.  The room was dingy - beds horrible - TV from the 80s - etc. The staff could care less - they were extremely rude and clueless!  AND, they have the nerve to charge $120 a night?!  I will NEVER stay here or at any other Travelodge EVER again.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for your time in writing this review.  As we strive to provide customer service and have our guests have an amazing stay, seems like we have failed you. We understand your frustration and want you to accept our sincerest apology. I do want to let you know that we are going to share this with our staff to let them know how we are doing and how we can improve as well. As for our nightly rates, everyday is different, and summer being our highest and busiest season yet, the rates will be high in this property and any other hotel in the Disneyland resort, I'm sorry about that. We respect your decision on not staying at any Wyndham's Travelodge we do thank you again and apologize.

Summary: The property is close to the Disneyland Resort and transportation to the resort is within walking distance.  The parking lot is extremely crowded - some vehicles blocked others from exiting. Parking is extremely limited.   Our room was damp and musty. We had 1 set of bath towels.We ended up getting a case of the bed bugs which came home with us.   We've stayed at Wyndham properties before and have always left happy and satisfied with our stays. This one was not one of those stays.
Manager Response: We like to thank you for having the time and writing your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. You are right, we are walking distance to the Disneyland Resort; it is about 15-20 minutes walking distance. Unfortunately, the way the hotel was build, the parking is very limited, however, we do have a security at night who is always making sure everything is okay and looking out for you to have somewhere to park. I do want to let you know that the front desk is open 24 hours, so anything that was becoming an issue at the time of your stay, something should have been reported to the front desk. We could have helped with alternative options for your convenience. As for the bed bugs you claim you had, we did a full inspection on the room, we had professionals come and double inspect as well, and there were no signs of any insects you claim you had. Now, if you would like a copy of the inspection please contact the property itself. We thank you for staying with us. Have a blessed day!

Summary Heading: should have read the reviews first
Summary: Terrible experience. Most uncomfortable bed I have ever laid in. The pillows should be thrown away. I had to go buy a pillow so I could attempt to sleep. Not sure why but, my room had no pictures on the wall, no stopper in the sink, and nothing in the bottom of the shower to keep from slipping. I peeked in other rooms when doors were open and the other rooms had pictures on the wall and better bedding than what we had. My opinion of the room is that it was a room that was not even supposed to be rented out. I cut my trip short just to get out of the room. When I told the girl at the desk about the room she could care less. I asked her if I would get a refund for the night that I would not be spending there and she said "NO" but I would however get my deposit refunded to me!!!

I would not stay here again. we only had 1 set of towels in our room, I called front desk, they never answered. Hours later I called again and asked for more towels (there were 4 of us in the room) and the desk told me to come to them to get them. I went and they gave me 3 towels- not even sets of towels. Just 3. Room was kind of dingy. Overall not impressed with anything. At c/o I wanted to pay cash for portion of charge, and clerk made it seem impossible and a huge struggle to apply cash and refund credit card. Also was surprised breakfast didn't have a single piece of fruit available. Not horrible but, not great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We understand that your experience was not a great one. We are sincerely sorry. Seems like we did fail in some sort of way and we do apologize for that. Most of the time when our guests want towels and housekeeping has left, we do have them available at the front desk. There are times where we are busy, and unfortunately we cannot leave the front desk. I will double check and investigate what really happened here. Again, I apologize. Also, I know you mentioned about paying cash at the end of your stay. We can do refunds if you want to pay cash in the end, however, because payments are done at check-in, the refund will take up to 7 business days. I feel that, that might have been the reason why the front desk agent didn't want to do it. It just takes longer than previously anticipated. Again, we thank you for making your review and we do apologize. Thank you

Summary Heading: Overall lodge was very nice.  I stayed in a handicap access...
Summary: Overall lodge was very nice.  I stayed in a handicap access room only because that was what was available online. The shower gutter between the floor and shower floor was extremely dirty with black dirty grout.  Toilet seat was worn of paint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if the room was not up to your expectations. We thank you for bringing up the issues that you encountered with the room so we can get to work right away. We are sorry for the cosmetic problems with the room and we hope that this does not get in the way of you coming back. We greatly appreciate your words and we hope to see you soon! Thank you

Summary: Hot Tub did not work, in bathroom there were plaster spots all over not repainted, shower was falling off wall, bad internet service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sad to know you were not satisfied with your stay. We wish these things were mention the minute you checked in to offer you other alternative options. We do apologize for falling short on your expectations. We hope that you can stay with us in the near future as we plan to renovate. Thank you and have a lovely day.

Summary: Not so happy again! Gave them another try! Customer service stinks! This time found a top of hypo needle stuck in the wall ! We were scared to walk around the room & sit or lay on anything, checked out early and told them as I was checking out , not a sorry! Or Can we make it up, just I will let someone know, with a bad attitude to me!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We do apologize for not offering an alternative option and falling short on your expectations. Things like these should be mentioned as you are checking out so we can have a clear idea of what is the reason and seeing if we can have a solution to the problem. We hope in the future you can stay with us as we plan to renovate rooms. Thank you.

Summary: The room is good, the microwave has a problem popping popcorn, the toilet clogs often, don't expect good wifi either (works when it wants to). The hot tub is cold. The breakfast is doable. Service is good though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Seems like you were satisfied with your stay. We do apologize for the microwave not working properly.  We do have maintenance on site if you did need it, we could have had him take a look at that. We do thank you for staying here at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and again, we apologize for those inconveniences. Have a lovely day!

Summary: Ceiling tiles had water stains room smelled bad bathroom was not clean properly and tub was clogged, wifi didn't work and they need to have more than waffles maybe add some fruits.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. I am happy to mention that we do have more renovations coming our way, however, we are taking it step by step to work on them. Moreover, we do apologize for the experienced you had. We do have a front desk open 24 hours where you can report anything that is wrong with your stay. So again we do apologize and we hope you can stay with us in the near future where we plan to renovate some more rooms and give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you once again.

Summary: Bed mattress was filthy and thin sheets failed to even cover-up the black spots on the mattress. Property generally appeared run-down and room furnishings badly needed cleaning and/or replacement.  By contrast, the La Quinta, a couple of miles north and closer to Disneyland on Clementune street is larger, brighter and much more appealing and only 75% of the cost.  We will not stay here again.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking your time in this review. We want to mention that we are in the process of renovating the property. I do want to invite you back to stay with us, after all renovation is done. So your stay will be an enjoyable one. We do respect your review/opinion on not staying with us anymore. However, with renovations coming our way we do want you to give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you and once again, we apologize for the issues you did encountered.

Summary Heading: Close to Disney but nothing else going for it
Summary: Hotel staff was inconsiderate. One employee had an ear bud in her ear the whole time I spoke with her.  Rooms are really dated and gross looking with water stains, chipped tiles, etc. No fridge in the room, just a microwave that didn't work half the time. Out dated A.C. unit that took FOREVER to cool the room off.  Will say that the ART pick up is right out front so getting to Disney was easy.  I really cant even say you get what you pay for as i think we  overpaid for this hotel. Shoudlve been a lot cheaper.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for the issues you had experienced. For future reference, if you are not happy at all with the room or anything during your stay please let us know. Please do not wait until the end, because that will let us know that your stay was not a happy one, and if we do get a chance to accommodate you or correct any issue you had, that would let us know we are doing are best to get everything situated for you and for your stay to be enjoyable. We thank you for staying with us, and hope in the near future when we do remodel you can come back.

Summary: Our room looked nothing like the one o  the website that we booked on , it was very outdated,  water stains on the ceiling, and walls, the bed very uncomfortable and sagging in the middle, woke up with a sore back , I was expecting the room I booked which looked all brand new,
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We apologize if we didn't meet with your expectations. We are going through some renovations, as we speak, so most of our renovated rooms are not going to be available. All pictures on the websites, most of them are from our suites. We apologize for the miscommunication, but it does state it. We hope you can stay with us when all renovations are done. Again, we apologize and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay this was our 2nd ataybat the hotel and I'm sure their will be many more.  Hotel  is very clean and staff is very friendly I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review. We are happy to know that your stay was fantastic! We hope that any time you return to Anaheim, you can come back and visit us! Again, we thank you and hope for your return!!

Summary Heading: Rooms are not as they apprear in the pictures
Summary: The room was very old stinky and noisy and there was no flat screen TV. If I would have expected an old dirty room it wouldn't have been that bad but I was expected a clean remodeled room. Even the worst room in the pics was better than our room. The room wasn't horrible but when your expecting something else it's very disturbing. If your expecting an old room then the stay is fine and the location is great.
Manager Response: I want to start off and say we are sorry for not meeting up with your expectations. We understand that not all rooms have a TV flat screen. We are in the process up upgrading the property, however, in order to do that, we have to do it baby steps so we can stay open at the same time. Again, we do apologize. I do want to mention that we do have a front desk open 24 hours, so if you were not happy with your stay, these issues could have been avoided and correct, given the opportunity, of course. We are sorry we didn't have that chance. We hope next time yo are in Anaheim, we get the chance to see you here again. Thank you

Summary: This hotel was really average. It was decently clean, but the staff isn't very friendly and the pool is not working. It was fine for one night but I who'd thought stay here again because there are a lot more friendly places to stay for the same price in the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. How unfortunate to hear about your experience here at Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. I do want to mention that the service you receive is not what we offer here. I apologize for that and I will investigate further on what really happened. Again, we are truly sorry. Also, I am surprise that you say the pool is out of order when we have opened it. Overall, we do thank you for staying with us.

Summary: First, not recognized as Wyndham rewards at check in. 3 bath towels and one washcloth only for double room-told it was policy. Microwave did not work and the coffee maker broken as well. Breakfast without any protein; no eggs, bacon, sausage or even yogurt.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your feedback. I want to say thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards Member. I want to remind you that every hotel is different since it is independently own and its franchise. So the policy we have here for the towels can be different from other hotels. As for the microwave and coffee maker, I do apologize if it was not working up to your standards. We try and encourage all guests to report anything wrong with the room or amenities so we can have a chance to correct them. So guests can call from their room and not come all the way down demanding towels and anything else that is need; ex. coffeemaker not working or not having filters for it? Right? We want to make sure anything you need is taken care of. Most Wyndham Hotels have continental breakfast which includes the basic breakfast which is coffee, milk, juices (orange, apple, cranberry), hot tea, cereal, oatmeal, muffins, danishes, and they will make waffles there for you. Continental Breakfast is not a whole, hot breakfast. If it was a miscommunication with you and your reservation representative, he or she should have told you. Again, we thank you for being a Wyndham Rewards Member and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I was unfortunately disappointed with my stay at this Travelodge. My room was in desperate need of a remodel, with rusted and water stained fixtures in the bathrooms, peeling paint, really really outdated decor, outlets that did not work,  and stained bed spreads. I honestly was completely surprised that Wyndham would put theit name on this hotel. The staff was the ONE positive attribute for this hotel. It is definitely not worth the price point.

Summary Heading: Rude lady in the front desk.Couldnt sleep comfortable people kept banging the door people screaming.
Summary: A very rude lady in the front desk when I checked in she made it uncomfortable to ask anything or else she'll give you this face!she looked mad the whole time I was checking in.Then at night when I was trying to sleep I kept hearing bangs on the door people screaming and offcourse I was scared for my two year old daughters safety since it was a family trip to Disneyland.
