Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I do apologize for the inconveniences for your stay. I will double check and investigate furthermore into this issue with the front desk. We do offer our sincerest apologies for this. As for the night issue, unfortunately, we don't have control of what is to happen outside. But I do want to mention that we do have s security on site that walks around and makes sure everything is under control. We thank you for staying with us and hope you can come and visit soon. Thank you and again, we apologize.

Summary: Didn't like some of the issues. One lamp did not work. The door didn't close correctly. TV not working properly. No elevator. Breakfast very poor; just cereal and coffee. Not even an average stay. Not recommended!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We greatly appreciate it. I'm sorry to hear some of the things in the room did not work properly for you. I wish these issues were reported so we could have had addressed immediately for your convenience. We do have a Maintenance team on property for any inconveniences that may happen. I do want to mention that we do have an elevator, I am not sure if you were unformed. If you were, I truly apologize. As for the breakfast, we have muffins, danishes, cereal, oatmeal and they do make fresh hot waffles there at your request. We also have Orange, cranberry and apple juices. Milk and of course, coffee. Again, I apologize if you were not informed correctly. If you have any questions, please feel free to call the property. Again, we do apologize and we do hope you can visit us soon. Thank you

Summary Heading: It's a bed and a shower with free breakfast
Summary: We have stayed here several times when visiting Disneyland.  It's nothing fancy but we are only there to sleep, shower and eat breakfast so it's fine for us.  The staff has always been friendly and helpful but slow if you need anything.  We always request a pack and play when we book, call ahead to assure it is on the reservation, but have never had it in our room when we arrived.  We've had to ask again at check-in everytime and they will eventually bring it but it is often a long wait.   The room is a standard 2 beds and a bathroom.  The water is usually hot and has okay pressure.  The rooms have a mini fridge and microwave which is great to cut down on food costs at Disneyland.  We always hit a grocery store and get snacks and stuff to make peanut butter & jelly sandwiches.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are happy to hear that we have returning guests. I am sorry to hear that the front desk is slow, we always try and be on top of things, so do apologize for that. Updated Note: As for the parking, we haven't been linked to Denny's over a year so we don't have our guests park next door anymore. Also, everyday we do have Continental Breakfast which includes your basic: coffee, milk, juices; apple, cranberry, and orange. Cereal, muffins, danishes, oatmeal, and they will make fresh, hot waffles there for you. I do apologize the service you got from the breakfast attendant, I will, moreover, I will investigate and make sure what exactly is going on with our breakfast service. I do thank you for your time and again , we do apologize. Hope to see you soon. Thank you

Summary Heading: Thankfully it was only one night!
Summary: From the street this property looks good but in reality it's very old and run down. There is an impressive archway pull through from the street where you check in. Only the left side was open and the other side was closed down and filled with junk like a storage place. The check in process was okay except when I asked where the elevator was in relation to our room ( I have breathing problems and can't climb stairs) I was told it was at the opposite end of the hotel. We asked to be moved to another room closer and we were told a room would available in about a half hour, no problem with that. We went next door to Denny's and had a bite to eat. When we came back the room was ready so we checked in. If you plan to stay here be aware that the place is very old and needs a remodel
No internet connection until the next morning. I pay for a location that advertises free internet, I expect internet!

Only good thing about this place is it is a short walk to the Disney Bus. We felt unsafe there, door looked like it had been kicked in and had been fixed numerous times, no laundry, told out of order, spa not working, plumbing bad toilet over flowed twice and we were told it was because of old plumbing, just great, reluctant to use it after that! Final straw came when mad man in room next to us yelling he was going to kill everyone and F...k the Disney people staying there, so called Police as too scared to leave room. So at great expense we moved out for our last three nights, as no refund offered! Don't even want to give it one star but have to so I can post this!

My husband checked in 3 days earlier,  when I arrived was not informed there was a flood in the toilet so was upgraded,  I had to ask for a fridge, new room nice our friends room not too good,  though cleaned well,  thought it was closer too Disneyland,  not a very nice breakkie,  staff not friendly.
It's a good place to stay in just for a night or 2, but not for week stay or more. Affordable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay. We hope that in the near future you do come back and visit! Once again, we thank you.

Summary: If looking for a hotel near Disney, this is it! Good distance down the street. The room was really good too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing your feedback. We are so happy to hear that your stay was amazing. We thank you for staying with us. We do hope that you do come back and visit us again!

Summary: I think it's a well value for money. Continental beakfast is incluided (waffles, oatmeal, coffee, juices, milk, cereal, etc.). Personnel is kind.  If going to Disneyland this hotel it's in front of a ART (Anaheim Resort Transportation) bus stop both ways so it is very convenient. There is a Denny's restaurant next door and there are a lot of stores and restaurants close by. You can even walk to them. I was very satisfied with the price I paid.

Due to heavy traffic, we arrived late at night & the front desk guy, Omar, was so welcoming and friendly and made me feel right at home! He was great and patiently answered all my questions! The rooms are not as up to par with others in the area, ( old tv's, poor wifi, rough sheets) but the staff's friendly attitude helps subside the hotel's flaws. The breakfast lady Lupe, was the nicest, sweetest, woman who waited on us better than the waitress at the Dennys next door. GREAT STAFF AND FRIENDLY SERVICE!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We also want to thank you for taking your time and giving us great feedback on our service. We do try and strive for giving great satisfying service, and accommodate our guests on the best we can. I do want to mention that we have plans to keep renovating our property, but we do have to pause as the holidays come in and as the season slows down, then we should be back on track. We do hope that you do come back as you visit Anaheim! Thank you once again, have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Review of Trvel Lodge Convention Center Anaheim,CA
Summary: They redid the decor in the room I had and I liked it. the toilet is so low to the floor that it is not good for elderly people or anyone with hip, knees , back problems. Convenient location. I did not avail myself of breakfast this time but it was good in prior years.

The only real problem with the room was that there wasn't  good lighting anywhere, especially in the bathroom. Men need adequate light to shave and women need light to apply make-up. One dim flourescent tube wont do it.  The best feature was the complimentary breakfast. Good selection and adequate amounts provided.
Manager Response: We want to thank you for your time and writing your review. We do wish that these minor issues were reported so we could have addressed them immediately. We thank you for our compliment on our breakfast. We know it is Continental, and we do carry the basic comfort of hot fresh waffles made as you order them, cereal, oatmeal, danishes, muffins, and we do have coffee, milk, and juices; between orange and cranberry juice. Once again, we thank you and we do hope you can visit us as you come back to Anaheim. Thank you

Summary: I have stayed at many Travelodge locations in my life, and this was by far the most disappointing.  I don't want to write a big scathing review, I would just urge Wyndham/Travelodge to update the parking, exterior appearance, systems, and room finishes/decor.  It was certainly dated and poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time. We are very sorry we did not meet up to your standards and expectations. I do want to mention that we do have the front desk open 24 hours, and we always encourage guests to call and/or report if they are not happy with their room or if there is any issues that they are experiencing that we can help on. Again, we do apologize for any inconveniences, we thank you and we do hope that we can get another chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way that you deserve. Thank you

Summary: Room was in need of a renovation. Everything old. Room was musty smelling. Will never go there again! The only highlight, staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing a review and letting us know how we are doing. I do want to mention that we are going through renovations. We are doing the pool and spa as we speak, so I know that that was not available as you stayed here. We are going to renovate more rooms with time, but however, we want to focus on doing them step by step  because remember, we are open during construction. Again, we thank you and we do apologize for any inconveniences you experienced.

Summary Heading: Nice stay for our trip to Disneyland
Summary: The room was basic but nice.  My wife found 4 ants on the sink top the first night but we didn't see anymore after that.  That kind of soured the trip in her mind.    Breakfast was pretty good, kind of a little crazy in the morning and not really organized on where things are, lots of bumping into other people to get things.  I think if they lost the island and organized better it would flow better.  I would stay there again if the price was right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to know that you would be returning. I do wish, however, that if any of these issues happening at that moment, could have been reported to address them immediately. We thank you for your time, and  do want to mention that I will share this review with the breakfast staff so they can know how they are doing and also how they can improve. Thank you once again, and we do apologize for these inconvenience.

Summary Heading: For the price, this hotel was great!
Summary: The breakfast could've been better but waffles, cereal and oatmeal did just fine. Expected a parking fee but they didn't charge me so I was pleasantly surprised about that! It was a 9 minute walk to the toy story parking lot where we hopped on the free Disneyland shuttle so that was great as well. For $55/night, you can't beat it! Basic but we just sleep there :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are glad to know that you were happy and satisfied about your stay. We hope to see you again, as you visit Anaheim! Thank you very much

Summary: As Diamond member I would've thought they would've given me a much nicer room or at least one with a flat screen t.v. our room had a tube t.v. I don't always go by what the reviews say about a place because as an employee in a hotel myself I know guests lie because they don't get what they want. Room 132 the door didn't lock (maintenance did come and fix it), all the outlets in the room except the one by the sink were loose and a charger wouldn't stay plugged in, the room above us sounded like there was a herd of bulls stampeding all hours of the night (didn't bother complaining). When I checked out and told the front desk agent Alexandra all she said is if I wanted a copy of my receipt, all i wanted was an apology after i stated my issues and I would've been ok and wouldn't be

Summary Heading: Hotel was okay expected alot more
Summary: Arrived 2 hours after check in and room wasn't ready. Never heard an apology instead they told me that can give me a different room in the older section of the hotel. Assuming its the non remodel part of it. Hotel shower looked like it was about to collapse. Walls in the room weren't clean. We were there for the dental convention and when we asked if we could leave our car there after check in for an extra hour we were told our car would be towel. I had three rooms her and none of the guest were satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time to write this review. We always appreciate all feedback. We do apologize for any issues that seemed that you had. You were here for 3 rooms, and you were not satisfied, I wish any issues you had, had been reported immediately to address them as soon as possible. With that being said, we cannot know, if you are satisfied or not if nothing is being reported. We do apologize once again for the late check-in, and for the issues. We hope when you visit Anaheim again, you come and visit us so we can redeem ourselves.  Have a lovely day!

Summary: When we visit the theme parks, we try to get a place to stay for a night or two..and is pretty much a place to sleep and shower. A breakfast and free parking are nice amenities. This place provides those but it gives you an awful feeling of EWWWWW..and yuck from our kids. The property and rooms (we got 2 rooms) seemed like its not being cleaned at all. Mold all over the bathroom hardware. Patches of unfinished paint on walls and ceilings. The beddings and carpets are stained and ripped..The towels seemed like its 5 years old. The room is like 15 years old dated. If you spent all day in the theme parks and just looking forward to a nice, fresh and clean room to sleep into- this is NOT the place. Sure you get what you pay for, but come on- you gotta draw the line between decency
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to review your most recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We are working hard to correct our issues that our property has. The property is currently under renovations, and we are working diligently to improve it. We take our guests' feedback seriously. Should you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact the hotel directly. We thank you for your time and once again, we sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations. We hope in the future that you may give us a second chance. Thank you

Summary Heading: A nice longer walk to Disneyland but walkable.
Summary: Nice clean affordable rooms. Kind staff. Breakfast area was clean and orderly but didn't have fruit eggs or yogurt. Everything else was above my expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. We hope as you visit this city again, you dropped by and visit us! Again, we thank you.

Summary: Room and facilities were clean and basic. Comfortable beds and very close to Disneyland (Walking distance for most, but probably not for families with very young kids at the end of a long day at the Park). Front desk staff was not friendly at all, didn't see her smile the whole three days we were there. Pool is under construction for a few months. Thsi hotel was a great value for being so close to Disneyland.

My family goes to Disneyland 3-5 times a year and are always looking for a room close by that's not ridiculously priced because we really only sleep in it.. the rest of the time were at the parks. This room was perfect for that. I loved that the beds weren't right next to the door and they accommodated us easily for my need for a 1st floor room. We'll be back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay and also to mention that you will be returning with us. Once again, we thank you and hope to see you soon when you visit Anaheim!

Summary: Good location, good price, could be more clean, shower took 5 minutes to warm up, the WiFi did not work at all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize if you did encounter these issues during your stay. I do wish these issues were brought up to the front desk so we can go ahead and address them immediately. I do want to share with you that we are going under renovations and upgrading as well, so We do hope you come back and let us redeem ourselves to serve you the way you deserve as these changes are done to the property. Thank you and once again, we apologize.

Summary: We were looking for something inexpensive as we were checking in late and leaving early, so a bed and breakfast was all we needed. We should have spent a few more dollars and gone elsewhere. I found a couple of bugs, the shower barely worked, I don't think we had clean sheets, and the "hot breakfast" consisted of some hard waffles that had been sitting out. I'd suggest staying elsewhere. Good thing we didn't want to swim... the pool was out of service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry you feel this way. Makes us feel we failed in some kind of way. We do wish these issues you encountered could have been reported so we could have addressed them immediately. We could have given you alternative options for your convenience as well. It is not a good idea to wait at the end when all we want is for you to feel comfortable where you are staying at. Again, we do apologize and we hope that with time you do return and lets us start again one more time. Thank you.

Summary: This is one of our favorite hotels to stay at when we go to Disneyland. It's not fancy but the beds are comfy, it's always clean and it's close to the park. It's usually at a good price too
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review. We are happy to see guests return because they are always satisfied and happy with their stay. We hope to see you soon! Again, we thank you!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: One of the cheaper place we found to stay for 4 nights over spring break trip to Disneyland. It's about 15 min walk to Disney entrance, and feels like a long walk when the kids are tired at night. But the price was right.  The lady who checked us in didn't look very friendly, but it may be just that one on the night shift. The breakfast is not bad with hot waffles.  The worst thing was probably the air cond, which seemed very old and the controls are minimal. When it comes on, it's like train passing through! We had problem with the wifi and unable to pick up reception almost the entire time we stayed. The drawer of the table that was in our room somehow couldn't close (see photo), but I guess that's not so bad with respect to the air cond.  Overall, though, we probably would
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We apologize for the issues you you experienced during your stay. We hope that that does not stop you from coming back. We just hope that you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves, when you come back to visit Anaheim again. We apologize again, and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Travelodge Anaheim convention center Inn.  Our family booked two rooms at the Travelodge.  Our plans were to relax and spend time at the pool for the majority of our stay.  The Travelodge is a budget hotel!! Thanks Travelodge for the wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the feedback. We greatly appreciate it. We are happy to know that you had a wonderful stay with us and we do hope that you come back and see us again.

Summary: I've stayed here before, so I knew what to expect. It's a very cheap and convenient place, that is close to Disneyland.    There was plenty of parking, which was great and it's one door down to Denny's.    The room we had was fine. The beds are pretty hard, which is not my thing, but some people like that. It was clean, but a bit rundown looking. The one problem we had was the air conditioning. It worked just fine, but gave off some kind of odor which we found pretty unpleasant. Kept the room cool, but a bit smelly.   So, you get what you pay for here. It was just fine for the amount of time we spent at Disneyland each day. We only needed it to sleep in.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center and also for taking your time on writing this review. We are glad to know that this location worked for you as we are close to Disneyland. We do have a lot of restaurants around the area and Denny's happens to be right next door. We do apologize for the issues you encountered. We always encourage guests to call and report to the front desk if anything is wrong with their room or stay. Our front desk is open 24 hours. Again, we do apologize for that. Thank for staying with us and we hope to see you back when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed a week with our 2 kids. Adequate to sleep in and nice and close to Disneyland. We were happy to have a working fridge and air conditioning. Beds were fine. Room was clean, but very dated. No flat screen tv. Carpet dirty and in need of deep cleaning. Only good way to charge our phones was in the bathroom. All other outlets were loose. Pool was a disappointment. They said we could use it, but the heater was broken. The kids got in once, but they were freezing, plus the pool was kind of dirty. Hot tub not in working order. Bathroom clean, but small and dated. Water stains on ceiling and lots of marks/ nicks on walls.  Overall, ok for the price if you are just using it to sleep and shower during your Disney vacation. Don't expect much more.
Manager Response: Firstly, I want to say thank you for staying here at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. Also, thank you for taking your time in writing your review. We are glad to hear that your stay was a satisfying one. We apologize if the pool and spa were an inconvenience. We are under renovations as we speak, and we are trying to get all renovations ready at least before summer. Again, we do apologize and we hope you so come back and see us again so we can redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary Heading: Great for budget, great to just sleep
Summary: This hotel was great for on the budget trips. When we go to Disney we don't stay in the hotel room much, so it was okay to just sleep. The room we had was old and had holes in the wall, the toilet always got clogged and we had to always ask for a plunger, there was an old school box TV and the lighting was really dark. They really need to upgrade room 132.
Manager Response: Thank you for your much appreciated review. We do apologize for the issues you had experienced. WE are under renovations as we speak, and we hope once everything's completed, we do invite you back to enjoy all amenities. Again, we do apologize and we do thank you for staying with us. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: Everything is outdated...furnitures were dirty & curtains/blinds very dusty. Had to keep our shoes on because the carpet was sticky. We had some flying bugs & insects in our room. The outside of the hotel was filthy...trash bags outside of the trash bins. Bread, bread, & more bread for breakfast...would be nice to have some healthy fresh fruits! This place needs a complete overhaul!!! Only positive about this place is location!
Manager Response: We want to start by saying sorry for the issues you had encountered during your stay here. It sounds you were not a happy camper at all, and it makes us seem that we have failed. We truly do apologize for any inconveniences you had experienced. We would have appreciated it if you would have reported any of this during your stay to let us know how we are doing and also how we can improve as well. We thank you for your feedback and we do promise that we will work on any suggestions we do see here, and we are renovation as well, as we speak, and we invite you back as everything is done to the property. Thank you and we hope to see you back.

Summary: This hotel is fine. It was clean and quiet. I rated it average because it's a mid-level hotel and nothing extravagant was expected. For that class of hotel, I'd rate it good. Breakfast is nothing special, but it was OK and as expected. The pool was being overhauled but I knew that before I got there. I'd stay there again. It was a short walk to the Convention Center, which is why I went there. There are lots of restaurants around. Parking is free. What more could you want for the price?
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. We are renovating the pool and spa as we speak, and I do thank you for being aware of the property construction going on. We thank you for staying with is and we hope that you will stay with is again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed three nights here.  I read so many negative reviews I was really stressed out about it.  But the price was right and parking was free. Check in was smooth and no deposit is required if you pay with debit or credit card.  So the room was ok, and clean.  The beds were a little hard and pillows we brought from home.  There is a flat screen tv, microwave and fridge in the room.  Desk is old and looks worn.  It was the only eye sore in the room.  The place was not crowded or noisy and I was really surprised since it was spring break.  Breakfast was all carbs.  Waffles and cereal.  There are a few minor details that they could improve upon, but nothing too major. I would stay again.  It's close to the toy story lot so you can walk there and catch a tram for free.  They did
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. There are times when you do get stressed out for negative reviews that there are people who only focused on that and forget the positive of their stay. I thank you for being honest and I will most definitely, share this review with our housekeeping just to let them know how they are doing and also how they can improved. As for the breakfast, I know that management is aware of the selection and are in plans as we speak to improve it. Again, we thank you and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Parking was an issue everyday. Staff is rude and snobbish. If you have a room on 3rd floor there is no elevator and you will be tugging your luggage b your self. Rooms are filthy and uncomfortable. Pay more and book somewhere else. Only good part was that it is close to the Disney parking lot to get free buses and breakfast was free. Wifi was a joke.
Manager Response: Hello, and thank you for your response. Seems as you were not a happy camper. We do apologize for the issues you had experienced. We always encourage guests to call and/or report any issues if they are not happy with their rooms/ stay. We do have our front desk open 24 hours were they can provide alternative options for your convenience. You do mention that you were on the 3rd floor, seems like you were unhappy about that. We actually do have an elevator available for 2nd and 3rd floor. We also have a luggage cart near the elevator and also the front desk for the use of all of our guests, I don't understand when you say there isn't anything for you? Again, we do apologize for any inconvenience. Have a lovely day..

Summary: my stay here with my family went well. had 3 rooms all we're clean had fridge and microwave. internet a little slow. but we were busy going to Disneyland it didn't matter.  even know theirs no smoking rooms they made areas outside your door so you can.  overall this place worked for me and my family I would stay again. oh my last day I left my laptop in the room and they called me before I left the state. luckily I was at the gas station across the street. i really appreciate their honestly and calling me asap
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here. We do apologize about the Wi-Fi being slow, we are looking to upgrade and renovate our property are we are taking it step by step as we will be open during renovations. We were also happy to know that we were able to retrieve your laptop and call you right away. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future, as you visit Anaheim one more time!

Summary: We stayed here on a family vacation. We reserved two rooms and requested that they were adjoining. When we arrived the front desk didn't know which rooms were adjoining. They told my wife that if we wanted adjoining rooms she would have to go and look at the rooms herself. So my wife had to go by herself and walk to five different rooms on different sides of the property to see for herself if they were adjoining (none were).  After getting checked into our first set of rooms we found them completely unacceptable. There were tears and holes in the carpets, holes in the walls, a bug infestation and a horrible smell (in both rooms). We spoke with the front desk and changed to "better rooms" on the other side of the property.   The rooms were better in that there weren't holes in

Stayed on a Saturday,  so you have to expect the rate to be higher. The location to Disneyland was good, with a Dennys right next door.  The disappointment comes from the room.  Seriously in need of an update.  Although it was basically clean, the carpet was dirty, the bathroom showed wear on the floor with dirty base boards.  It had a small refrigerator that was not plugged in, so it took the day for it to become slightly cool, which was not good for leftovers.  I guess I would say if you're only staying 1 night it was tolerable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your staying with us and taking your time to give us your feedback. We do apologize if the room was not up to your standards. We are gong into a transition of upgrading but we are starting with our breakfast room and pool and spa since they were out of order. Hopefully soon we can start on our rooms soon. I do apologize about the refrigerator, will share this review just to make sure all staff are on the same page. I hope you can come back and give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Again, we do apologize and hope to see you soon!

Summary: We arrived late on Thursday night and were glad to find parking available.  The room was clean, if worn, and we were very comfortable.  The parking is difficult, and we were afraid to leave for fear of not finding a spot on our return, but that wasn't much of a concern given the hotel's close proximity to many restaurants and stores.  The pool and hot tub were down when we arrived, but it appeared that the pool opened during our stay, though we did not have an opportunity to visit it.  We were easily able to walk to the convention center each day, and while Disneyland isn't too far to walk there is a shuttle to Disney from the nearby parking lot very near the hotel.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay and wouldn't mind staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We do apologize for the parking situation, we are trying to come up with a solution for all of our guests, again, we are sorry. We are happy to know that the location of the hotel was a plus for your benefit on your stay here. Hopefully you can come down next year on your visit to WonderCon again! Have a lovely day!

Summary: Breakfast could of at least had done fresh fruit and maybe a bit more variety. Otherwise location great for Disneyland goers.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We are looking into bringing a little more of variety on our breakfast, we do thank you for your concern. We are happy to know your stay was a great one. Again, we thank you for staying with us and hope you come back to visit!

Summary: beds  and pillows are the most uncomfortable.  outlets are worn out and the plug for my phone charger wouldn't stay in. the lights in the bathroom were horrible, and there was pubic hair all over the bathtub.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We feel that we might have failed you in some way, since it sounds you are unhappy. We would have wished that you could have reported these issues in the beginning of your stay so we could have sorted this out for you. Again, we do apologize for the issues you have encountered. We always encourage our guests to report anything wrong with their room or even their stay. Thank you and once again, we are sincerely sorry.

Summary: Extremely loud. People yelling stomping and running in the middle of the night.   Pool closed. Breakfast room does not have enough seating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing this review. Looks like you were troubled during your stay. We always encourage everyone to report / call if there is anything wrong with their stay, or just unhappy about their surroundings. Our pool and spa are closed down due to renovations, so I do apologize for the inconvenience. As far as our breakfast, we did have it in the pool house just because we are renovation our original breakfast room. Again, please let me apologize sincerely about that, and we hope that when you visit Anaheim, you do stay with us again, as you give us a chance tor redeem ourselves and serve you the way that you deserve. Thank you and please, accept our apology.

Summary Heading: Nice staff but pretty gross, badly maintained
Summary: The maids and the ladies at the free breakfast were very nice. It's great that the wifi is free and works ok, although you have to login again too often. BUT: this place is closer to a $40 a night motel in the middle of Nevada. And you can tell that the maids are doing their best or at least a good job. But management is bad: my charger kept falling off the power socket so I had to stick a chair against it. You could see that the shower curtain rail had fallen off and had been hastily patched up. Same with the bathroom's ceiling. The button to adjust the temperature of the fridge had lost its knob, so you couldn't tell what temperature you had set it on. I mean, it really just needs some more attention. This place isn't gross because it's not clean, it's gross because I felt
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valued review. All your issues that you had, I wished that you could have reported them so we could have provided you with alternative options for your convenience. We are also aware of the cosmetic issues int he room, and we are under renovations now as we speak, we do apologize for any inconvenience that has caused during your stay. We hope you can come back to Anaheim to stay with us, and give us a chance to correct ourselves. Thank you and again, we are deeply sorry.

Summary: the hotel was good but the pool has been broken for almost 2 yrs. now. also the breakfeast was ok . wish they could fix the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize for the pool and spa being out of order. We know it might have been an inconvenience for your stay. Unfortunately, we do have posted online and we also have a friendly reminder on the front desk counter. We are aware that old management left that the things that need fixing and upgrading, so now new management has taken over and going to do that step by step. Again, we do apologize and we hope you can come back to visit us. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: Everything was ok . AC didn't work , lights are really dim , door didn't look , sketchy people , phone wasn't work either , the only thing good about this place is that it's walking distance from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time in writing this review. We are sorry to hear that you experienced issues during your stay. We really wished these issues were reported while you were here so we could have addressed them immediately. We are under renovation as we speak, so I do invite you to come back when we upgrade and renovate so you can have a different experience. Thank you and once again, we do apologize.

Summary Heading: A bed to sleep in, adequate parking.
Summary: The beds provided a decent sleep for an over night stay. That's about all you can ask for, and about all you will get. The bathroom is severely in need of a remodel but everything worked well enough. TV and internet were sufficient, and I like that the window in the room can be opened for fresh air. The parking lot provided adequate parking, and the hotel is located near plenty of restaurants, and is reasonable walking distance from the Disneyland parks. My complaint about our particular room was a dilapidated mini-fridge. Although it stayed cold, it did not stay closed. The refrigerator leaned forward rather than level, and the door magnets were so weak that it swung open under its own weight... unfortunately, I did not notice this until the next morning when I woke up to find
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time and writing this review. Sounds like your stay was a great one, with the exception of the refrigerator in you room. I truly do apologize for that. I wish that was reported to the front desk so they could have addressed it immediately. Our front desk is available 24 hours for your convenience. As for the housekeeping, they probably didn't know that you were doing a Late Check -Out that is why they kept knocking on your door. Our usual time for check-out is at 11 am. All 12 o'clock check outs are considered, Late Check-Outs, which you do have to report it to front desk or Housekeeping as they come and knock at your door. There might have been a miscommunication of some sort, so we do apologize for that. I will, however, share this review with the housekeeping supervisor so we can see how they are doing and also how they can also improve. Again, we do apologize and we thank you for staying with us.

Summary: There were dirty towels and wash cloths left from the previous guest.  The bathtub drain was clogged with hair; after cleaning that,  the tub still filled with water past my ankles while showering. Which is all pretty gross! The Internet would not stay connected for more than a minute without having to re-log on.  Hot tub has been closed for 2 years now,  when is it going to be fixed
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I would like to start to apologize for what you have experienced. We always encourage all guests to report and call if they are unhappy with their stay or anything in the room. Right now we are going through some renovations as we speak, so its all step by step and the pool and spa are next to renovate. Unfortunately, old management has left it to be renovated/ upgraded, so this new management has taken over to do the upgrade. Which we don't know how long the plans can take but we do hope its soon. Again, we apologize and we hope you can come back. Thank you.

Summary: First major problem I noticed, the hotel said they didn't get the notes to add my friend's name to the reservation.  We didn't know who was getting in first.  Turns out, she was, and they couldn't locate her name on the reservation.    Secondly, even though there was a wifi connection, it didn't work.  We called to the front desk to have them reset the router, and was told "I can't do that, we have to wait for maintenance."  Well, in the 4 days we stayed there, we were never able to access the wifi network.    Pool has been inoperable in over a year.  What gives?  Room was slightly dirty.  Bottles of soda that were not mine were found behind the nightstand and under the bed. YUCK.    On the plus side, the front desk was very nice and accommodating.  The free continental
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in giving us your feedback. We do apologize for the miscommunication of your check-in. We will double check with the front desk and investigate further on what really happened, again, we apologize. As for the Wi-Fi, I am sorry you couldn't connect to it. We always have the front desk open 24 hours for your convenience, so in any case you needed to report anything, or you couldn't connect to the Wi-Fi, the front desk agents are there to help. For any resetting the router, we cannot leave the front desk by itself, so that is why we always wait on maintenance to do it for us. Again, we do apologize and we hope that you do come back and stay with us in he near future, as you give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Only positive thing was the location
Summary: Run down, dirty hotel. Pool broke, spa broke, lobby computer broke, slow internet, disgustingly dirty rooms. The ONLY positive thing about this place is the location very near to the Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry the rooms were not up to your standards. We always encourage our guests to report or call if it seems that they are not happy with their room / stay. The front desk is open 24 hours for your convenience. The pool and spa are closed due to renovations; it is noted on our website and we also have a friendly reminder on the front desk counter. Our business center is down, however, we have a laptop here in the front desk where you can use and print if you like. We are sorry you feel that way and again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary: In My August 2015 review I said I wouldn't be back. But as being a fan of Wyndham and the Travelodge on Ball Rd. I thought "it must be better by now". To quote Moana's grandma "nope". It is still run down, little black flying bugs. They put a hold of $100 hold on my credit card. The TV os vlose to maybe a 29" definitely not a 32 " unlike most other hotels. Also Dennys no longer allows for over flow parking. Ok, now the pros. Staff was friendly, breakfast was bottom line ok. If you park your car and walk down to the Disney parking lot you can take their shuttle for free. It is about a 7 minute walk. The pool also just reopened.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if the amenities in the room were not up to your standards. As for the $100.00 Deposit you had to put down, that is actually for any incidentals or damages that may occur. Again, it is taken at check-in but it is refundable as long everything is okay in the room when you check out. We don't have over flow parking because you can still park your car here in our property and we also have a security that goes round and make sure that everything is safe. Again, we apologize and we hope that you can give us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you once again, and have a nice day!

Summary: The hotel is good - we have a clean and tidy room and breakfast service was alright. It is close to Disney parks and conveniently located close to shops and eateries. They also have water with oranges at the reception as a refreshment - nice detail.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that your stay was a pleasant one. We will definitely share this review with breakfast staff so they will know how they are doing and how they can also improve. As a complimentary drink when you check in, we do have water with oranges for your convenience. Again, thank you and we hope to see you soon when you visit Anaheim again!

Summary Heading: The room looked nothing like the photos that were posted. There where holes in the wall,water stains, odor, etc
Summary: The room was horrible. Holes all over the walls and bathroom. The complimentary soap were open and used, The bathroom was dirty, the was a foul and nauseating odor, and there were stains all over the ceiling as though there was once a leakage. My inlaws room was in the same condition. We will never go to that one again!
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for the review. I apologize if you had a bad experience while staying with us. Our goal is to exceed our guest's expectations, I am sorry to hear that this was not the case. We do have a 24 hour front desk and would have been happy to move you to another room if this would have made things better for you, even if it was for just one night. WE hope you can come back and give us a chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. We thank you for staying with us and again, we do apologize.

Summary: 14 days after checking out of this seedy ,shabby run down building,this money grabbing outfit still have not returned my so called 'deposit'. Having already complained to head office and speaking to a very helpful member of the CEO office,nothing has been done. No doubt the 'anonymous' manager will read this and say that it's my banks fault...no ..it was my fault ..for staying there.Some people have said it's fine ....you decide for yourself. Best of luck either way!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. As for as deposits go, depending on your bank, it can take up to 15 business days. We do not stay with any of deposits because the system does release the deposit the day of check out. Again, we do apologize if these has caused any issues or inconveniences for you. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary Heading: A Short walk to disney and a good base
Summary: The rooms are what they are, comfortable, wifi, an elevator to the upper floors. Nothing good, nothing bad.  The staff are lovely (thank you Maria) and the breakfast is one step up from most free breakfasts. Weather kept us away from the Park but the TV and the free wifi helped pass the wasted day. The staff give you a map with all the local eateries on it and are just really helpful in dealing with directions etc.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review. We are glad that our staff was helping in any way that they could. We just hope that you can come back and stay with us again! Thank you once again, and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Air conditioner hardly worked, we had to open the door to get cool air. The bed cover looked like it was from the 1970's along with the pictures on the walls and TV. Almost all the stations were Spanish so we could not watch any TV which we would have liked to because the pool and hot tub did not work! Super lame!!! Not only were the bed spreads out dated they were stained! YUCK! The sink faucet and shower faucet leaked. The whole room was in need of a make over and please get your POOL WORKING!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I do want to mention that we do have the front desk open 24 hours if there is any issues with your room, or if you need to call to report anything, they are here to help. IF you needed to the TV to be changed on the language, we also have maintenance on site for your convenience. Also, we are renovating / upgrading as we speak, however, we are doing it step by step since are still open for business. As for the pool, that is next to be renovated, now, we don't know how long it will take but it is next on our plans. We thank you for staying with us and again we do apologize if this caused an inconvenience.

Summary: Stayed here for 1 night while visiting Disney, the hotel double room had 2 double bed , fridge , coffee maker and microwave . It was clean , warm and comfortable , and the price was good ,i would  stay again, no problem .
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review. We thank you for booking us and we hope you get to book with us again! Have a lovely day!

Summary: We travel to Anaheim quite a bit. I found a great deal at this hotel but I was not sure what it would be like. My family and I were pleasantly surprised with the quality of the hotel. We have stayed at many of the hotels near Disneyland and this one that we could say we would stay there again. No thrills or drills but safe and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that your stay was a pleasant one. We look forward in having you guys back and hope its soon! Thank you once again and have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: basic,but nice, free shuttle 5 min walk away
Summary: Free shuttle is at the disney satellite parkade that is 5 min walk from hotel, then it takes 5 min on the bus to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Firstly, I want to say thank you for staying with us and having the time to write a review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. You are absolutely right! We have the Toy Story Parking lot right next to us, so it is a 5 minute walk there. However, it is under your discretion if you want to walk in there and use the free shuttle they offer. Again, this Parking lot is suppose to be only for guests who pay to park there, but all resorts around the area have guests walking in to use their service shuttle to the Disneyland Parks. Again, its under your discretion. We thank you for staying with us and hope you come and visit us soon!

Summary Heading: Walking distance to disneyland is the only good thing about this hotel
Summary: Walls are paper thin you can hear everything,  room was filthy, a/c didn't work,  toilet backed up and over flowed into the room,  breakfast was alright, parking was horrible
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It looks like you experienced a coupe of issues. We have a front desk that is always open 24 hours just in case anything needs to be reported. They can also provided with alternative options for your convenience if you were dealing with certain issues in your room. We try and encourage all guests to do that if they are not happy. Again, we do apologize. We hope that you can come back and give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary Heading: Good location but wifi is bad
Summary: The location is great for the Anaheim convention center. The staff is friendly but biggest problems were: wifi and crowded breakfast space.  I stayed for 2 nights and could not get on the internet using their wifi (signal issue). The breakfast room is too small and anytime between 7-9:30 AM, it was packed with no seating room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize for the issues you seemed to experienced. We are renovating and upgrading as we speak, and its going to take some time to get there but it is on our plans. I do apologize for that. As for the breakfast room being crowded, we were going through some renovations in our original breakfast that is why the breakfast was help in the pool club house. Again, we do sincerely apologize for that and I know it must have been an inconvenience, however, at that moment it had to be held there. We hope that with time you give us a chance to redeem ourselves and come back to stay with us. Thank you and again, we apologize.

Summary Heading: Never fun when a sink back flushed all over the Bathroom
Summary: Spent 3 night in this travel Lodge. Staff was friendly and helpful. The building is old and but clean. First night the bathroom sink DRAIN in my room back flushed somehow, apparently shooting gray water into the ari and all over the bathroom, soaking by personal kit (which was hanging off the hair drier about a foot above the sink, the counter and the floor. Enough water to start soaking the edge of the carpet in the room.  The night desk clerk was able to move me to the only other available room with a king (a disabled room), and it was clean. The bed was actually top notch (full foam mattress), though the floor was cold tile, Interesting that it had no dresser with drawers, and no shelf above the closet bar. (apparently the disabled don't use drawers and don't travel with any

I read all the reviews and to my surprise my stay leaned more to the positive. Front desk was very nice and our room was good, Very nice size and very clean. We would have no doubts about staying here again.
Older hotel, thin walls / ceiling / doors, very noisy AC.  Great price / location.... needs updating / reinvestment by mgt.

I asked on 30 January 2017 about an American Express Charge to my card above the $40.95 Charge from 28 January $115 not accouted for at your location in Anaheim.  Perhaps you can call American Express since my calls to them have not helped.  They are not able to give a proper Fraud account for the missing $115 I wish to have the money back in my account ASAP!  You have a fine Hotel and super location!

Manager and staff are unfriendly and does not satisfy the customers stay. I requested a ground floor because I had an infant. they put me on the 3rd floor.  They charged me extra fees not according to my online booking.

Summary Heading: Worth the extra money to stay somewhere else
Summary: Our friends we were traveling with chose the hotel so I didn't worry about looking at reviews and doing the homework. Firs the rooms were very dirty and grumpy. There was even a dirty plunger in the hallway. There were spiders in the bathroom. We slept on top of the bedding we didn't want to sleep under the covers it was too risky. Also the bedding had bears on it with matching curtains very odd and they had noticeable stains. It's definitely worth the extra money to stay somewhere clean. Frankly I would have rather stayed in my car if I had driven.
Great location in proximity to Convention Center.  overall clean but minor deferred maintenance throughout
Felt very misled by the photos on booking.com, this place was old and tired. Not at all like the photos. I will not go back .way overpriced and poorly maintained

Summary Heading: Rooms were not newly renovated as advertised in pictures...
Summary: Rooms were not newly renovated as advertised in pictures. Very old and out-dated.  Staff lied about not having any renovated rooms because I stayed in one before, which was much nicer.

Checked in later in the evening and seemed to get the left over room no one wanted. The toilet did not work, lights in the room did not work, the bathroom was minorly dirty upon checking into the room, and the heater smelled horrible when turned on. When these issues were brought to the staffs attention they gladly switched our room for us. The staff was very friendly and accommodating however that cannot make up for the property itself. The hotel badly needs some updates and a good scrub down and fresh paint to make it more presentable.

This place was disgusting. To our surprise the door to our room wss covered with an trash bag. That's because the door was fully covered in rust. No one bothered to tell us at check in. The toilet takes the flushes to work. The bathroom has a lot of mold on the floor. Only reason we stayed add it was for one night and we checked in late.

When we got there they hadn't setup anything promise. No rollaway and the handicap scooter was still in lobby. They were more concerned with getting their $ deposit even though my room was already paid for. When we finally get to the room it is not handicap accessible, all the ramps are on the opposite side of the hotel. Inside the room there is no rollaway for my daughter. The room walls are stained and dirty. The furniture looks like it has been dragged down the street a few times. The dresser drawers are broken to the point that you need a crowbar to pry them open. And all the outlets are loose so your gonna have to get creative on how to charge that phone/or your kids gameboy, cause the plug falls out of the wall. We argued with them for an hour to get a roll away, mind you
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We always value guests' views and feedback. We are sorry for the deposit you had to give us when you checked in. All pre-paid reservations have to put down a deposit for incidentals and damages, and, of course, it is refunded when you check out. Also, As you checked in sir, you requested something on the 1st floor ONLY. We went ahead and accommodated you for that. Your Electric wheelchair was waiting for you in the front desk, as it should, since we don't know what room you'll be getting until you do the check-in process. As for the roll away bed, again, we cannot put it in your room until you do the check in and we'll know what room number you'll get. You had come to the front desk the next day, and said that you wanted a room that was close to the ramps, because your room was on the other side of those ramps. (Of course, the ramps are close to the Handicap / Wheel-Chair accessible rooms) That is when we offered a Wheel-Chair accessible room, which would be better for you to drive your electric wheel chair. I wished you could have said that in the check-in process you needed a room that was handicap/ wheel chair accessible so we could have done it right then. As we moved you to the other room with the ramps, you say you experienced all these issues. We do apologize for that, however, we asked at the time of your check-out if everything was okay, and you said it was fine. There were no complaints from your end. I clearly remember that you had left your vehicle behind and we did put a Towing warning on it because after you check out you are suppose to take your car with you. You cannot leave it on property. You did come and complained about it, and we did apologize for that, and you even mentioned about the Wyndham points, if you were going to earn them with your stay. I talked to you and said unfortunately, you cannot earn them this way. You had to make the reservation straight from Wyndham or us over the phone and you had booked it from Expedia.com. When those reservations are from 3rd parties online, you cannot earn any points. You did get very upset and used an unnecessary tone with the front desk. You had told the front desk you were going to call corporate and complained about everything you had experienced. However, we had asked you before and you said everything was fine. If you had encountered all these issues you've mentioned, why not let the hotel take care of it? We are truly sorry for all you had experienced. Thank you for staying with us and have a lovely day.

Summary: Exactly what you expect from travelodge. Good continental breakfast for the kids, clean rooms and comfortable beds, lots of pillows. Ok the internet was a bit weak so I used my phone hotspot. They said the place is being renivated. I was not bothered by any noise. And my kid slept in late.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful review. I am sorry to hear the issue with the Wi-Fi. We are going through some renovations and we are upgrading as well. We are glad to hear you were not bothered by any noise at all. We thank you for staying with us, and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: This place should be demolished!!!!!!! DON'T STAY HERE!
Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel and it will definitely BE THE LAST!!!!! Because we arrived at LAX at 6.30am from Australia, we booked the day before then let them know that we would not be arriving until around 10am the next morning. I also stated that I required a fridge and a safe in the room. I received an email confirming all of this and in bold the guarantee of the late arrival. The entire stay was 15 days. We arrived at 9.55am, went into reception where we were told that we that we no longer had a booking as we were a no show and the hotel was full. I explained that I had notified them that we would be arriving at this time and the receptionist’s response was “yeah! that’s what everyone says” So I pulled out the confirmation and showed her! (Note always
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your candid review about your most recent stay. I would like to apologize for some of issues you encountered during your stay. When you booked your reservation the website did reflect that the pool and spa as well as the laundry room were out of order due to renovations, If you did not see this on the website we do apologize. During your stay we offered you two parking passes for each vehicle you had on property and we printed the directions  for you to the nearest Laundromat as we do for all of our guest during the renovations. The safety issue is always our TOP priority. As discussed  in our previous conversation we explained that all guest have the option to unlock their windows to allow a cool breeze into the room this option also gives guest the option to lock the window from the inside to insure their safety. If you would like to to discuss your stay further please contact the hotel directly.

Summary: Nice Hotel, Room was clean, although furniture was a bit old and TV was really old. Amenities were good, well placed and room was spacious. Checkin was quick. Staff were friendly and courteous. Elevator was slow and could see some water puddle on hallway (not in room). Wifi was very weak. Parking is free & Ample space ! Gas station is close by. VERY Close to Disney Toy Story Parking Lot (6 min walk) which was fantastic !! Lotsa eating option outside and close to Downtown Disney District ! Well priced & had a good stay !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us. We do apologize in any way if you had issues with the Wi-Fi and the elevator. We wished these issues were reported to address them immediately. We are in the process of renovations and we have plans to upgrade as well. We hope to see you soon as you visit Anaheim! Thank you once again!

Summary: I travel alot and let me tell u with this one u get your $$$ worth nothing bad about it nothing but good...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was a satisfying one and with that being said, we hope that you do come back and enjoy your vacations here with us. Once again, we thank you and hope to see you soon...

Summary: When we came back to our room we found bed bugs in one of the two queen beds. We found that the room was infested with them. I complained and was given a different room with a half hearted apology and no former apology from the hotel manager. The customer service sucked overall and acted like it wasn't a big deal. There is a formal complaint pending with Wyndham corporate. I am very dissatisfied with this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest review. We do sincerely apologize for what you had experience, however, after all investigation and inspection that we had to go through because you had reported that you had seen bed bugs, all reports came out to be negative. Now, we have been in contact with Wyndham Customer Care - Corporate, and I believe they have been in contact with you as well. This case has been closed due to the lack of evidence. If you have any further questions about this case or also would like a copy of the report, please feel free to contact the hotel itself, or you can call Wyndham Customer Care-Corporate. Thank you and Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Breakfast was delicious! Friendly and courteous staff making the waffles on demand was a warming touch to our stay..
Summary: Breakfast was delicious! Friendly and courteous staff making the waffles on demand was a warming touch to our stay..
Manager Response: Thank you so such a lovely review. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with the staff service. We do hope for your return to serve you, again, the way you deserve. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary Heading: Although we did have a good nights sleep, the parking was...
Summary: Although we did have a good nights sleep, the parking was an issue. Coming in very late from Disney there was no parking available. Cars were parked everywhere! We were told to park behind another car (blocking them) and the office would call us in the morning to move our car when the other owner wanted to leave. As luck would have it, we were called to move our car at 7:30 a.m! Not FUN when you get in so late! We saw many signs of "Renovations in progress", except for a new paint job in the room, we did not see much of the renovations. Shower head was a bad fix it job. The table and the dresser were in bad shape!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize for the parking issue. We have had this issue shared with management, and they are trying to come up with a solution, so we do apologize for the night you could not get any sleep. Also, we do have renovations going on our property, however, starting with small parts of the property, and working our way around. Not all the renovations are exterior. We would have hoped for you reporting these issues you encountered in your room. We hope you can give a chance to redeem ourselves, and soon stay with us so we can serve you the way you deserve. Thank you once again, and see you soon!

Summary: I chose this property for location, name, and conveniences. There is an Anaheim Resort Transit stop directly in front. This may not matter to some, but for me it was a high on my list. Denny's is also right next door, another plus. I trust the Travelodge name and was not disappointed. The staff was pleasant and helpful. The room was showing its age, but that is not a problem for me.  The double queen room was larger than expected and made my 4 night stay comfortable. The room was clean and quiet, even being 1st floor with window on Harbor Blvd.  Another reason I chose this property was a fridge in every room. Not guaranteed with some other chains. Another point was easy and comfort of parking. The property surrounds the parking, so I felt more secure.  If I had to have a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this honest review. We are glad to know that you were happy with your stay. Of course, we do have the Anaheim Resort Transportation Shuttle that passes by our hotel everyday, every 20 minutes or so to take guests to the Disneyland Parks. We do thank you for the compliment about our staff. I can say that we do try our best everyday to accommodate and help our guests every way possible that we can. We are aware of the homeless people outside at the bus stop, however, the City of Anaheim is aware and they do know, just in case anything does happen. We thank you for noticing and letting us know everything you experience in your trip staying with us, we hope you return soon to stay with us. Thank you once again, and have a lovely day!

Summary: Room had a musty smell that would not dissipate, regardless of using an abundant amount of disinfectant odor eliminator. Bathroom and bathtub looked dirty disgusting! Needs desperate upgrades! Also, they place a $100.00 hold on your credit card that should be released the very next business day. It has been two business days and there is still a hold! Would not recommend this hotel!!  Highly Disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are sad to hear that your experience was not a good one at all. We apologize for any inconvenience we have caused. We wished that while you were here that you could have reported all the issues you have mentioned so we could have provided you with alternative options for your convenience. Moreover, we do hold $100.00 for any incidentals or damages, however, that hold is refundable. As you checked in, you do sign a waiver that says you let us hold $100.00 on your debit/credit card and it can take up to 15 business days to reverse back. At that moment it is up to your bank. We usually see all holds be back in 2 - 3 business days. Again, we do apologize. Thank you

Summary Heading: dirty , old and need desperate work on rooms.
Summary: The pictures look good, but in person I was very disappointed.  The place is old.  The bathroom is the ugliest I ever seen.  It is not clean anywhere. The windows are dirty inside and out.  IT is the creepiest room I ever gotten at a motel.  The cheaper ones 5 to 6 miles from Disneyland Anaheim are much better in person and those are cheaper per night.   10 to 15 cheaper than what I pad here  per night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time in writing this review. We are sorry that you were not happy with your room. We wish you could have reported this as soon as you seem to have an issue with this. The front desk is available 24 hours, so I know we could have had alternative options for your convenience. Again, we apologize for your stay, as It seems it was not a pleasant one, we hope that you can visit us again in the near future as we are remodeling rooms. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary: They are so polite and honest.  I left my cell phone at the hotel and they contacted my mother for me to pick up my home.  I really Thank them for that!
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliment. We are happy that we were able to contact you right away when our staff found your phone. We are happy that you we were able to retrieve it for you, and we hope that you had a lovely stay with us, again, thank you and hope to see you soon as you visit Anaheim again!

Summary: Nothing fancy, just good beds with basic pillows, clean bathrooms, and am amazing position on Harbor next to the convention center and main Disneyland parking lot. Also check out Joe's ice cream a block south on the left, best Italian ice on tyre west coast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was a satisfying one and we are glad to know you were happy. You are right, we do have the Anaheim Convention Center about 10-15 minutes of a walk. Also, we have the Toy Story Parking Lot next door at a 5-7 minute walk as well. Joe's Italian Ice Cream is one best ice cream shops around here, we are glad you enjoyed that! We thank you for staying with us and we hope you stay with us in the near future again!

Summary: Room was negligent. Curtains ripped in a few places, door trim on all doors was banged up and needed painting at the least. Wall poorly patched behind door entrance and not painted. Carpet was burned from a iron. The shower leaked from the drain out to the bathroom floor. At one point had 5 towels down to absorb the all water. I was the last person to take a shower so I was the one getting out on cold wet towels. The caulking around the bath tub area was moldy. The smoke detector was hanging by its wires not a bracket from the ceiling. Beds were sagging in the middle. Parking was not sufficient so I was told to double park and block someone in and if they would need to get out they would call me to move my car. They called me alright, at 7:00 am to move my car. What a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We always take all reviews seriously and of course, we like to share these kind of reviews with our staff to let them know how we can improve on the cosmetic outlook of the room itself, and all the other parking issue you seemed to have. Of course, we apologize for the inconveniences you seemed to experience, we hope that after renovations being done to the property in December, you can come back and stay with us. Again, we do apologize all issues and inconveniences you had. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel is like a time capsule. Nothing has been updated (including the mattress)since it was built in the 80's. They keep applying lots of paint to cover the dirt and stains. The toilet was designed for a 2 year old. Sits about 12" from the floor and crammed into the corner. Pool and spa were out of order. Did I mention the stains on the ceilings?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the room not being up to your expectations. We will be working on upgrading and improving our rooms sometime in December of this year. The pool and spa are out of order and it is stated on the website of Wyndham and any other 3rd parties that there are. Thank you for your review and  we hope that you book with us in the near future!

Summary: This year marked my 3rd time staying at the Travelodge, and I will NEVER stay there again. The previous years weren't fantastic, but they weren't anything worth complaining about for the price I was paying. This year the price went up ~$30/night, and it got SO much worse. The pillows have been changed for awful thin new ones. I had to request a fridge and a coffee maker. The fan in the bathroom worked only sometimes. The ice machine near the room constantly beeped, waking us up. Our room was near the staff area, and they were extremely loud in the mornings as well as playing loud music. On our last day, we woke up to find the power to our room was off. We tried calling the office, and nobody answered. I had to get dressed in the dark to go get anyone's attention for this issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry for the room not being up to your expectations. The rooms that you had booked for were Wheel Chair Accessible 1 King bed. If you did not need those rooms you could have told us that, to see what other alternative options we could have had for you. As for the issues you had encountered with the pillows, fridge, and coffee maker you could have contacted front desk and we could have taken care of that right away. As for the fan in the bathroom, the fans are only to work for about 15 minutes, since the little engine on the fan gets exhausted, it'll need time to cool down and it'll start to work again, they are suppose to do that. We apologize for the beeping of the ice machine, and the staff that being loud in the morning. I do want to let you know that the ice machine has been fixed and this review will be shared with the housekeeping staff to let them know what they can do to improve. The electric outrage, did happen on some part of the property due to an accident near the area. Other guests did experience did as well, and we were able to fix it right away for them. Sorry for all these issues you have experienced.   And lastly, the over charge you are talking about, it was not a double charge. In order to fix the error that was done, we had to fix the billing issue. You will see it is not a double charge, it is an authorization. Which means, it will hold the money in the credit card you gave in at check-in, and it will release it between 3-5 business days. Again, the billing issue was addressed with you when you checked in, because we knew you were aware. We are sorry you feel this way, and we apologize again for the inconveniences you had experienced.

Summary Heading: Hotel was fine, swimming pool not open
Summary: When we booked, we asked for 2 queen beds, breakfast, parking and a pool.   We got it all but the pool, which was shut down.  We were travelling with 3 small children so a pool is pretty important to us, not happy the Wyndham booking agent didn't know.    Big problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. unfortunately, we do have it stated on our website for the agent from Wyndham to know as they were booking for you. We apologize for miscommunication for the booking agent, but we also have a reminder on our counter for that. Again, we apologize for the inconveniences. Have a nice day!

Summary: overall a very average stay.  The Wi-Fi was really bad, it kept dropping you out forcing you to sign in multiple times and was super slow or just not here.
Manager Response: Thank you fro your feedback. We apologize for the Wi-Fi not being up to your standards. Keep in mind that a lot of our guests do get signed on during the night and it can become slow at times but it is working. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Summary: Clean rooms and updated furniture and televisions. Shower head lacks some pressure, but not bad. Service at the front desk was lacking, but not terrible. If you are ok with a decent walk to the park this place is worth checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize if the service was lacking for you and the rooms were not up to your expectations. We will be going through a renovation stage in December, and we hope by then you can come back and book with us, and enjoy every commodity there is. Again, we do apologize and we hope to see you soon! Thank you.

Summary: I've seen better furniture in the back of an alley. Wifi sucks! Bed spreads look like from the 80s. Great location if going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we do appreciate it. We are sorry to hear that the furniture was not up to your expectations. As for the wi-fi we always encourage all guests, if they are having trouble, to call or come to the front desk, so we can help them in any way that we can. Sorry you could not connect to it. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you anytime soon when you come back to Anaheim!

Summary: Clean but very old, furniture is in very bad shape. Room had an odd smell. It desperately needs renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. We do apologize if they room was not up to your expectations. We will be going into renovations in late December. We hope that you can come back and stay with us then so we can redeem ourselves. Thank you

Summary: Parking was very limited.. bad employees and construction workers parking in the parking lot for a limited the guest parking need more stalls other than a hotel was really good..
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. However, as for the parking, we know it can be limited, and trust me when I say, that we are working to find a solution to this. Also, We have a lot of maintenance work being done, so maybe that was a little of an inconvenience for the parking but again, we are trying to work as fast as we can to get this renovation going, as well as the pool and spa. Thank you for your patience and we hope that you can book with us in the future so you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you once again!

Summary: The hotel was very good for the price. It is a little worn and places. For example the furniture and the bathroom can definitely use some renovating soon. But it was clean, the bed wasvery comfortable.  Front desk the service was good people there were very friendly and helpful. If you're looking for someplace that is a great value and basically to sleep and clean up this is it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your kind words. We thank you for your compliment on our front desk. They are open 24 hours for any requests day or night time. I also want to mention that there are plans in December to renovate, but it will take time as we do have a lot of plans in the future. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary Heading: Close to convention centre but not the best place to stay.
Summary: The place needs some TLC…..we had to get them to wash the bathroom and the hotel room doors down as they were so dirty. It was quiet there. Breakfast was included and no fresh fruit when we got there. There is a woman who was making the waffles which weren't the typical hotel waffles--not good. No peanut butter. The pool couldn't be used though it was full and there was water moving in it. No reasons given and it was posted on the website that it was closed. I did get to sit by the pool though although the wifi was awful out there.  Bonus was could watch the fireworks from Disneyland each night and the walk was only 10 minutes to the Convention Centre which 2 out of our party had tickets for MindCon. The room attendant didn't leave us any toiletries so had to ask for some at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that the continental breakfast was not up to your expectations.
