We are working with management to have a little more variety for everyone's satisfaction. the pool and spa are out of order until further notice, it is posted on the website of Wyndham and also on the 3rd parties if you did book with any of them. We also have a friendly reminder at the front desk counter, just in case if anyone missed it. I do want to let you know, our front desk is happy to be working with a Wyndham Hotel. thank you for your review once again, and we do sincerely apologize for your inconveniences. We hope you can book with us again.

Summary: The staff was friendly, and the ART stop out front was helpful! The breakfast was good with fresh waffles, although some healthy options such as fruit would be good. There is a small parking lot, but had no trouble finding a space. The room was clean and inviting, and the beds were clean. The room had a smell when we walked in, like bug spray.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. Unfortunately, you said your room smelled, we do apologize for that.  We wished you could have reported that and we could have offered any alternative options for your conveniences. Again, we apologize and we hope we can make this right when you decide to come back. Thank you

Summary: There were holes in the wall, the door was nearly off the hinge, the bath was clogged and took forever to drain but it was an inexpensive option, and completely manageable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize for the issues you encountered here. We just wish that you could have reported all issues so that you had, so we could have offered alternative options for your convenience. We truly apologize and we hope that you can give us another chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Our toilet handle was broken so it couldn't  flush when we arrived.  The place looks creepy in the room. Cement walls, rusted sink faucet,  metal rails, dirty walks and holes in them. Only good thing is the bed was clean and comfortable.  Phone also had no dial tone. Can you  say, twilight zone?

Summary Heading: NOT How it was when we stayed before
Summary: We stayed at this Hotel a few times before and was happy This time was NOT happy.Blow dryer didnt work,Pool was NOT open,Wifi didnt connect,One of the Days we stayed room was not serviced,NO Parking for us after we came back from long Day at Disney,Bathroom vent didnt work,Bathroom light only worked 1/2 the time,We are disappointed and Sad by this stay becouse in past was our favorite,Not any more.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if your stay was not a happy one. It seems we have failed to serve you the way you deserve and we could have done more for you. Please feel free to leave a private message with us regarding your stay.

Summary: Really saddened to say we had a really disappointing stay here.It Felt really run-down and tired, drastically needs updating. The shower didn't work properly, no plug in the sink, no Wi-Fi signal, bedding really dated carpets shabby, What really annoyed us was being fobbed off about the swimming pool. We were there for three weeks and spent a lot of money, We was not made aware about the pool, if we would have known, we would have booked somewhere else, won't be staying again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest review. We always take our guests' review serious and it seems as for your stay, we did fail. It makes us sad to hear, that a few amenities were not workable during your stay. I do want to mention that our front desk is open 24 hours, and so any of these issues could have been reported so the front desk could have given you alternative options for your convenience. We are sorry you had to go through that. Also, the pool and spa have been out of order, and we do apologize if those amenities were not available to you during your stay. We know that it may cause an inconvenience but we do thank you and everyone else for being patiently. We very sorry to hear your stay wasn't the best, but we do hope that you can stay with us in the near future to redeem ourselves. Thank you.

Summary Heading: I had read some of the reviews for this hotel. I wasn't...
Summary: I had read some of the reviews for this hotel. I wasn't expecting much, it turns out it was a really nice property. The carpet looked new. The staff was friendly. It is super close to Disney and the convention center. I enjoyed my stay and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and honest review. We are glad that you had an extraordinary stay with us. We hope that when you come back to Anaheim, you visit us again! thank you so much for your incredible review, have a wonderful day!

Summary: The room wasnt too bad, especially for what we paid.  The bathroom was a shower only, which was kind of strange.  Also the pool was out of order.  They had a sign that said it was mentioned in their website, but I didn't book directly through their site, so I wasn't aware.  I would have stayed somewhere else with a working pool since it was hotter then heck.  Was nice to have an ART bench right out front and a Dennys next door.  Within walking distance to a CBS and Walgreens, although, be prepared to pay Disney prices.  Eeek.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. I want to say that the pool and spa have been out of order for quite some months due to some new repairs and renovations we have been working on. It is also mentioned on our website and online parties you might have booked yours with. We do apologize for those amenities not being available to you during your days of stay. We hope you can come back and stay with us. Have a nice day!

Summary: Hotel location is Great walking distance to disney Land. Breakfast lady was very nice but not much available to eat. Room ok clean for the Price. Would recommend. Bus stand right out the front of hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and having time to write your wonderful review. Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center is surrounded with much more shops and restaurants that are convenient for guests that stay with us. We also have the A.R.T. shuttle (The bus stop is right outside our hotel) which is provided by the city of Anaheim. They do offer transportation to the Disneyland parks, however, they do charge a $5 fee per person, per day, to take the shuttle and end up at the entrances of the Disneyland Parks. We are also located next to the Toy Story Parking lot which is provided by the Disneyland Resort. You can walk in there and take the free shuttle they offer to the Main gates. If you wanted to park there, they do charge a $18 fee, but if you are staying with us you can leave your car on the property (Only of the days of your stay) and walk down the parking lot they offer. It is very convenient. Thank you once again for your kind words and we hope to see you around Anaheim when you visit again!

Summary Heading: Good for the price of the room, they need to fix things in the rooms
Summary: The room was good for the price, they had repairs in the room that looked like they started and did not finish. I had to go every evening and have my key re-coded to get into my room.  for some reason it would take me 7 to 10 tries to get my door to open, this was very frustrating.  When I would as the girl at the front desk to help with the problem she would just re-code the key and tell me it should work fine.  Not very friendly.  When cleaning my room they did not restock items such as toilet paper, I had to go to the front desk and ask for it, to me that is not ok, if the roll is getting low leave a new roll.   The internet was never explained and the log in information did not work luckily I have unlimited data and did not have to worry about this.
Manager Response: First of all, I want to say thank you for staying with us. It seems your stay was not satisfying as it should have been and it makes us seem like we did fail at that. We do apologize for that matter. I do want to say that I will talk to our front desk agents and share this review with them, to let them know how they are doing and also how they can improve from this. I will definitely mention this to our housekeeping department as well so we can learn something from this as well. As for the wi-fi you mentioned, it is a little tricky to get logged on, but if you had trouble, we do have a front desk open 24 hours, we could had helped you. I wish this was reported as well so we can be at your serve when you needed. Thank you once again for staying with us and we hope that you can stay with us again!

Summary: room was average and dated  , not what i expected  from the pictures  of the  rooms from there website , was very  disappointed  but overall  not bad for the price and location
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate it. Unfortunately, we do have some pictures on the website that have come to our attention and some of the pictures on the website and wrong. We have talked to Wyndham about this, and they have programmed to be taken off. We apologize for the inconvenience. We hope that you stay, though, was a very pleasant one and we hope you decide to come back to stay with us. Thank you and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Two years ago I stayed at this motel and was disappointed that the pool and the laundry were not working.  My review reflected this disappointment.  The management of the motel replied to my review and promised to make any future stay more than just a satisfactory experience.  On the basis of this promise, I decided to stay there again last week.  Upon check in I brought the promise to the attention of the desk staff.  She showed no interest at all and just stated that the motel had made several improvements.  Two years on, the pool was still out of order along with the laundry even though they are still listed as available on their website.  The front desk has a large sign up saying that the pool is out of order and this fact is noted on their website.  This is not true.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do take feedback and comments seriously and please believe me when I tell you that this is a very serious matter. If you were promised that 2 years ago, I apologize for that. We have been under new management for a couple of months now and everything here has changed as we have been trying to renovate what we can and what the old management has left. Of course the pool and the spa have been out of order because we going to have repairs and renovations done to them. As for the laundry, it was out of order as well because we have to make sure everything was in order and have all washer and dryers cleaned out for the future use. you say that this is not noted on our website, I'm sorry but it is noted. As you book it, it does tell you on your confirmation. We do apologize for all the confusion and we hope to see you soon if you are in Anaheim once again!

Summary: The shower took 15 mins to heat up, which is a waste of water while you're waiting and we're in a drought. It doesn't take that long at other hotels. The toilet made weird noises after you flushed. The floor had iron burns in it. This place needs a major renovation, but I guess you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write your review. We apologize if the water was not hot enough for you. All those noises and little cosmetic issues  you mention are going to be fixed. Step by step we are taking to fix and renovate this property and trust me when I say, it is our priority. However, we still care about the stay you had. It may seem we  have failed you. We do apologize for the issues you encountered. We are sorry and we hope you accept our apology and hope you can come back. Thank you and again, we apologize for any inconveniences you experienced.

Summary: Where to begin! Sheets,bathroom, ceiling,non functional spa and pool, hard and painful towels. Cigs holes in comforter. This place can be amazing if they put some money into it, all it needs is upgrading, and new sheets and towels, I mean the freaking towels were like someone has left it under the sun for a month.

Summary Heading: Wifi doesnt work, broken shower knob = no hot water
Summary: Clean place, but the wifi in the room gets nearly no signal and due to a broken knob in the shower I couldn't get hot water. Asked them to fix it and it still didn't work a day later. Air conditioner didn't seem to be working either. Couldnt get the room below 80deg.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time in writing this review. I want to start by saying that we apologize for the issues you had during your stay. I want to say that I will share this review with our Maintenance team and let them know how they are doing and also how they can improve. As for the air conditioner, you might have had it on the fan mode instead of cool. So that's why it wouldn't go down under 80 degrees. Again, we apologize for the issues you had encountered. We hope you can stay with us soon so we can redeem our mistakes. Thank you and have a good day!

Summary Heading: In need of desperate updating in rooms
Summary: Where do I begin you can feel the springs in the mattresses the blankets are old and ugly the carpet is lifting at the corners with stains the TV not even a flatscreen the hangers all rusted it really felt like a run down motel in the ghetto I'll just leave it at that for around 30 bucks more you can get a nicer hotel I should have known
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so sad to see this review. It seems you are not happy at all, and it makes us feel like we did fail to make your stay a happy one. Also, we always encourage guests to call or come down to the front desk to report anything or just to let us know if they are unhappy with anything in their room. Our front desk is open 24 hours and they can always have alternative options for your convenience.  Again, we apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: Cleaner than reported in reviews.  Pool shut down?  Nice location.  No selection for breakfast…Denny's next door!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We truly do appreciate it! We do apologize if the pool and spa were not available due to renovations. We are trying to get this available as soon as possible for everyone. As for breakfast, it is Continental, so it is the basic toast, cereal, oatmeal, coffee, milk, tea, juices, and they do make waffles upon requests. Again, if the breakfast selection were not up to your standards, we so apologize. As you mention, there is a Denny's Restaurant next door, and so if the Continental Breakfast does not fill you up, there are plenty of restaurants around the resort. Denny's is a perfect choice! Thank you for your time and we hope that you can stay with us again!

Summary: Easy access to Disneyland and other attractions in the area. Used hotel for sleeping. Breakfast needs fruit and or yogurt and eggs. Bread, waffles and cereal sometimes isn't enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that you used our hotel for your Disneyland experience. However, seems like we did fail in the breakfast portion. We are working something with management to put a variety of different options for breakfast. We thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future when you visit Anaheim again! Have a lovely day!

Summary: Our trip was to see Disney land. The service and quality was not bad for the price. No major complaints. Wish I had the microwave I asked for in the room though. Service seemed average.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time and writing a review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are happy to know that you stayed with us for your trip to the Disneyland Parks. We are sorry for the microwave issue; I wish you could have had reported as soon as possible to verify the issue. We hope that you can stay with us in the near future when you visit Anaheim once more time. Thank you and have a nice day!

Summary: Went to Anaheim for the GameStop Expo 2016 and stayed here before the expo.  Thanks for the awesome visit I look forward to Expo 2018!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your response. We are glad that everything worked out at the GameStop Expo and we hope to see you soon! Thank you for staying with us and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Lack of adequate parking for number of rooms. Rooms need updating, upkeep, and deep cleaning of carpet
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry you felt the rooms were not up to your standards. We will have some renovations coming up but until then, we hope you can book with us again in the near future! Thank you for staying with us and have a lovely day!

Summary: We stayed in a renovated room.  The beds were great!  The issue we had was all the outlets were extremely loose and hard to get to in order to plug in our devices.  Also the room had no where to hang any clothing. The parking was a nightmare on the nights that they were at capacity. They double up the spots and we had to take the ID into the office and they had to call the guest to move the car so we could get out. The price was good and I would stay there in a pinch and am hopeful they can solve some of these issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. That is great that you stayed in one of our renovated rooms! We are happy to know you enjoyed it! We do have a wonderful 24 hour front desk that could have helped you if these issues were reported. We do apologize for the parking situation, we know we have a limited space for parking however, we do have a security on site that does help us with that. So, he or the front desk staff can always help and let you know where to park. We don't take any ID's of anyone, what we do, is retrieve the parking pass number we have and give our guest a call, to let them know we do have another guest trying to move their vehicle. We do not under any circumstances, take or give anyone's information out. Thank you once again for staying with us, and I hope in the near future we are able to see you again!

Summary: 3 rooms rented no pool because they have not installed the ADA wheelchair hoist. Cockroaches  nails sticking out of boards plugs held together with electric tape Outlets didn't work  Fridge froze everything Air in one room barely worked
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize for the rooms not being up to your standards. AS for the pool and spa, they are out of order for renovations. We are sorry if those amenities were not available during your stay. I wish all the issues you mentioned were reported so they front desk could have offered alternative options for your convenience. The front desk staff is open 24 hours and I know they would have been available to work something out with you. Again, we thank you for staying with us and we hope you can book with us again!

Summary: Price was more reasonable than most in area and rooms were clean, and office staff is pleasant, BUT  1)Don't get a room facing Harbor Blvd. It's noisy all night! 2)Bring your own breakfast or go to the Denny's next door.  Nothing but corn flakes, raisin brand, toast, and muffins --and heavily guarded waffles!  Oh, coffee and juice is watered down.   Come early if you want a parking space where someone doesn't park behind you. Also, pool and jacuzzi CLOSED, and don't bring a lot of luggage.  The four flights of stairs are difficult to climb.  I really want to rate this a two because after all, this place was $100 cheaper than some others in the area, so you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing your review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We apologize for the inconvenience of the room location being too noisy, wish you could have reported this so we could have given you the option of another room, if necessary. As for Our breakfast, it does states that it is Continental; Which includes, Waffles, Oatmeal, Cereal, Muffins, Danishes, Toast, etc. We do not carry a complete breakfast of Eggs or any protein. We are sorry about that. As for the the coffee, it is brewed there, so it is not watered down at all, I am sorry. As for our parking, it is a little limited, however, we will always find parking for you. Our parking is free, so we also have a security on site which will look over the vehicles as you sleep, to make it safe. Moreover, our pool and spa are out of order due to renovations and repairs. We do apologize if that was an inconvenience. We will try our hardest to make this work for all of our guests for future reservations. As for the stairs you had to climb, we do not have a 4th floor, we only have  up to a 3rd floor, and we have an elevator, so I am sorry if you were not aware of it. We thank you for staying with us. Hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: I've previously reviewed the first two nights as they were a separate reservation. At least this day the maid left us face cloths, but she still did not clean up the coffee maker I'd used on the first morning. (I threw out the used coffee filter pack right after I made my coffee.)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. we apologize if they issues you experienced were not addressed right away. I will share this review with out housekeeping department and let them know how they are doing and how they can also improve. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you can stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Decent aspects but still has shortcomings.
Summary: Got this hotel from a discount site and got it at a reduced price. Rooms were decent if a little outdated. Toilets clogged at the slightest bit of toilet paper. Continental Breakfast was ok, could have used something other than carbs and sugar. Parking was horrible on the weekends. Pool and Spa were closed with a sign on the front desk that said it was stated on the website that they were closed, but after checking the website, even today, still shows that the pool and spa are available for use. Proximity to Disneyland shuttles was awesome. A 10 minute walk to and from. Pretty good for the price that I paid, but probably wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Seems you were satisfied with your stay, however, there were things you were not okay with. Toilets do get clogged when you put paper in the toilet, but those things should be reported as we do have maintenance on site, if there is any problems. Breakfast is continental which includes; Waffles, Oatmeal, Cereal, Muffins, Toast, Danishes, etc. We do apologize if breakfast was not satisfying for you. Pool and spa are closed due to renovations and repairs; it is stated on our website and we do have a reminder sign on our front desk counter. However, we cannot pressure any of our online companies to post the pool and spa out of order because they are not obligated too. We are not responsible for those websites and they are not responsible as to what goes on here with us. We are sorry to disappoint you on that perspective. We are sorry for not being able to serve you the way you deserve, we hope you can be back to give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you

Summary: Proximity to theme parks, low rates, and parking security are excellent. WiFi is free, but it doesn't work at all in the rooms so it is useless. The "continental" breakfast is held in one of the rooms! All carbs, no protein other than milk. No yogurt, eggs, or meat of any kind. The entire property needs a good renovation. At least no bed bugs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are glad to know your stay was for the enjoyment of the Disneyland Parks, and we are glad that we were a use of help! For our Continental Breakfast is just your basic breakfast amenities; Waffles (Not the frozen kind), Cereal, Oatmeal, Muffins, Toast, Danishes, Milk, Orange Juice, Cranberry Juice, Coffee, Tea, etc.. Thank you for staying with us and see you in the near future!

Summary Heading: Decent for the price range. PARKING NIGHTMARE!
Summary: My girlfriend and I stay at many different Wyndham properties in this area and other places as well.  For a Travelodge this was pretty good.  Bed was comfortable and the bathroom was roomier than most.  My particular room had an air conditioner that wasn't great but kept it tolerable.  The toilet was the old round type that didn't flush too good.  But all in all the stay was fine.  The only huge issue this property has is parking.  We got back late one night and holy mother!!! Cars were stuffed in every nook and cranny they could stuff them!  Some parked 3 deep!  It's a mess!  My suggestion is park your car and Uber as much as possible!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that you were happy with your stay. We are glad to know that the beds were comfortable and the bathroom was satisfying for you as well. We do have a limited space of parking unfortunately, but we are always here to come up with a solution to a problem, and if parking was the issue for you,  we apologize, but we are happy that there was a space for you to park your car. We also do have a security guard on site, that looks after all the cars on the property just to make sure everything is okay. We thank you so much for your feedback and we hope you can be back to book with us again! Thank you

Summary Heading: 20 Min Walk to Disney but Not the Best Nights Sleep
Summary: Staid at this hotel this past weekend `while in town for a business event at Disneyland. The location is good, nowhere near the closest hotel to the park but if you are in OK shape the 20 min walk straight down Harbor is not bad. Parking is a little tight but  not the worst on the block, and the breakfast is made up of some toast and Waffles, if you are looking for anything remotely feeling you may need to go next door to Denny's. The Rooms are old and run down, with bedding that looks to be older than I am. The bathroom tile was moldy and the carpet and chairs in the room had large stains on them. All in All this was a budget hotel and i did not pay an arm and a leg to stay here. If this hotel had cost any more than it did or was not located in such a convenient location i
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your response, we greatly appreciate it. It seems you were dissatisfied with your stay and we are sorry to hear that. Any guests that are not happy with anything as they are staying here, we always encourage them to call or go to the front office directly and report anything that seems to be wrong. We are sorry we missed these things; I will definitely share this review with our front desk and housekeeping team just to let them know how well they are doing and also know things that they can improve. Again, we apologize for any inconveniences that you had experienced and we hope that you can come back and stay with us again to make this right. Thank you

Summary: This was a great place to stay, compared to the very expensive hotels across the street.  I felt safe there, and we happened to get a newly remodeled room, which was nice.  The breakfast was basic, but nice to have free and in the building.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. We thank you so much for staying with us and we hope that in the near future you book with us again when you visit Anaheim. Thank you!

Summary: The pool and hot tub are still closed, and apparently have been for almost a month.  The rooms are dingy, grimy, and stained.  The internet is terrible; I couldn't open any website or check my email.  The breakfast will keep you from being hungry, but is nothing great. The only good thing I have to say is about the breakfast staff: they were friendly, helpful, and cheerful.  Everything else about the actual property is unpleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for your review. Unfortunately, our pool and spa have been down for repairs and renovations and wont be open anytime soon. It does state it on our website and the other 3rd parties as well. We do have a sign on our front counter just to remind everyone about those amenities not being available. We are glad that you say the breakfast menu is fulfilling and it is, with our fresh waffles made at your request, and we also have toast, muffins, cereal, oatmeal, etc. Thank you for your compliment about our breakfast attendant. I will definitely share this with her. We are sad to hear that you feel some kind of way about the property. We always try and ensure that all guests are having an enjoyable or lovely stay. We are sorry to hear that, that was not your case. We hope you can come back and stay with us so we can redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you

Summary Heading: We very disappointed that the pool was closed. Our room was...
Summary: We very disappointed that the pool was closed. Our room was next to the breakfast room and was very loud
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry about the pool and spa being closed. Unfortunately, we have that posted on our websites and the websites from the 3rd party companies. We do apologize if it was an inconvenience for you and your family.  Also, I wish that they issue with the room location was too noisy for you would have been reported in time so we can accommodate you to another location. We always encourage our guests to report anything if they are unhappy with something. Again, we apologize and we hope that you can stay with us again while you are in Anaheim. Thank you

Summary: I wouldn't say this was the greatest place ever but it also wasn't bad at all. If your looking for a place close to Disney this is a good choice. We got it on a decent price and it was fine. We stayed in a room that was updated. It was nice but also seemed kind of empty. Nice size room though. Breakfast was okay but nothing to rave about. Overall we had a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing a review about the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay. We thank you for staying with us and hope that you can book with us in the near future!  Thank you

Summary Heading: Needed to have the swimming pool functionable.  It was closed for swimming.
Summary: The room was average to above average and neat.  My over-all stay was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review! We want to thank you for taking our time and writing your feedback. We know that the pool and spa have been a great deal to our hotel, unfortunately, right now, it is under repairs and renovations. We are trying our best to get that fixed as soon as possible. We thank you and everyone for their patience and understanding. We hope that maybe soon we can get the pool and spa ready for everyone. Thank you and we hope you book again soon!

Summary: Shower wasn't working properly room smelled moldy and my holding deposit in that become available back in my card until two days later
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the issues you encountered. We always encourage our front desk staff to report anything if they are unhappy with their room. We are sorry if it wasn't addressed at the moment. As for the security deposit, it does take about 24 - 72 hours to be returned back to the card. Again, we thank you for staying with us have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: 3rd time staying here (does the job well enough & affordable too)
Summary: Our most recent stay was very good, room was clean, staff was customer friendly. We have stayed here for a total of 3 times. I have been commonly satisfied with our room. Sure sometimes some rooms need maintenance, but it seems they are doing better upkeep these days. I commonly pay many months in advance through Priceline... The price I receive is has been very decent and affordable for my families vacation needs. In addition, the location is very good for either Disneyland or Knott's (I really didn't like the 2 star hotel by Knott's compared to this one by Disneyland / the rooms are about 320 square feet or possibly greater).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us! I am glad to hear you are very organized, as to planning your vacations, and you booked way of ahead of time. The prices do sure change all the time. Once again, we are happy to know you had a great time here and we hope you can book with us again in the near future! Thank you

Summary: Over all it was a great stay. It was our second time staying at the hotel we will more than likely be booking here again. The only thing I would recommend is maybe doing different breakfast options through out the week.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your response. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay here. We hope you book with us again when you are in Anaheim. Thank you once again!

Summary: Quick check-in, friendly front desk.  Beds very comfortable, clean room.  Close to Disneyland, as well as free shuttle down the street.  Breakfast was adequate.  Bummer that the pool was inoperable but known it before I booked, so it was no surprise.  Overall great stay and would book there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We know the pool and spa can affect your stay but we  are working as fast and hard as possible to open up the pool and spa so everyone can enjoy it as they stay here with us. We appreciate your kind words and we hope you can book with us again in the near future! Thank you.

Summary Heading: A step up from the overpass!
Summary: The hotel was dirty and outdated. We were also locked out of our hotel room. We told the front desk at 7:30 in the morning that the door wouldn't work. They sent a member of the housekeeping staff to open it. She did some trick where she tapped the handle 3 times and it opened (obviously they knew the door was a problem). After returning from Disneyland at midnight the door wouln't open (again). We went to the front desk and the really friendly front desk clerk tried opening the door. It wouldn't work. He called his manager from home and she came down, but she couldn't get it open either. After an hour of trying to get into our room we finally were able to when she broke in through the window. The manager moved us to another room, which oddly enough was more updated, and ended
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your review. We apologize for the issue you had experienced with the door to enter into your room. After you were moved to a renovated room, we went ahead and had maintenance work on the issue so guests in the future, do not have to deal with that. We are happy that the Manager was able to help and work something out with you in the end. As for the breakfast, management is working something out so we can get more options on our menu. Also, unfortunately, we do not let guests leave with food up to their rooms, that is why we have a dining area for everyone to sit and enjoy their breakfast there. We are sorry if we did fall short on your expectations. If we do ever see you around Anaheim, do not tend to hesitate and come and book with us again. Thank you.

Summary: The hotel was good, it's very close to Disneyland, it was a good place to sleep and rest. We weren't there at the hotel much, we just used it as a place to sleep. The carpet was dirty, sticky feeling and the room was humid. Other then that it was good. Gas stations and restaurants are very close.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We appreciate your time and cooperation on letting us know how we are doing. W apologize for the carpet not being up to your expectations. I will definitely share this with our maintenance.  We do have a maintenance team that is cleaning and washing carpets every other day, so we apologize. We are glad that you had a good night sleep during your stay and we hope that this does not stop you from booking with us. We hope that you can give us another chance to redeem ourselves. Thank you

Summary Heading: The worst hotel experience I've had in a long time
Summary: The staff are rude and pushy. The rooms are dingy and dark. The sheets are so rough they feel like sandpaper on your face and the towels are about as soft as pea gravel. The pillows are mildewy, and there are black lights in the room which is pretty creepy. The "close walk to the Disneyland tram" is approximately 1.5 miles and takes you next to the freeway entrance. It's not right around the block like their map makes it appear. The breakfast was a disappointing assortment of starch, starch, and more starch.  This hotel would have been more appropriately priced at $59/night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are sorry that you had a bad experience. I wish the issues you had experienced with the sheets, towels, etc. would have been reported to the front desk since we are open 24 hours, and we could have had a solution to your worries. The "close walk to the Disneyland tram" that you say you went on, is not the shuttle we are suggesting our guests to go to. I am not sure which bus you might have ride on, but we usually suggest the Toy Story Parking Lot which is about 10 minutes from us. You can walk and take the free bus ride that the Disneyland Resort provides, which takes you to the front of the  main gates. (There is only one drop off, and that is at the entrances, we do not know which bus you accidentally did take. We apologize if any of our front desk agents did mention anything but generally, every agent knows where the Toy Story Parking Lot is.) As for the breakfast, it is Continental Breakfast, again, basic amenities with he breakfast menu. We do not provide Whole breakfast.  We do apologize for the experienced you had. We hope you can book with us again and giving us a chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: The price was right, but the room was not good (we stayed on the 2nd floor).  You could hear all yours neighbors, above and next to you all hours of the night.  The Pool was broken and not available.  The electical outlets were loose and we could not plug in our electric devices.  The AC unit did not work on the low fan speed.  The exhaust fan in the bathroom was very noisy and only worked periodically.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. We do apologize if we did fall short on your expectations. I wish these issues were reported to the front desk so we could have open options if it did seem like a real problem to your stay. The pool and spa have been out of order due to renovations and repairs, those have been posted on our website and we also have a sign on our front desk to remind our guests that those amenities are not available.  As for the electrical outlets, fan, A/C, etc., again, we would have appreciated if those things were reported so we would fix it or have, like I said, alternative options for you. Again, we apologize and hope you can book with us in the near future! Thank you

Summary: We did a 4 night stay for our Disneyland trip. And was perfect place to sleep after long day at parks. Was clean with exception of a few rusted areas in bathroom. Flat screen tv was nice. View from our room wasn't the worst. Homeless man sat outside the hotel on bench the entire time we were there and we could see him from our window. So that was not the best. The free breakfast was decent. Was great pricing and like 4 minute walk to toy story parking lot. About 15 minute walk to park. Was a very nice stay. We will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for an excellent review! We happy to know that your stay was satisfying, however, we do apologize for the view you had outside your window. We have been in contact with the city of Anaheim and the police about the homeless people outside the bus stop, but technically they are not breaking any laws just siting there since it is a public area. Thank you for your time and we hope you stay with us again.

Summary: I'm not handicap but they placed me in a handicap room. With no tub. No fridge , and no microwave. For $100 a night?
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. As for an accessible room, it is the same price as a standard room. There isn't really a difference. As for the amenities you are asking about, we do have them available. Those are upon request, you can call ahead of time or as you are checking in, you can go ahead a request them and our friendly front desk agents will be glad to help and let you know if we do have them able available to check you in into a room that has those amenities. That is definitely not a problem. We apologize if that was an issue with your stay. We always encourage our guests to call out front desk which is open 24 hours, and report anything that is wrong with their room or stay. Again, we apologize and we hope you can book with us again.

Summary Heading: Pretty good stay being on a budget Disneyland
Summary: Everything was fine I had asked for a 1st floor room ended up on the second but that was fine it was nice. It looked like they were doing updates we stayed for 3 nights and house keeping did a good job of cleaning our room. Carpet was clean so was everything else. The pool was closed so I was not happy about that but it's ok spent most of our time at Disneyland. I'm would have to say my only complaint would be the morning breakfast more variety would be better than what they had and this is my second stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. I am sorry for the confusion about the assigning of the rooms. We are happy to know that you were satisfied with your stay, even though we know that they pool and spa is out of order for now. As for the breakfast options, management has been working on seeing how we can improve. Of course, I will share this review with them and let them know how we can improve on those issues. Again, we are happy about your stay, however, we do apologize for the amenities offer not being available during the days of your stay. Thank you and we hope you can come back and enjoy the amenities when they are open. Thank you

Summary: I picked this hotel for the price and because of all the reviews from one to two years ago when management was claiming they are updating the rooms. I guess what they meant was key cards and a few trees. Our room smelled musty, there was water damage on the ceiling, the bathroom light had to be coaxed to stay on, and the toilet handle had to be held for a while to make sure it actually flushed. We were offered a different room that was worse smelling and had water damage on the wall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. We apologize if the room you were in was not up to your expectations. We always encourage our guests to call the front desk if anything does need to be reported. Our maintenance is on hand, and if any guests do need extra cleaning in their rooms, we can always call our housekeeping team, they will be happy to assist you. Again, we apologize if you were not happy, and we hope that you can stay with us again so we can make it up to you. Thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: Wow. 63$ a night in July in walking  distance to Disneyland and continental breakfast included.  Our two rooms were both very clean and the staff were very friendly and attentive. I say what a bargain do it,you won't be disappointed.  We did make our reservations in February or March of that year  to get that rate
Manager Response: Thank your for your review. We are happy to know that you had a happy stay with us. We hope we get to see you in the near future!

Summary: My vehicle was towed and had to pay 350.00 I had parking permit ,management would not take responsibility. I have been a client since 2012 this is a 2nd time they tow my car . Other than this issue hotel is great for the price and convenient location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time. We know that this can be an inconvenience but cars that do not have a parking permit issued by the hotel, can have their car towed. Every guest is responsible on having their parking permit visible on the dashboard of their vehicle. Unfortunately, your car did not have the parking permit visible, or it was not where it was suppose to be and because of that, your vehicle was towed. We thank you for your sincere feedback, and we hope that you can stay with us again. Thank you

Summary: When I checked in my tv and phone did not work. They were only able to fix the tv. Pool was out of order but I knew that before I booked. In the morning I discovered the hair dryer didn't work also. When I reported it in person, the front desk clerk asked why I didn't phone it in... Besides those things, it was a clean and quiet room and very close to Disneyland, the Convention Center, and restaurants. Overall for the price, the good location, and the friendly staff it was worth it and I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing this review. I truly apologize for the issue you experience during your stay with the TV and the phone. I  am glad that they did take care of that, as well as for the hair dryer. We do have a housekeeping and maintenance team ready at all times for things like these that any guest can experience during their stay. Thank you for the compliment for our front desk, I will share this review with them to let them know as well how they are doing and how we can also improve our customer service. We hope you can book with us again in the near future! Thank you

Summary: The Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center is a nice place for a decent price.  It is walking distance to Disneyland, which is convenient.  It's one of the top places my family stays because it is clean, cheap and convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review. We are happy that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great location not so great emenities
Summary: The location of this hotel is pretty good if you are wanting a quick walk to the convention center.  It also offers a free breakfast which is pretty decent.  You can also catch a ride on the toy story shuttle in the parking lot directly across that will take you to Disneyland.  Its also right next to a Denny's so that's a plus if you want something quick to eat.  The downfall was that the pool and spa both were not working.  The shower had to be the worst shower I have ever used in my life.  No water pressure and the temperature of the water kept going from extremely hot to cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was satisfying. You are absolutely right, we are really close to the Toy Story Parking lot provided by the Disneyland Resort, you can park or walk in that lot and take the free shuttle provided by them for free straight to the main gates of the Parks. Moreover, if you do not want to walk all the way to the parking lot, you can take the A.R.T Shuttle (Anaheim Resort Transit) right outside our hotel to the main gates of Disneyland, but will have to pay for the shuttle tickets as you are getting on the shuttle. Sorry for the inconvenience about the pool and spa being out of order. We are under renovations, and we hope that they will be done soon. I wish that the shower issue could have been reported to the front desk. Our front desk is open 24 hours, I know that they could have had alternative options for your convenience. Again, we hope you book with us again in the near suture as you visit Anaheim again. Thank you

Summary: I was not expecting much from the room when paying $60 a night.  It was clean, and the cleaning service came every day.  The free continental breakfast was lacking, but you can't complain when it is complementary. It is very close to the convention center, and relatively close to Disney.  The pool was out of service which was a bummer.  The main thing that ruined the hotel experience was the front desk staff.  They were unresponsive and you had to make a request multiple times before it was resolved (ie minifridge in room).  We were pretty much ignored for 5 minutes when we went to check in and they were sitting at the front desk.  Also, we made it clear we wanted to charge multiple cards when checking out (split the cost over multiple people) and were assured we could.  When
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We take all of our guest's review very serious. We are happy to know your stay was a satisfying one; however, we do know that the pool and spa is a great big missing piece of your vacation, but with bigger and great renovations coming this way, we want our guests to the most enjoyable stay as they stay with us in the future. I do want to mention that this review I will definitely share with our front desk agents so we can learn from our error or mistakes, and improve on our customer service. I do apologize for the miscommunication there was between the front desk agents. You can pay at check-out there is no problem about that, however; what needs to be clear is that as you change your type of payment for your stay from one credit card to another, the funds do take about 2-3 business days but the longest we have seen the funds take is 15 days. Unfortunately, that is the way our system works. Again, I offer a true and deep apology for the miscommunication there was, we hope that this does no stop you from booking with us in the near future. We hope you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you

Summary Heading: Take it for what it is!
Summary: I am continuously astounded by the number of people who book economy rate hotels and expect a four star resort. Our stay at Travelodge was decent enough.  Check in was efficient and staff was pleasant.  Rooms are a good size and clean. There is night security and we didn't worry about our vehicle.  The property itself could use updating. The pool is currently down for maintenance, which was a bummer for our two teens.  We bought day passes for the bus line that stops right out front next door at Denny's. $5 for a day pass. We had an overall positive experience.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. It is so great to know you found us to be so reasonable and you had such a nice stay. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is great that you found them to be so friendly and helpful. We hope you can book with us again in the near future as you visit Anaheim again! Thank you

Summary: we stayed at this hotel 6 years ago and we never returned because the experienced was not good. This time the staff was very nice and helpful and room was very clean. The only thing i didnt like was the internet speed which was very poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if you did not have a very good experience in the past, however, now, with our renovated rooms and lobby I am pretty sure it was a new experience for you. Thank you for your compliment on our front desk, I will definitely share this review with them. Also, we apologize for the internet not being up to your standards. It can get slow at sometimes when everyone seems to be on it, but of course, we will keep an eye on it and make sure it is running at all times. Thank you once again so much for your feedback and we hope that you can stay with us again.

Summary: Appearances are deceiving. It looked like a nice hotel and the amenities they offered were normal, but there was nothing normal about this place. First of all, they advertised microwaves as an amenity and there was NO microwave. The ice machine wasn't working, the pool was closed for repairs, and the carpet was absolutely unsanitary. The first thing we wanted to do after traveling such a distance was take off our shoes, but the carpet was so filthy that our feet turned BLACK. We went there on the hottest days of the year in June and a clean place, ice, and pool would have been nice to have after visiting Disneyland for two days.  Will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay with us. We always encourage our Guests to let us know if there are any issues with their room accommodations. When we know that the ice machine is not available, we do have ice at the front desk as well if necessary for our guests. When the pool is needed to be shut down for repairs, of course, we do not let anyone in, again, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We understand the frustration and inconvenience this may cause and we are working hard to prevent these issues from happening. Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you and your family in the future.

Summary: Man where do I start.  The carpet is so dirty that my socks turn black within 5 min. We have to wear sandals in the room.  The bedsheets were very old with small holes in them. They were wash but their age is way pass replacement date. The bed cover is not very clean and I would not feel comfortable laying on them.  There are some good though.  The shower water was hot and heavy, staff are reasonably friendly.   But I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are sorry to hear you were extremely disappointed with the cleanliness of the carpet in your room. We do have a scheduled routine shampooing agenda and keep up on the carpet cleaning with a wet shampoo as you say.  We do apologize if you found the carpet not up to your standards. Sometimes due to our guest's previous use, it can become dirty before we have the chance to address it. We always want our guests to be extremely happy with their stay and we really wish we would have had the opportunity to make this happen for you. In the future, please do not hesitate to contact our 24 hour front desk so we can assist. We would have been more than happy to move you to another room to make your stay with us a great one. We will definitely share this review with our housekeeping manager just to let her know how the staff is doing and also how we can improve. Again, we do appreciate you taking the time to give us a review, and we are disappointed that we failed you. We hope you book again with us so we can redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you.

Summary: The check in was easy the lobby was nice and clean, when we made our reservations we were aware that the spa was broken how ever they failed to mention anything about the pool being out of order witch we found out when we went to use it.  Now on to the rooms.  They should be ashamed of renting this room it stains on the side of the mattresses and on the curtains. There was no sink stopper in the bathroom sink, there was a piece of drywall cut out under the sink and leaning against the wall.  Poorly patched places all over the wall and ceiling.  Came back to the room late at night and there were a bunch of people still up and hanging out in the stair way.  The free wifi  I was only able to connect to once and then that was it.  Check out was painless.  I realize that this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your response. It seems we have fallen short on your expectations and we truly apologize for that. We have the spa and pool out of order due to renovations and maintenance repairs. We know it is a crucial time because it is summer, however, we want everyone to experience our amenities but in order to do so, we also understand that we have to dedicate time to any improvement; so we apologize for those amenities not being available those days of your stay. Moreover, we will definitely share this review with our Maintenance team and let them know how we can improve and we are doing. Thank you and once again we apologize for the inconveniences.

Summary: chose the beach area for birthday celebration. upon arrival the sky was overcast, so I thought the pool and jacuzzi would have to be my swimming adventure. parking to check in< i stop directly in front of the pool gate. a standard size piece of paper is taped the gate informing that the pool and spa area is closed for maintenance. in small letters, it mentions that is was added to the webpage. I booked this room weeks prior through the wyndham reservations; which I might no have read. the agent advised me of some lodging options and rates on the go fast plan. the internet is very slow and I might have discovered not too secure when I returned home. the breakfast room was nice, with service attendant, selection adequate, and the room comfortable, quiet and most enjoyable no
Manager Response: Firstly, I want to thank you for your precious time and writing this review. I also apologize for the inconvenience of the pool and spa being out of order. Our Travelodge team is working as fast and hard as we can to have those amenities ready to go for the enjoyment of each and every guests that stays with us. As future planning for great and better things for our hotel is, unfortunately, our team did choose the summer to renovate our outdoor pool and spa. I am glad that you had a very quiet and satisfying stay. Also, thank you so much for your kind review about our front desk manager. I will definitely share this review with her and let her know what a great job she is doing. We are happy to have her on our team! Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope in the near future you stay with us again!

Summary: No a friendly atmosphere. The customer service was horrible and not accomodating to our situation at all. We booked this on priceline and at was not given a choice due for the incidental cost of $100 to be charged on a credit card.  We had $75 available on a card for incidentals and was willing to give cash for the balance. The front desk called the manager at home Cheryl and she said absolutely not. It was 11:00 pm at night and we had to call priceline and have them talk to the front desk which took almost 1 hour of our time. We received a refund but not for 24 hours and we had children in the car waiting to go to bed. We were not looking for a free ride we just wanted to sleep for the night. Customer service was horrible.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time in writing your review. I want to start and say that we are sorry for the inconvenience that the 3rd party you booked with put you through, it must have been not accommodating at all. They should have told you about the credit card deposit that the hotels take when you book through them. Unfortunately, most of them tell  you after you book with them, so we are sorry for that inconvenience. As for the deposit that the hotel states, it is $100 on a credit card or $200 in cash. Now, when we hold it on the card it has to be the $100 completely and it cannot be less. When it's cash it has to be the $200 completely, again, it cant be less. That is our hotel policy. I'm not sure who was the person who you had talked to, to be accommodated from our end, because we do not have any staff with the name provided above. We are sorry if we did cause an inconvenience, again, we suggest that any future bookings please review restrictions and rules; that's where most of the time, they have their hidden fees.  Thank you for your understanding.

Summary: Fridge didn't work and management failed to fix it, but we only stayed one night.  Pool and spa out of order.  Room seemed a bit shabby but adequate.  Breakfast includes waffles, muffins and cereal.  We walked the mile to Disneyland rather than using the shuttles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the Maintenance team not being able to reach you and get that mini-fridge fixed for your convenience. As for the spa and pool, they are being down for renovations and repairs. We do apologize for any of these amenities not being available for the days of your stay. Thank you and again, we apologize.

Summary: About a mile from Disney, but very close to Disney parking where the team takes you to the front gate.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We hope that you had an enjoyable stay. We hope that you book with us again. Thank you so much for your time and review of the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center.

Summary: Didn't even want to take a shower in that room.  It smelled all to hell.  The carpet was completely & entirely wet by the sink.  It smelled so bad in there I had to cover my nose up with the sheet.  I recommend that you decide other wise if consider staying here.  I am dissapointed by my experience!

We stayed 11 days there's never anywhere for you to park because of their Ghetto rental car rent a wreck business 3 rented 3 rooms 2 of my other family members returned their rental cars for fear the cars would be towed. When complained to the frond desk & manager never any resolution. Revived a yellow parking permit to park in the Denny's parking lot next door.. Car has to moved by 7 am , I'm on vacation I'm not getting up at 7 am to move my car that I can't park at the hotel I'm staying at... The breakfast granted its free but when the hours are posted 7-10 lets make it 7-10 not 7- 9:20.. Just over all dealing with ghetto. It used to be a decent place to stay but not somewhere I will ever stay again ! Not to mention broken glass in parking lot and drunks fighting outside at

Summary Heading: The curtains and bed spread were creepy. There's lots of...
Summary: The curtains and bed spread were creepy. There's lots of sketchy people appearing to "live" there. Staff was ok. Pool was closed the entire 5 days we were there. Not a good value. Won't be back....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It seems you were not happy with your stay. We apologize for the curtains not being up to standards. I do want to mention that we do not have any monthly nor weekly rates here, so people do not live here. I will say, I will definitely share this review with out front desk staff for them to know how we are doing and to improve our customer service as well. Also, the pool and Jacuzzi are closed due to maintenance and repairs done to them. We are truly sorry about that. Once again, we thank you and we hope that you book with us again and give us a chance to redeem ourselves.

Summary: This property is located convenient to the local attractions and eateries. Although the rooms are in need of sprucing up so they appear clean, the property is a good value for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest feedback. We appreciate all of our guests' reviews and take them seriously. Now, we are under renovations, however, we know that they summer is coming, so this is a little of time consuming but we are going to renovate step by step. We know how important it is to be up to date with everything, although we are taking our time with this, we are certainly going to get there. We apologize if the room was not up to your standards. We always encourage all guests to report anything not satisfying to their needs to the front desk since our lobby is open 24 hours. Once again we apologize for that, we hope you come back and book with us. We hope that this does not stop you from booking with us anymore. Thank you.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights last week, and it was perfect.  The rooms were clean the staff was very nice, and helpful.  We were able to leave the truck parked and either walk or take the ART bus to Disney.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are glad that you had an enjoyable stay with us! We expect you to come back and book with Travelodge Anaheim Convention center. Once again, we thank you and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, rooms are a bit dated
Summary: While the location was great, the rooms were a little dated and in need of some remodeling.  We were on the second floor but there was evidence of water leakage through the ceiling at one point - not sure if a little paint would be enough to fix that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the room not being up to standards. All rooms will get renovated at some point and we apologize if the that was an issue that you encountered during your stay. We hope that this does not stop you from booking with us again. We hope that you book with us soon and give us a chance to redeem ourselves and serve you the way you deserve. Thank you and once gain, we apologize.

Summary: Had the worst experience here! Incompetent front desk personnel and extremely rude employees. Continental breakfast? sure if you enjoy eating toast! Glad we only needed this place as a stop over for a few hours!

As far as the hotel it was clean, but the outlet's were loose so we were using shoes to prop up chargers etc to stay in the outlet's. Lighting was poor. Air conditioning was poor and if your watching what you eat the breakfast isn't for you! Carbs! Carbs! Carbs! Very unhappy with that
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write your honest review. I apologize for the room not being up to your standards. We are going through some rough renovations, I will definitely share this review with our management team and let them know. As for the breakfast menu: it is Continental Breakfast; you have your basic amenities which are; freshly done waffles, pastries, muffins, toast, cereal, oatmeal, coffee, tea, milk, juices, etc. We apologize if the breakfast was not up top your standards. Once again we thank y ou and apologize.

Summary Heading: It could be worse I suppose.
Summary: This hotel is fine for a quick trip where you will not be spending hardly any time in the rooms.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for taking your time to give us a review. It seems like you were not satisfied with your stay. We apologize for any issues you had. We hope that you can book with us again and we can redeem ourselves. Thank you once again.

Summary: Took granddaughter for her first trip to Disneyland from out of state. Carpet was filthy. Had continental breakfast first day door was open. 2nd day our key would not work for breakfast. We knocked and knocked and the gal did not even bother to come over, even though we were showing her our card, trying to get breakfast for the 2 year old.  (Language barrier) we were told when we went to the office. Sure why not. We had a hard time getting in our room with key card and a harder time trying to lock the door. We also had our rental car dented by some idiot. ( Thank you jerk). Plus came home with this souvenir on my foot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing a review. Firstly, we want to apologize for the carpet not being up to your standards. We will definitely share this review with our Maintenance team and let them know how they are doing and how we can improve. Thank you so much for that. Also, as for the breakfast issue you had with the keys not scanning for the breakfast, we thank you for coming to the front desk to address the issue you encountered. However, the breakfast attendant did not open the door because she is instructed not to do so. We are trying to avoid people who come into the hotel, who are not guests, to get breakfast. Moreover, We have a sign on the door for anyone to how would like breakfast, needs to scan their keys on the door, however, we know that your keys were not working, so thank you for coming to the front desk and letting us know what was going on. In addition, during that moment, you could have brought down the keys so we could have seen what were wrong with them. Unfortunately, during the days you were staying with us , we were renovating on the door locks, and they were all new. So, that might have explained why there was a little of a hard time with the lock of the door trying to manage it. As for the inconvenience of the car and your foot, I wish these things were reported to the front desk and see what we could have done to help, or try to help in the best way we can. We are sorry for all these things you experienced, but again, all these things could have been reported so we could have helped in so many ways. Thank you for your time and again, we apologize.

Summary: Decent room on second floor was convenient to washers/dryers, and just 1 flight of stairs for easy coming and going. And there's one elevator for tired feet and luggage toting, and for 3rd floor rooms. Decent breakfast w/ cereals, waffles, asst pastries and beverages. Decent free parking is a great plus, as is the ART stop right outside.The housekeeping staff are sweet and helpful, however the front desk staff needs an instant lesson on the importance and appreciation of smiles and hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am a happy to hear that this stay was convenient and the location was great! The amenities offered, are for your convenience as well, we are glad that you were able to enjoy them on your stay. We are grateful for your compliment on our staff, however, it seems you were not pleased with our front desk staff. I will definitely share this review with our front desk team and see in what we can improve on so we don't have to disappoint guests in the future and now. I appreciate your time and honesty on your review. I thank you and we hope that you can book with us again in the near future!

Summary: I was a little leery about staying here due to some of the bad reviews. Everything was fine. Not one problem. Our room was quiet and clean. The are remodeling so can't wait to see how it will look when all done. The ladies at the front desk were always very courteous and helpful. Breakfast was very good and the lady that made the waffles always had a smile on her face. She was so sweet. The hotel itself does not have a tram to Disneyland but right in front of the Travellodge you can take a bus to DLand for $5.00 round trip. Would I do this again?  I sure would!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I appreciate your compliments about our front desk and staff for the breakfast. We always strive to give great customer service to all guests. I'm very happy to read that you had a very nice stay. We hope to see you soon in the near future and serve you gain. Once again, thank you.

Summary: This Travelodge was very accommodating for my family and I. They serve breakfast the next morning in their breakfast room which was convenient for out little mini family vacation. Staff was also helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We, as front desk agents, are also looking for new ways and inspirational ones as well, to make every guests' stay a better one everyday. Thank you for your compliments about our staff. We look forward on having you in the near future and we hope to serve you one more time! Once again, thank you!

Summary: We  had a great stay , my 2 bedroom suite was wonderfully spacious and great for the family. After a long day we had a great nights sleep as we sunk into those comfortable beds. Arthur and Claudia as well as the staff were very nice , they also surprised us with a goody bag that was much appreciated. It is very convenient to Disneyland with so many nice restaurants to choose from. We look forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and writing your review over your stay at the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. Your review is very much appreciated. We are happy to know that your stay was a great one and knowing we did our job in making your stay a pleasant one lets us know we did our job! Once again, we thank you.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay, great price
Summary: This room was giant! Plenty of space, with 2 queen size beds, table with 4 chairs, mini fridge, and room to spare. Nice to be able to toss all of our stuff and spread out after a long day, without being all over each other. Short walk to Disney shuttle, which is nice, especially after a long day. My only complaint, is that the carpet was filthy. We have a 4 year old, and after playing on the floor for only an hour, her feet were black. It looked as though she had been playing outside on asphalt for hours. So, just wear socks!  Really enjoyed this place, especially the price...will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. I am so happy to read that you had a pleasant stay. I apologize for the carpet not being up to your standards. We do have a great maintenance team that could have taken care of it right away if reported. Our front desk is open 24 hours so if you need anything you can let us know, of course, once you book with us again! We hope to see you soon and once again we thank you.

Summary: Travelodge did not honor my go fast rate of $30 they did not have my reservation which I had the confirmation numbers
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize for the miscommunication Wyndham had with your reservations as they came through our system. Unfortunately, the reservations were made from their end and on our end it had the regular nightly rate. I am glad that we were able to verify and catch the mistake that Wyndham had made, and to modify the reservation to honor your $30.00 / per night rate. I want to thank you for staying with us and giving us a chance. Once again, I apologize.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Not so Great Room.
Summary: Great location if you are visiting either of the Disney Parks, unfortunately the room was not up to standard.  The room had a strong mold odor and the carpets were sticky.  The bed was comfortable but you could tell the comforter had not been washed in a while.  The ventilation fan in the bathroom was hanging out of the celling and the toilet was dirty. However they were doing some sort of renovations so hopefully all of these things will be taken into consideration.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. I want to let you know we do take our guest's  reviews very serious. I do want to mention that we have front desk to your service 24 hours during the day. I wished that you could have had mentioned this to our staff and I know that they could have had an alternative option for you to accommodate. As you mentioned, we are going through rough renovations and I hope as everything will get done, you can give us another chance to book with us again and we can redeem ourselves. Once again I thank you.

Summary: Got a good deal on the room for six nights.  Was a bit apprehensive after reading the reviews but I had a good experience with this hotel.  Never saw any bugs.  I was on the third floor.  It's also called Travelodge International Anaheim on some websites.  Front desk were excellent.  Breakfast lady was nice too.  Would be better if they had some fruit at breakfast.  When my fridge was not working I asked the maintenance guy and he fixed it.  I walked to the free Disney shuttle from the Toy Story lot.  There is grocery shopping in the Target about three blocks south.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. Thank you as well for the compliments to our staff. It is wonderful to hear that they were helpful during your stay with us. I promise that your comment about bringing some fruit or variety to our breakfast, will be brought up to management. As for our maintenance, I am glad to hear that he was helpful and efficient to help put with your fridge.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we do look forward to seeing you again. Once again, thank you.

Summary: Worst experience with a hotel. Room smelled like urine, water took forever to.get hot, shower did not have water pressure and Continental breakfast was not that great. Air conditioner cover was coming.off.

Summary Heading: Get what you pay for. Was there 2 nights. It's close to...
Summary: Get what you pay for. Was there 2 nights. It's close to Disneyland. Comp breakfast was adequate. Breakfast room was very clean, woman made the waffles (to reduce mess and waste, I'm sure). She was very kind and helpful. All staff were good. Rooms were old, dirty LOOKING, not dirty, but smelled musty. Fridge didn't work. They'll fix later. For the price it was ok. I'll upgrade next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. I appreciate your compliments as for our staff. That does let me know we are on the right path as to provide great customer service. I apologize for the room not being up to your standards, we are working as hard as we can to renovate our rooms. As well our mini-fridges and microwaves. I'm sorry for the inconveniences you encountered. I hope you can give us a chance to redeem ourselves. Once again, thank you and we apologize.

Summary: From the outside it appears well cared for.... Inside it smelled of a mixture of a chemical cleaning agent and pot... The air conditioning did not work well at all... We had it cranked up and it did not cool the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It sounds like you had a couple of issues with your stay and you are not satisfied. I do apologize for the inconveniences you encountered. However, we do have a 24 hour front desk available, so our guest's can contact us with questions or concerns regarding their room at any time. A simple call to the front desk at any time can easily fix this. I hope this does not stop you from booking with us again and  We do hope you decide to visit us again next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Travelodge near Anaheim Convention center and Disneyland
Summary: Thanks is a pleasant not fancy motel. Free breakfast was waffels,cold cereal, muffins, juice and milk. Pool and lobby were under construction but not a disturbance. Staff were helpful and friendly. I was permitted to park prior to bring about to check in. Room was comfortable and clean. For the price and exceptional convience I'll be back next year🙌
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in writing a review for the Travelodge Anaheim Convention Center. We are so happy that you were satisfied with your stay. Thank you for complementing us on our staff. That Lets us know that our staff is on good track to provide great customer service and lets us know we are doing our job. We hope we see you back again soon and thank you for booking with us!

Summary: This is the 5th year that I have stayed during the Pri med conference and Im just saying that the property needs updating. I could hardly connect on the internet. It was terrible this year. The shower took 5 minutes to get hot water and only half th water came through the shower head. the other half came through the tub spigot. I had to ask for more coffee packets every evening for the next morning and I was the only guest in the room.. The room was stuffy. and the air conditioner loud when I needed to use it to cool the room. the parking is inadequate in the evenings.Sorry! the price is good but the facility is "going down hill".
Manager Response: I want to thank you for your time in writing this review.  As you mention all these cosmetic issues that you experience during your stay, I want to say that we are going through rough renovations. I thank you for mentioning all of this so I can bring it up to management.  We take these honest reviews very serious, so once again thank you.
